Ulfric thinks he can hide behind the walls of his castle. But we will fight our way in and drag him out through the rubble to face justice. Because this is the end for them, the Stormcloaks will fight like cornered rats. They will be fierce and crafty. But they are no match for Legionnaires.
You are the best and the brightest warriors in Tamriel. Professional soldiers, fearless and devastating. The Emperor will be paying close attention to what happens here today. Men who distinguish themselves will be well rewarded.
Ready now! Everyone, with me! For the Empire! For the Legion!

kbs.name: Galmar Stone-Fist
kbs.description: the player's commanding officer in the Stormcloaks, a Nord

kbs.name: Whiterun
kbs.description: a city with tall, yet old and crumbling walls

plots: Galmar Stone-Fist is addressing the player and the player's fellow Stormcloaks: the true sons and daughters of Skyrim
Imperial legionnaires have been stationed on the walls of Whiterun

quest.title: Storm over Whiterun
quest.objective: take Whiterun in the name of the Stormcloaks
tasks: Reach Whiterun.
tear through the barricades, and find a way to drop the drawbridge into Whiterun
take Whiterun in the name of the Stormcloaks
quest.description:
This is it men! They say that our cause is false and that we are nothing more than thieves, thugs and murderers! But no! We are farmers! We are craftsmen! We are sons and daughters of shopkeepers, maid servants and soldiers!
We are the sons and daughters of Skyrim! And we have come this far because our cause is true. Because we fight as one. And because our hearts are bursting with anger! What we do here today, we do for our country! For all the true Nords of Skyrim!
Whiterun's walls are tall, but they are old and crumbling, like the Empire whose Legion lines them. They've barricades to block us, but we'll tear through them and the Imperials behind them! Our objective is the drawbridge. If we can find a way to drop it, the city will be ours!
Everyone on me. Let's show these Imperial milk drinkers what true Nords look like! Rrrrraaaaaarrrrr!!!!!

kbs.name: Legate Rikke
kbs.description: the player's commanding officer in the Imperial Legion

kbs.name: Ulfric
kbs.description: the man who leads the Stormcloaks

plots: Legate Rikke is addressing the player and the player's fellow legionnaires: the Imperial legion will send a message to Ulfric and the rebel Jarls who support him

quest.title: Weather the Storm
quest.objective: protect Whiterun from the Stormcloak invasion
tasks: Head to Whiterun.
go with Legate Rikke
protect Whiterun from the Stormcloak invasion
quest.description:
This is it men! This is an important day for the Empire and for the Legion. And for all of Skyrim.
This is the day we send a message to Ulfric and the rebel Jarls who support him. We will protect Whiterun from Stormcloaks. But make no mistake. What we do here today, we do for Skyrim and her people. By cutting out the disease of this rebellion, we will make this country whole again!
Ready now! Everyone, with me! For the Empire! For the Legion!

kbs.name: Ulfric
kbs.description: the player's leader in the Stormcloaks

kbs.name: Castle Dour
kbs.description: the headquarters of the Imperial legion

plots: Ulfric is addressing the player and the player's fellow Stormcloaks: the true sons and daughters of Skyrim
Sovngarde awaits those who die fighting
the gods will look down and see Skyrim as she was meant to be: full of Nords who are mighty, powerful, and free

quest.title: A Crumbling Empire
quest.objective: conquer Solitude, and free Skyrim from the Empire
tasks: fight your way to Castle Dour to cut the head off the Imperial legion itself
conquer Solitude, and free Skyrim from the Empire
quest.description:
This is it men! It's time to make this city ours!
We come to this moment carried by the sacrifices and the courage of our fellows. Those who have fallen. And those still bearing the shields to our right. On this day, our enemy will know the fullness of our determination, the true depth of our anger, and the exalted righteousness of our cause.
The gods are watching. The spirits of our ancestors are stirring. And the men under suns yet to dawn will be transformed by what we do here today. Fear neither pain, nor darkness. For Sovngarde awaits those who die with weapons in their hands, and courage in their hearts.
We now fight our way to Castle Dour to cut the head off the legion itself! And in that moment, the gods will look down and see Skyrim as she was meant to be. Full of Nords who are mighty, powerful, and free!
Ready now! Everyone, with me! For the sons and daughters of Skyrim!

kbs.name: Arniel Gane
kbs.description: a fellow mage of the College of Winterhold

plots: the player has been rising through the ranks of the College of Winterhold

quest.title: Arniel's Endeavors
quest.objective: help Arniel Gane with his unofficial research project
tasks: bring Arniel Gane 10 Dwemer Cogs
help Arniel Gane with his unofficial research project
quest.description:
I can't help but notice that you're doing quite well for yourself, rising through the ranks and all.
It may not be "official", but there is a, uhh, project I've been working on. I wonder if perhaps you could assist with it.
Just... Just bring me some Dwemer Cogs. I need to examine them for the methods used in forging them. Ten of them should be enough for me to get a better understanding of how they were crafted. That's all I need, all right?

kbs.name: Arniel Gane
kbs.description: a scholar fascinated by the Dwemer

kbs.name: Dwarven Convectors, Convectors
kbs.description: Dwemer machines that were used to purify gems

plots: the Dwemer's greatest achievement has also been their greatest mystery: their instant, unexplainable disappearance
Arniel Gane tries to find out what happened to the Dwemer though experimentation
the player brought Arniel Gane Dwemer parts and a soul gem before

quest.title: Thorough Cleaning
quest.objective: purify a soul gem
tasks: Find your way to Skyrim ruins.
place the soul gem in 3 Dwarven Convectors and heat them for 3 seconds with Arniel Gane's spell
purify a soul gem
quest.description:
The Dwemer, they were uhh, masters of magic in a way we can't even begin to conceive of. Their greatest achievement, however, has also been their greatest, shall we say... mystery.
This mystery is their disappearance, of course! Instant, unexplainable. The stories have fascinated me... Ever since I was young, I wanted to know what really happened. After years and years of work, I'm closing in on a way to investigate what happened through experimentation.
Only now... Well, it's simply a disaster. Without boring you with the, ahh, details, I am attempting to re-create the circumstances of the event. I used the soul gem you brought me for this. The soul gem by itself isn't enough, you see. It needs to be altered, purified. The Dwemer had machines for this sort of thing. I attempted to build my own, based on designs and using parts you helped to provide. My very own Dwemer machine. It worked, but not fully. And the uhh... The device was destroyed in the process.
The designs for my Convector were based on real Dwemer machines, so there may still be some in existence. I'd go looking myself, but uhh... Yes, there are calculations to double- and triple-check. Many calculations. Perhaps you could seek out these Convectors in Skyrim ruins? I can even teach you the spell to heat them.
Just place the soul gem inside, and heat the Convector. At least three seconds. You'll almost certainly need to find multiple Convectors. I suspect it may be due to the nature of the soul gem versus the crystals this was intended for. Destroys the equipment in the process.
But, ahh... It's effective. Three times, and the crystal should be ready for the next step. Isn't this exciting?

kbs.name: Angarvunde
kbs.description: an old tomb that is said to hold a treasure that bestows great power on the one who discovers it

plots: Medresi Dran's work force ran away while excavating Angarvunde: they opened a chamber full of undead

quest.title: Medresi Dran and the Wandering Dead
quest.objective: discover the treasure of Angarvunde
tasks: clear the main chamber of restless undead
discover the treasure of Angarvunde
quest.description:
I'm on the verge of incredible wealth, but my cowardly work force ran at the first sign of danger. We were excavating this old tomb when we opened a chamber full of corpses. The team took one look, turned tail, and ran.
Legend says this tomb holds a treasure that bestows great power on the one who discovers it. Beyond that, not much more is known. Obviously, this treasure will fetch a good deal of gold, and I'm willing to let you share in the reward when we find it.
I'll tell you what. You help me get the treasure and I'll split it with you. First, I need you to clear the main chamber of those restless dead. I'll stay here until you're finished, planning our next move.
With my brains and your brawn, that treasure will soon be mine... uh, ours.

kbs.name: Paarthurnax
kbs.description: a dragon, and the player's ally

kbs.name: Elder Scroll
kbs.description: a mythological scroll that can bend time itself

plots: the player has the Elder Scroll

quest.title: Alduin's Bane
quest.objective: defeat Alduin
tasks: Find your way to Time-Wound.
take the Elder Scroll to the Time-Wound
defeat Alduin
quest.description:
You have it. The Scroll - the Elder Scroll. Time bends... touch. Time shudders at its touch. There is no question. You are doom-driven. Blessings of Akatosh. The very bones of the earth are at your disposal.
Go then. Fulfill your destiny. Take the Scroll to the Time-Wound. Do not delay. Alduin will be coming. He cannot miss the signs. You must defeat him.

kbs.name: Sky Haven Temple
kbs.description: an ancient Blades sanctuary, hidden deep in the crags of the Reach

kbs.name: Dragonborn
kbs.description: a person who can stop Alduin and avert the end of the world

plots: the player is the Dragonborn

quest.title: Alduin's Wall
quest.objective: locate Alduin's Wall in Sky Haven Temple
tasks: Proceed to Karthspire.
find the entrance to Sky Haven Temple with Esbern
locate Alduin's Wall in Sky Haven Temple
quest.description:
Only a Dragonborn can stop Alduin and avert the end of the world!
But... I don't yet know how you can stop him. But Alduin's Wall does. I hope. It's in Sky Haven Temple, an ancient Blades sanctuary, hidden deep in the crags of the Reach.
Ah, yes. The entrance to Sky Haven Temple seems to be near what's now known as the Karthspire. We'll have to see what we find when we arrive there.
We should be careful. There's no telling what traps and wards the ancient Blades may have set.

kbs.name: Tolfdir
kbs.description: a professor at the College of Winterhold

kbs.name: Arch-Mage
kbs.description: the leader of the College of Winterhold

kbs.name: Jarl
kbs.description: the nobleman who rules over Markarth

kbs.name: Eye of Magnus
kbs.description: a powerful artifact that was held at the College of Winterhold

kbs.name: Staff of Magnus
kbs.description: a powerful staff that can contain energy from the Eye of Magnus

plots: the player is the Arch-Mage
the player should have the Staff of Magnus

quest.title: Aftershock
quest.objective: take care of a magical disturbance
tasks: Reach Markarth.
contain the power from the Eye of Magnus with the Staff of Magnus
take care of a magical disturbance
quest.description:
There is something you should be aware of, Arch-Mage. We've been contacted by the Jarl of Markarth. It would seem there's some sort of disturbance.
From what few details we were given, it sounds quite familiar. I suspect that the power released by the Eye of Magnus was not fully contained, and has coalesced in this part of Skyrim. I do hope you still have the Staff of Magnus someplace. I suspect you're going to need it to contain the power.
I'm sure the Jarl will be quite pleased to. I think it only fitting that the Arch-Mage personally receive a large portion of the reward.

kbs.name: Serana
relations: a courtyard in Castle Volkihar with Valerica's garden, a peaceful place that Serana's father could not stand

kbs.name: Castle Volkihar
kbs.description: a castle, and the home of Serana's family

kbs.name: a courtyard in Castle Volkihar with Valerica's garden, a peaceful place that Serana's father could not stand
kbs.description: a courtyard in Castle Volkihar with Valerica's garden, a peaceful place that Serana's father could not stand

kbs.name: Valerica
relations: a courtyard in Castle Volkihar with Valerica's garden, a peaceful place that Serana's father could not stand

kbs.name: Dexion
relations: a courtyard in Castle Volkihar with Valerica's garden, a peaceful place that Serana's father could not stand

plots: Dexion said the player and Serana needed two other Elder Scrolls
Valerica told Serana that she'd go somewhere safe, somewhere that Serana's father would never search

quest.title: Chasing Echoes
quest.objective: get information about an Elder Scroll from Valerica
tasks: Make your way to a courtyard in Castle Volkihar with Valerica's garden, a peaceful place that Serana's father could not stand.
search for clues about Valerica's whereabouts with Serana
get information about an Elder Scroll from Valerica
quest.description:
That Moth Priest, Dexion. He said we needed two other Elder Scrolls. I think I know where we can start looking. We need to find my mother, Valerica. She'll definitely know where one of the Scrolls is, and if we're lucky, she actually has it herself.
The last time I saw her, she said that she'd go somewhere safe... somewhere that my father would never search. Other than that, she wouldn't tell me anything. But the way she said it... "someplace he would never search." It was cryptic, yet she called attention to it.
Wait... There's a courtyard in Castle Volkihar. I used to help her tend a garden there. All of the ingredients for our potions came from there. She used to say that my father couldn't stand the place. Too... peaceful. I don't think we'll actually trip over her there. But it's worth a look.

kbs.name: Sorine Jurard
kbs.description: a fellow member of the Dawnguard

kbs.name: Florentius
kbs.description: a former priest of Arkay, and an eccentric, yet trustworthy man

kbs.name: Isran
kbs.description: a man who never got along with Florentius, and the leader of the Dawnguard

kbs.name: Gunmar
kbs.description: a male member of the Dawnguard

plots: Gunmar and Sorine Jurard think that the Dawnguard are going to need Florentius to help against the vampires
Florentius had regular contact with the Vigilants: Isran has kept track of the Vigilants

quest.title: Bolstering the Ranks
quest.objective: find Florentius and recruit him into the Dawnguard
tasks: ask Isran whether he knows where Florentius is
find Florentius and recruit him into the Dawnguard
quest.description:
These vampires are a new threat, and a truly deadly one. Gunmar and I agree that we're going to need Florentius to help.
Gunmar and I have a lot of work to do here, so we were hoping that maybe you could track him down. He's a priest of Arkay. Well, he was. It's... it's complicated. Florentius's a little eccentric, but we can trust him and we could definitely use his skills.
Here's the thing. We don't know where Florentius is. Haven't seen him in years. I think he had regular contact with the Vigilants, and I know Isran kept track of them... So maybe you could ask Isran if he knows anything?
Just keep in mind that Isran... well, he might not like the idea. The two of them just never got along.

kbs.name: Harkon
kbs.description: the Lord of the player and Garan Marethi's vampire clan

kbs.name: Bloodstone Chalice
kbs.description: a chalice that is able to increase the potency of the player's vampiric powers

plots: the player told Garan Marethi that Harkon wants the Bloodstone Chalice without addressing Harkon properly as Lord Harkon
Harkon has owned the Bloodstone Chalice for a long time

quest.title: The Bloodstone Chalice
quest.objective: fill the Bloodstone Chalice for Harkon
tasks: follow Garan Marethi to the Bloodstone Chalice
fill the Bloodstone Chalice for Harkon
quest.description:
Lord Harkon. Remember your place. Now, he wants the Chalice, then.
You've heard of the Bloodstone Chalice? The Chalice has been in Lord Harkon's possession for quite some time now. It is, when used properly, able to increase the potency of our powers.
Lord Harkon has neglected using the Chalice for ages. If he wants it filled now, then grander things are afoot. This is good.
Follow me. I'll take you to the Bloodstone Chalice.

kbs.name: Isran
kbs.description: the player's leader in the Dawnguard

kbs.name: Tolan
kbs.description: a male member of the Vigilants of Stendarr

plots: the Dawnguard are getting the Dawnguard Fortress back into shape
Isran gives the player a crossbow: crossbows are good for hunting vampires before they get too close

quest.title: Awakening
quest.objective: find out what vampires are looking for at Dimhollow Crypt
tasks: Head to Dimhollow Crypt.
meet Tolan, who will try to assist you
find out what vampires are looking for at Dimhollow Crypt
quest.description:
I need someone out in the field, taking the fight to the damn vampires, while we're getting the fort back into shape...
Go see what the vampires were looking for in Dimhollow Crypt. With any luck, they'll still be there. Here, you should take a crossbow. Good for hunting out those fiends before they get too close.
Tolan'll meet you at Dimhollow. He will try to assist you. Watch out. Vigilants of Stendarr were never trained for vampire hunting...

kbs.name: Castle Volkihar
kbs.description: Serana's family's home, on an island to the west of Solitude

plots: the player asked Serana why she was sealed inside a tomb
Serana and her father don't get along

quest.title: Homecoming
quest.objective: help Serana back to Castle Volkihar
tasks: find a boat that takes you and Serana to Castle Volkihar
help Serana back to Castle Volkihar
quest.description:
That's... complicated. And I'm not totally sure if I can trust you. But if you want to know the whole story, help me get back to my family's home.
My family used to live on an island to the west of Solitude. Not the most welcoming place, but depending on whose around, I'll be safe there. My father and I don't really get along. Ugh, saying it out loud makes it sound so... common. "Little girl who doesn't get along with her father." Read that story a hundred times.
Hopefully we can find a boat to take us to my family's home.

plots: the player is meeting Harkon for the first time: Harkon and his family are among the oldest and most powerful vampires in Skyrim
the player returned Harkon's daughter and her Elder Scroll to him

quest.title: Bloodline
quest.objective: become a vampire, or be banished from Castle Volkihar
tasks: decide whether you want to become a vampire or remain mortal
become a vampire, or be banished from Castle Volkihar
quest.description:
I am Harkon, lord of this court. By now, my daughter will have told you what we are. We are among the oldest and most powerful vampires in Skyrim.
You have done me a great service, and now you must be rewarded. There is but one gift I can give that is equal in value to the Elder Scroll and my daughter.
I offer you my blood. Take it, and you will walk as a lion among sheep. Men will tremble at your approach, and you will never fear death again.
However, if you refuse my gift you will be prey, like all mortals. I will spare your life this once, but you will be banished from this hall.
I await your decision.

kbs.name: Beornen
kbs.description: a male bear-mage with enchanting tools

plots: Baldrick the Enchanter can't enchant anything without enchanting tools

quest.title: Hidden Costs
quest.objective: bring enchanting tools to Baldrick the Enchanter
tasks: Head to Path of the Honored Dead.
search Path of the Honored Dead for a Beornen
bring enchanting tools to Baldrick the Enchanter
quest.description:
Welcome! Welcome, my friend. I have numerous enchantments available... weapons, armor, trinkets, and the like. Or, rather, I would, if I hadn't lost my enchantment kit!
Maybe you can help me. I've heard there's a Beornen shaman or something out in the Path of the Honored Dead, who has the kind of enchanting tools I need. If you could locate this bear-mage and acquire those tools, I would happily give you your first enchantment, free of charge!

kbs.name: Bellethe
kbs.description: a worried wife, and a passionate animal owner

kbs.name: Widow's Veil
kbs.description: a cave inhabited by nasty creatures

plots: Bellethe and Finnas are homesteaders with a small farm in the Frosted Hills: they went to get supplies from Estherian Enclave before winter

quest.title: Little Lost Ones
quest.objective: help Bellethe find Finnas and their precious animals
tasks: Travel to Widow's Veil.
find Finnas
help Bellethe find Finnas and their precious animals
quest.description:
Please, help me! Our dear little ones wandered into that cave! My husband Finnas ventured after them, but it is crawling with nasty creatures, and he hasn't returned!
My husband Finnas and I were on our way to the Estherian Enclave. We're homesteaders, with a small farm in the Frosted Hills. The weather is getting harsh, so we were making one last run for supplies before winter. Oh, I'm beside myself with worry! Please, find Finnas and our precious babies! You have to help us! You could have a special item as a token of our gratitude!

kbs.name: Blair
kbs.description: a researcher, giving quest via "Blair's Notes"

kbs.name: "Blair's Notes"
kbs.description: notes on the discovery of the Thing

plots: the Thing got in Bennings, but then Fuchs disappeared

quest.title: The Thing
quest.objective: destroy the Thing before it infects the whole world
tasks: find the Thing
destroy the Thing before it infects the whole world
quest.description:
"Blair's Notes"
by Blair

It was in the ice. Who knows how long? But it wasn't dead. And now it's hiding, here somewhere... in one of us. We found it in Bennings, but then Fuchs disappeared. It's still here, and it's looking for a way out. If it gets out into the world, it can infect everyone, everywhere. Three years, at most. Gods forgive us for what we've set loose upon the world.

plots: Commander Vale believes that the Alchemist might attack the Wellspring Temple: the Alchemist wants to reach the Guardian of Water

quest.title: Protect the Guardian!
quest.objective: protect the Guardian of Water
tasks: Make your way to Wellspring Temple.
scout the Wellspring Temple
protect the Guardian of Water
quest.description:
Commander Vale believes that the Alchemist might attack the Wellspring Temple, in an attempt to reach the Guardian of Water ... for what nefarious purpose I am afraid to speculate. There has been no word from either Vale, or the Guardian.
Scout the Wellspring Temple, and determine if the Guardian of Water is in any danger.

kbs.name: Guardian of Water
kbs.description: a powerful spirit of nature who was attacked by the Alchemist, one of the Guardians

plots: the Alchemist gets more dangerous each time he siphons off energy from Guardians

quest.title: Regroup at the Enclave
quest.objective: plan your next move with Commander Vale
tasks: Arrive at Estherian Enclave.
return to the Estherian Enclave
plan your next move with Commander Vale
quest.description:
The Alchemist must be stopped before he attacks any more Guardians! Each time he siphons off our energy, he becomes more dangerous.
You and Commander Vale should return the Estherian Enclave, and plan your next move.

kbs.name: Alchemist
kbs.description: a man who has Ordrak's Heart

plots: Ordrak's Heart wreaking havoc
the Guardian wants the player to go to the Ossean Wastes

quest.title: Return to the Enclave
quest.objective: stop the Alchemist before it's too late
tasks: Go to Ossean Wastes.
go to the Ossean Wastes with the help of Commander Vale
stop the Alchemist before it's too late
quest.description:
I don't know if the Alchemist understands that Ordrak's Heart is wreaking such havoc... or if he just doesn't care! I hope there's still a chance to stop him, one way or another, before it's too late.
So the Guardian wants you to head to the Ossean Wastes? You know what? I think I can help you with that...

kbs.name: Grand Regent
kbs.description: a male Estherian infected with the plague

plots: this plague targets beings of an inherently magical nature, not humans

quest.title: Trail of the Grand Regent
quest.objective: go to the Watchweald Temple
tasks: take Crows' Pass to the Frosted Hills to catch up to the Grand Regent before he enters the Watchweald Temple
go to the Watchweald Temple
quest.description:
This plague seems to specifically target beings of an inherently magical nature, such as the Estherians. So far it's not affecting humans, so I've sent for a transport to bring us some medical supplies, and I'll be coordinating the medical relief here.
Meanwhile, you need to get out to the Watchweald Temple. Take Crows' Pass to the Frosted Hills. Try to catch up to the Grand Regent before he enters the temple.

kbs.name: Commander Vale
kbs.description: a woman, an old friend to the Destroyer

plots: the Alchemist destroyed Torchlight

quest.title: Warn the Estherians
quest.objective: head up the pass to the Enclave, and warn the Estherians that the Alchemist is coming to them
tasks: Arrive at Enclave.
find Commander Vale and let her know what happened
head up the pass to the Enclave, and warn the Estherians that the Alchemist is coming to them
quest.description:
Someone needs to warn the Estherians. Head up the pass to their Enclave. Find my old friend, Commander Vale, and let her know what happened.
Tell them that the Alchemist destroyed Torchlight, and is headed their way. He may be there already...

plots: the player saved Duros the Blade from imprisonment

quest.title: Risk and Reward
quest.objective: meet Duros the Blade in Zeryphesh
tasks: Reach Zeryphesh.
see if your luck holds out
meet Duros the Blade in Zeryphesh
quest.description: Finally saved! Thank you! You look like a person who likes risk! I'm heading back to town now. Meet me there and see if your luck holds out!

kbs.name: Edovar
kbs.description: a spirit of an ambitious thief

kbs.name: Glyph of Balthazar
kbs.description: an artifact that has power over water

plots: Edovar stole the Glyph of Balthazar from the Wellspring Basin: he died while trying to use the Glyph of Balthazar and was trapped drowning forever

quest.title: Wash Away My Sins
quest.objective: set Edovar free
tasks: Proceed to Wellspring Basin.
return the Glyph of Balthazar
set Edovar free
quest.description:
I am merely spirit, but I mean you no harm. In life, I was an ambitious thief, and I thought I was invincible. My greatest achievement was when I stole the Glyph of Balthazar from the Wellspring Basin. I thought I could master its power over water, but I was very, very wrong.
Now I am trapped here in eternal torment, drowning forever, unable to rectify my mistake. Will you return the Glyph of Balthazar to the Wellspring Basin, and set my spirit free at last?

kbs.name: Kidrik the Mauler
kbs.description: the male leader of the slavers

plots: Kidrik the Mauler slipped away during the attack

quest.title: Hostage Negotiations
quest.objective: defeat Kidrik the Mauler, and free his hostages
tasks: Reach the underground slave den.
find Kidrik the Mauler and his captives
defeat Kidrik the Mauler, and free his hostages
quest.description:
Kidrik the Mauler must have slipped away during the attack, and concealed himself in the underground slave den! And, if the captives are there, as well, Kidrik must be holding them hostage!
You must defeat Kidrik and free the captives, or all that has been done to stop the slavers will have been for naught!

kbs.name: Slavers' Camp
kbs.description: home of the slavers who have been harassing the Estherians, in the Frosted Hills

plots: the player freed Elder Josimon from the slavers: he had recovered the Passkey Ember from them, but they captured him

quest.title: Up In Smoke
quest.objective: put the slavers out of the picture for good
tasks: burn down the slavers' houses
put the slavers out of the picture for good
quest.description:
Thank you for rescuing me. I had recovered the Passkey Ember from these slavers, but they captured me as I was trying to return to the Enclave.
I could use your help with one small matter before you go. These slavers have been harrying the Estherians for several weeks now. You defeated many, but there are many more watching us from the safety of those huts. Burn them out! If they are allowed to remain, the Frosted Hills will never be safe.

kbs.name: Fade
kbs.description: an immortal spirit who covets the remains of the living

plots: the player has summoned Fade: the player wants to enter Cacklespit's Realm

quest.title: Cacklespit's Realm
quest.objective: bring 4 skulls of famous warriors to Fade
tasks: find 4 skulls of famous warriors
bring 4 skulls of famous warriors to Fade
quest.description:
I am Fade - why have you summoned me?
Ah, you want to enter Cacklespit's hidden realm. Yes, I know the way - but I do not provide service without compensation.
I have very particular... appetites. The remains of the living are infused with a lingering residue of deeds past, which sustains me. Bring me the skulls of four warriors of renown, and I will take you where you wish to go. This battlefield is littered with the bones of great heroes. Your search should not be difficult.

kbs.name: Guardian
kbs.description: the player's ally who was enchanted by Ezrek Khan

kbs.name: Ezrek Khan
kbs.description: a male djinni, and Fazeer Shah's old rival

plots: the player successfully completed their previous tasks to Fazeer Shah: this is the player's final task
Ezrek Khan draws his power from the same source as the Netherim: the Netherim will oppose the player should they challenge Ezrek Khan

quest.title: The Djinni's Final Task
quest.objective: free the Guardian by humiliating Ezrek Khan
tasks: steal Ezrek Khan's Lamp of Marvels
free the Guardian by humiliating Ezrek Khan
quest.description:
Well, well. You are much more determined... and capable... than I had suspected! Excellent...
Now, to your final task. If you truly wish to free the Guardian, you must humiliate my old rival, Ezrek Khan, by stealing his precious Lamp of Marvels.
Be warned: Ezrek Khan draws his power from the same source as the Netherim. His realm borders closely on theirs; they will almost certainly stand against you, should you challenge the djinni.

plots: the player survived Fazeer Shah's first task with the Tu'tara

quest.title: The Djinni's Next Task
quest.objective: complete Fazeer Shah's second task
tasks: Head to Portal.
survive
complete Fazeer Shah's second task
quest.description:
You survived the Tu'tara more or less in one piece. Congratulations. But it occurs to me that you didn't do anything that you wouldn't ordinarily have done. This second task should prove much more amusing.
Step through the Portal. Your second task... is to survive!

kbs.name: Finnas
kbs.description: a grateful man who injured his leg

plots: the player told Finnas that the player came here to rescue him, Snowbell and Sunbeam

quest.title: The Not-So-Lost Husband
quest.objective: tell Bellethe that Finnas is okay
tasks: take Snowbell and Sunbeam to Bellethe
tell Bellethe that Finnas is okay
quest.description:
You ... you came to rescue us?  Thank the guardians!
I've managed to keep Snowbell and Sunbeam safe up here, but I injured my leg. I can't make my way out of this cave while carrying them. If you'll take them to Bellethe, I'll follow you out at my own pace. Tell Bellethe that I'm okay. My thanks to you for your help!

plots: many have tried to survive the Arena of Slaughter: now their souls serve Grom

quest.title: Grom's Arena
quest.objective: prove your worth to Grom
tasks: attempt to survive the Arena of Slaughter
prove your worth to Grom
quest.description:
So... you come seeking the wealth of Grom? My spoils are vast, and have no peer in this realm.
There is no path to success for you, lest you survive my arena and prove your worth.
Be forewarned - many have tested their mettle on this bloodstained floor, but none have yet succeeded. Their souls are now mine, and they do as they are bid.
Will you attempt the challenge? I will await your decision.
None have yet triumphed within the walls of my arena.
Perhaps you will be the first?
Perhaps...

kbs.name: Artificer
kbs.description: an evil man allied with the Alchemist

kbs.name: Alchemist
kbs.description: an evil man, the player's enemy

kbs.name: Guardian of Mana
kbs.description: a good spirit that controls all magic

plots: the player defeated the Artificer in the Vaults: he enslaved the Guardian of Mana for the Alchemist

quest.title: The Corrupted Guardian
quest.objective: prevent the Alchemist from corrupting and controlling all the world's magic
tasks: free the Guardian of Mana from Ezrohir's control
prevent the Alchemist from corrupting and controlling all the world's magic
quest.description:
We must act quickly. It appears that the Artificer you defeated in the Vaults has enslaved the Guardian of Mana for the enemy. The most pressing danger is that they will use the enslaved Guardian to corrupt... and control... all the world's magic. Our only recourse in that event may be to destroy the Guardian.
There might still be hope. If we can find a way to free the Guardian from Ezrohir's control, we can thwart the Alchemist's plans.

plots: Fazeer Shah and Ezrek Khan went to war centuries ago: they damaged the cities and devastated the land; Zeraphi sultan had enough and banished them both

quest.title: Meet the Djinni
quest.objective: convince Fazeer Shah to help you
tasks: Proceed to Salt Barrens.
locate Fazeer Shah
convince Fazeer Shah to help you
quest.description:
Centuries ago, a djinni named Fazeer Shah and a djinni named Ezrek Khan quarreled over some trivial matter, and ultimately went to war. They caused considerable damage to the cities, and devastated the land, until the Zeraphi sultan had had enough. He banished them both: one to the desert, and one to... another place; a dark realm.
If you can reach Fazeer Shah, you might be able to convince him to help us.
You must travel out into the Salt Barrens to locate Fazeer Shah.

kbs.name: Dark Alchemist
kbs.description: an evil man who has stolen the energy of three Guardians

plots: the player thought that the Dark Alchemist is after the Guardian Of Air's power: he left the desert for Grunnheim
the Dark Alchemist is powerful enough to destroy the barrier between the player's world and the realm of the Netherim

quest.title: On to Grunnheim!
quest.objective: defeat the Dark Alchemist before he gets to the Clockwork Core
tasks: speak to the Railmaster, and depart to Grunnheim
defeat the Dark Alchemist before he gets to the Clockwork Core
quest.description:
Let us return to the matter of the Dark Alchemist. He has now stolen the energy of three Guardians, and we thought he desired my power as well. But, for some reason, he has left the desert, and is now en route to Grunnheim.
That can only mean that he is bound for the Clockwork Core. With the power he has amassed, he could destroy the barrier between our world and the realm of the Netherim. They would pour through by the millions.
Seek the Railmaster, and depart for Grunnheim as soon as you are able.

kbs.name: Alchemist
kbs.description: a villainous man holding Ordrak's Heart

kbs.name: Ordrak's Heart
kbs.description: a powerful relic infused with the energy stolen from the Guardians

kbs.name: Clockwork Core
kbs.description: a device that upholds the barriers between the worlds

plots: the Clockwork Core can be restored with Ordrak's Heart

quest.title: Into the Dark
quest.objective: defeat the Alchemist and seize Ordrak's Heart before he destroys the Clockwork Core
tasks: overtake the Alchemist before he reaches the Clockwork Core
defeat the Alchemist and seize Ordrak's Heart before he destroys the Clockwork Core
quest.description:
You must overtake the Alchemist before he reaches the Clockwork Core. With the power of Ordrak's Heart, he could destroy the barrier between the worlds, which would mean the end of everything.
You must defeat the Alchemist and seize the Heart. He intends to use it for destruction, but, infused with the energy stolen from the Guardians, it now has the power to restore the Clockwork Core, and repair the damage to the barrier.

plots: the player freed Guardian of Mana from her enslavement by beating some sense into her

quest.title: Freedom!
quest.objective: leave Riftkeep with the Guardian of Mana
tasks: enter the portal to Zeryphesh that the Guardian of Mana opens for you
leave Riftkeep with the Guardian of Mana
quest.description:
Stop. Enough. You have freed me from my enslavement and I am myself once more!
We must leave this place. I will open a portal for you, to Zeryphesh.

kbs.name: Guardian of the Wild
kbs.description: one of the Guardians, drained by the Alchemist

kbs.name: Alchemist
kbs.description: a male pawn of the Netherim

plots: Guardian of the Wild fears that the Alchemist uses the power of the Guardians to open a portal to the Nether Realm, plunging the world into eternal chaos

quest.title: Return to the Enclave
quest.objective: stop the Alchemist before he can drain the two Guardians in the Ossean Wastes
tasks: Arrive at Enclave.
talk to Commander Vale about getting to the Ossean Wastes
stop the Alchemist before he can drain the two Guardians in the Ossean Wastes
quest.description:
I fear the Alchemist is a pawn of the Netherim. With the power of the Guardians, a portal to the Nether Realm could be thrown wide, and the world would be plunged into an age of never-ending torment.
Return to the Enclave immediately. Commander Vale can help you secure passage to the Ossean Wastes, where two of my fellow Guardians can be found. Stop the Alchemist before he can drain them as well!

kbs.name: Hareph
kbs.description: a relieved Zeraphi master of explosives

plots: Hareph and his Zeraphi crew came to the outpost to deal with the Skara: the crew went to investigate the stacks and never came back
Hareph gives the player explosives

quest.title: Shadow of the Skara
quest.objective: help the Zeraphi any way you can
tasks: Find your way to Swarm Point.
search for surviving Zeraphi
help the Zeraphi any way you can
quest.description:
I'm so relieved you have arrived! My crew and I journeyed to this outpost to deal with the increasingly aggressive Skara.
I remained here to fashion additional explosives while my crew investigated the stacks, but they never returned. I have been unable to leave here because of the swarming Skara.
Please take these explosives with you and journey to Swarm Point, and search for any surviving Zeraphi and help them in any way you can!

kbs.name: Watchweald Temple
kbs.description: a temple swept by a plague that transforms priests into Nether-Thralls

plots: after saving the temple priests, the player can focus on aiding the Guardian of the Wild

quest.title: Sudden Outbreaks
quest.objective: save uninfected temple priests from Nether-Thralls
tasks: Go to Watchweald Temple.
find the temple priests
save uninfected temple priests from Nether-Thralls
quest.description:
Thank the Gods you are here! A plague is sweeping through the Watchweald Temple, transforming the temple priests into Nether-Thralls! Several uninfected priests are still inside, trapped by the Nether-Thralls. I can protect them, if I can reach them... or if they can reach me.
Look for places where the temple priests may have hidden from the Nether-Thralls, and send them back here. Once they are all safe, we can focus on aiding the Guardian of the Wild.

kbs.name: Zeryphesh
kbs.description: a town a couple of days travel away from here

plots: the Vanquisher told the Imperial Railmaster that the player is coming to him

quest.title: Onward to Zeryphesh!
quest.objective: travel to Zeryphesh on the Imperial Railmaster's Embercraft
tasks: tell the Imperial Railmaster when your ready to go
travel to Zeryphesh on the Imperial Railmaster's Embercraft
quest.description: You're the one the Vanquisher lady told me about, then? Alright... whenever you're ready to get rollin', we'll get your gear aboard our Embercraft, and we'll set out to Zeryphesh. Shouldn't take us more than a couple of days to get there!

kbs.name: Brood Hive
kbs.description: the innermost part of the Swarm Point

plots: Hareph sent the player to find his demolition crew: he gave the player explosives
some Skara hives seem to be infected with something

quest.title: Blight of the Bugs
quest.objective: discover what has been blighting Skara eggs
tasks: Reach Brood Hive.
find the rigged Skara hives and detonate them
destroy all infected eggs
discover what has been blighting Skara eggs
quest.description:
Ah, Hareph sent you with some explosives. Finally some good news!
Don't bother looking for the rest of the crew - I'm the only one that survived. 
There's something wrong with some of the Skara hives - they seem to be infected. You'll need to locate the rigged hives and detonate them, then descend into the Brood Hive itself and destroy any infected eggs you find. Perhaps you will discover what has been blighting the eggs!
This is a great task, but it must be done. We will all be in your debt.

kbs.name: Jadok
kbs.description: a man who knows the player

kbs.name: Icedeep Caverns
kbs.description: icy caverns where dangerous creatures dwell

kbs.name: Alchemist's Journals
kbs.description: a series of journals written by the Alchemist

plots: Jadok found volume 4 of Alchemist's Journals: it describes entering the mine at Torchlight and retrieving Ordrak's Heart

quest.title: Taking Notes
quest.objective: figure out how to stop the Alchemist
tasks: find the 3 Alchemist's Journals that remain
figure out how to stop the Alchemist
quest.description:
Your arrival is well-timed. I believe I have located the Alchemist's lair, here in the Icedeep Caverns. I found a Journal just inside the entrance; it speaks of entering the mine at Torchlight and retrieving Ordrak's Heart. I intended to look for more, further inside the icy caverns, but the creatures dwelling there now are too much for me.
Finding the rest of the Alchemist's Journals would probably be very helpful in ascertaining how to stop him. The one I saw was volume four, so there are probably three more in the Icedeep Caverns.

kbs.name: Swarm Stacks
kbs.description: Skara's nesting place north of here, out in the Salt Barrens

kbs.name: Hareph
kbs.description: a man, and Jasha's missing friend

plots: Hareph left with a crew to determine why the Skara have become aggressive

quest.title: The Missing Man
quest.objective: find out what happened to Hareph
tasks: Make your way to Swarm Stacks.
find Hareph
find out what happened to Hareph
quest.description:
If you're heading out into the Salt Barrens, could you find out what happened to my companion Hareph?
He left with a crew to determine why the Skara have become so aggressive lately, but no one has come back.
If you travel North to the Swarm Stacks, you should be able to find him - or at least what happened to him.

plots: the player told Jessa that her father is dead

quest.title: The Locket
quest.objective: bring the Locket to Jessa
tasks: find the Locket
bring the Locket to Jessa
quest.description:
Oh, my poor father - I cannot believe that he is gone! Dear father...
Please try to retrieve the Locket - it belonged to my father. I cannot bear to think that it is lost in this foul place, corroding away in swamp water. He must have dropped it somewhere around here...

kbs.name: Temple
relations: the catacombs, where dark things live

kbs.name: the catacombs, where dark things live
kbs.description: the catacombs, where dark things live

kbs.name: Wraithring
kbs.description: an ancient artifact which is said to have power over death

plots: Jessa and her father came here to recover the Wraithring: they wanted to bring it to the Temple for study
Jessa's father wears a locket around his neck

quest.title: The Wraithring
quest.objective: discover Jessa's father's fate
tasks: Proceed to the catacombs, where dark things live.
find Jessa's father
discover Jessa's father's fate
quest.description:
Please, traveler! Wait a moment! I am Jessa - a traveler from Estheria. My father and I came to this place to recover an ancient artifact - the Wraithring - which is said to have power over death itself. We sought to bring it to the Temple for study.
My father entered the catacombs while I tended our camp - but he has not returned, and there are dark things stirring below.
Please - I only ask that you discover his fate - perhaps he is wounded and only needs aid to escape!
If the worst comes to pass... he wears a locket around his neck, and you will know him by it.

kbs.name: Lord Taldimut
kbs.description: the player's old friend, who promised the player a a greater reward if the player came to visit him in Ossean Wastes

kbs.name: Celestial Armory
kbs.description: Lord Taldimut's armory that houses some of the finest weapons

kbs.name: Armory Portal
kbs.description: a hidden portal to the Celestial Armory

plots: Ezrohir have the Celestial Armory under siege

quest.title: The Key to Victory
quest.objective: help Lord Taldimut gather up weapons and armor from the Celestial Armory without Ezrohir noticing
tasks: Arrive at Celestial Armory.
use the Golden Gear to get inside the Celestial Armory, and activate the Armory Portal
help Lord Taldimut gather up weapons and armor from the Celestial Armory without Ezrohir noticing
quest.description:
It's good to see you again, my friend! I know that I promised you a greater reward, should you come to visit... but that was before I returned to the Ossean Wastes and found the Celestial Armory under siege by Ezrohir.
What if I give you your choice of artifacts from the Armory? The Celestial Armory houses some of the finest weapons in the world! You have but to use the Golden Gear to get inside, then activate the Armory Portal, which will allow us to gather up the weapons and armor safely... with the Ezrohir none the wiser!

kbs.name: Golden Gear
kbs.description: important object related to defense of Zeryphesh

plots: Lord Taldimut has been studying the crests

quest.title: The Lost Key
quest.objective: help Lord Taldimut bring the Golden Gear to Zeryphesh
tasks: Travel to Whispering Cave.
recover the Golden Gear
help Lord Taldimut bring the Golden Gear to Zeryphesh
quest.description: I have continued studying the crests, and I am more convinced than ever that the Golden Gear is hidden in the the Whispering Cave. If you can retrieve it, I can bring it back to Zeryphesh, to aid in the city's defense against the Ezrohir siege.

kbs.name: Lord Taldimut
kbs.description: a Zeraphi ambassador, the leader of the Zeraphi envoy

kbs.name: Golden Gear
kbs.description: important object related to defense of Zeraphi

kbs.name: crests, created by the Estherians, together form a map that shows the exact location of the Golden Gear
kbs.description: crests, created by the Estherians, together form a map that shows the exact location of the Golden Gear

plots: the player saved Lord Taldimut and his Zeraphi envoy from goblins
Grand Regent Eldrayn allowed Lord Taldimut and his Zeraphi envoy to search for the Golden Gear

quest.title: The Zeraphi Envoy
quest.objective: help Lord Taldimut narrow down the location of the Golden Gear
tasks: find the 3 crests for Lord Taldimut
help Lord Taldimut narrow down the location of the Golden Gear
quest.description:
My friend, thank you for coming to our aid. I am Lord Taldimut, the leader of this Zeraphi envoy, sent to procure the Estherians' aid in our upcoming war with the Ezrohir. Grand Regent Eldrayn gave us leave to search the Frosted Hills for the Golden Gear, and we had narrowed our search to these chilly hills before we were assaulted by these goblins.
Now we are too injured to continue our search. Can you aid us? The exact location of the Golden Gear is long forgotten, but the Estherians created a map from three crests. If you can find those, I can interpret the map and find the Gear! Search the Frosted Hills for the crests. Bring them to me, and I will reward you, on behalf of the Zeraphi people.

kbs.name: Zeryphesh
kbs.description: a large city inhabited by the Zeraphi

kbs.name: Commander Muzaffar
kbs.description: the military leader of the Zeraphi, captured by the Ezrohir

plots: the Ezrohir are preparing to assault Zeryphesh

quest.title: A High-Value Target
quest.objective: prevent the Ezrohir from interrogating Commander Muzaffar
tasks: Arrive at Ossean Wastes.
rescue Commander Muzaffar from the Ezrohir, before they take him to Riftkeep
prevent the Ezrohir from interrogating Commander Muzaffar
quest.description:
Greetings, my friend! Welcome to Zeryphesh! I am Malik Vosh. I speak for the Zeraphi.
As you know, the Ezrohir are preparing to assault our city. Our military leader, Commander Muzaffar, has apparently been captured by the Ezrohir, out in the Ossean Wastes. They'll have sent for soldiers to take their prisoners back to their stronghold. Once they get him to Riftkeep, they'll identify him quickly enough, and then they'll interrogate him until they know everything about our defenses.
I believe you're going out to the Ossean Wastes, the vast desert. Please, rescue Muzaffar. We need him.

plots: the player freed Malo from bandits

quest.title: An Enchanter in Chains
quest.objective: get your reward from Malo
tasks: Arrive at Estherian Enclave.
go see Malo
get your reward from Malo
quest.description:
Oh, thank you so much!  Here I was, afraid I'd never enchant anything ever again!
I'm was on my way to the Estherian Enclave when these brigands ambushed me. Once I gather my wits, I'll head over there. Come by and see me, if you get a chance! I'll have a reward for you.

plots: the player is a friend of the Zeraphi

quest.title: The Crab Trap
quest.objective: stop the Ezrohir from getting scrap metal from the crabs
tasks: Arrive at Dead Shoals.
prevent the Crab King from finishing his negotiations with the Ezrohir
stop the Ezrohir from getting scrap metal from the crabs
quest.description:
Your timing is perfect, my friend! Below us, in the Dead Shoals, the Crab King is negotiating with a representative of the Ezrohir, to provide the Ezrohir with a huge cache of scrap metal they have salvaged. The Ezrohir will use that scrap to forge more arms to bring against us! They must be stopped!
I beg you: Go down into the Dead Shoals and prevent the Crab King from concluding his negotiations with the Ezrohir! I realize this is not much in the way of a reward, but this potion is all I can offer.

kbs.name: Corrupted Crypt
kbs.description: a crypt crawling with the Sturmbeorn in the Path of the Honored Dead

plots: the player has helped Estherians before

quest.title: The Scroll of Anom-Irek
quest.objective: retrieve the Scroll of Anom-Irek, and return to Miamin
tasks: Make your way to Corrupted Crypt.
find the Scroll of Anom-Irek in a vault
retrieve the Scroll of Anom-Irek, and return to Miamin
quest.description:
You must be the human the other Estherians are speaking of. I am glad to have met you. I have been sent on a quest to recover the Scroll of Anom-Irek, stored in a vault in the Corrupted Crypt, here. The scroll should allow us to heal the Estherians who have been corrupted by evil spirits. Unfortunately, the Sturmbeorn have already entered the crypt, and I have been unable to get past them.
Can I ask you to attempt to retrieve the scroll? I will wait here in the Path of the Honored Dead for your return. Should you succeed, I will see what I can do to provide you with some equipment more fitting a hero of your stature.

kbs.name: Professor Stoker
relations: next to the entrance to the Broken Mines

kbs.name: next to the entrance to the Broken Mines
kbs.description: next to the entrance to the Broken Mines

plots: the Alchemist went into the Broken Mines: he is nearing his goal

quest.title: On the Alchemist's Trail
quest.objective: stop the Alchemist
tasks: Arrive at Broken Mines.
go after the Alchemist
stop the Alchemist
quest.description:
This is the only entrance to the Broken Mines that we've found, so the Alchemist is almost certainly in there. That probably means he's near his goal, whatever that is... and that means he'll do everything he can to keep you from stopping him. He'll be even more desperate, more dangerous.
I don't know what we'll encounter in there.

plots: the player brought parts of the 4000 Model to Professor Stoker

quest.title: Robot Parts
quest.objective: talk to the 4000 Model
tasks: let Professor Stoker put the parts of the 4000 Model back together
talk to the 4000 Model
quest.description: What do we have here?  Wow, this is a 4000 Model robot! These are quite old - this one appears to have had a lot of work done to it. Not sure why it's in pieces - why don't we find out! Let me just put these together for you and we'll see what it has to say for itself.

kbs.name: Great Door
kbs.description: a door that leads to the Clockwork Core

plots: the Alchemist came through the Imperial Camp an hour ago: he went through the Great Door and sealed it behind him
the Great Door leads to the Clockwork Core

quest.title: Some Assembly Required
quest.objective: open the Great Door
tasks: Proceed to Scrapworks.
find a power source for the dwarven automaton
open the Great Door
quest.description:
I wish you had gotten here sooner! The Alchemist came through here about an hour ago. He laid waste to the camp and then went through the Great Door, there - sealed it shut behind him.
We believe that door leads to the Clockwork Core. We've been unable to open it ourselves, but we know how in theory. See that dwarven automaton? It's designed to open the door, but it's missing its Power Source. There should be one in the Scrapworks, but it was too dangerous for us to enter. Perhaps you will have more luck.

plots: the player brought a power source to Professor Stoker: it is completely drained

quest.title: The Sundered Battlefield
quest.objective: recharge the power source, and return to Professor Stoker to install the power source in the automaton
tasks: Go to Rivenskull Pass.
Go to Sundered Battlefield.
reach the the Sundered Battlefield
find the Emberworks on the far side of the Sundered Battlefield
recharge the power source, and return to Professor Stoker to install the power source in the automaton
quest.description:
Oh, no... I was afraid of this! The Power Source is completely drained! This is going to be more difficult than I'd anticipated. This is only a minor setback. We knew about these Power Sources from our explorations of the Emberworks, on the far side of the Sundered Battlefield. We found machines there that the ancient dwarves once used to craft them. If you can reach the Emberworks, it should be child's play to recharge it.
You'll have to make your way through Rivenskull Pass to reach the battlefield. Once you've charged the Power Source, come back here, and we'll install it in the Automaton.

kbs.name: Robot Eye
kbs.description: an arrogant person guarding the door

kbs.name: Thiss
kbs.description: a great spectral dragon who stole the Crown from Robot Eye

plots: the player told Robot Eye that the player wants to go through the door

quest.title: Enter the Door
quest.objective: recover the Crown from Thiss, and bring it to Robot Eye
tasks: Make your way to Forgotten Halls.
find Thiss
recover the Crown from Thiss, and bring it to Robot Eye
quest.description:
You want through THIS door? Ha! Well, it's not as simple as that. Everything has a price - you must know that by now.
If you can solve a problem for us, we will solve a problem for you by letting you through the door. Thiss, the great Spectral Dragon, has kept something of ours for many long years. We would like it back - and you will get it for us, oh yes.
There is a Crown, a... family heirloom that he stole from us. He will not give it up easily, of course. But this door is im-PENETRABLE - so you've got a much better chance with Thiss than you do waiting around here.
You can find Thiss in the Forgotten Halls... good luck! You're going to need it.

kbs.name: Sphinx
kbs.description: a statue that speaks in riddles

kbs.name: Vaults Forsaken
kbs.description: a foul dungeon filled with Ezrohir

plots: the Ezrohir captured the Guardian of Mana again: they stripped away her magic and enslaved her

quest.title: Artifice of Evil
quest.objective: save the Guardian of Mana, and Zeryphesh
tasks: Find your way to Vaults Forsaken.
find the Guardian of Mana
save the Guardian of Mana, and Zeryphesh
quest.description:
The Ezrohir prepare today for war
Their legions number in the score.
Their Alchemy and Artifice suffice
To capture Mana... not once but twice.
Imprisoned in the Vaults Forsaken:
Subdued, enslaved, her magic taken.
Forced to lead their troops in battle
From Guardian... to so much chattel.
The Ezrohir have Mana enslaved
But there's still hope; she might yet be saved.
The enemy lie in this foul creche.
Save the Guardian... save Zeryphesh.

kbs.name: Fungal Caves
kbs.description: the only place where Blue Boletus grow

kbs.name: Black Blindness
kbs.description: a disease peculiar to the Ponya, which dims the vision and makes speech impossible permanently after two weeks, can only be cured with Blue Boletus flesh

plots: Sprocket traveled here from his home village to find Blue Boletus for his cousins who are afflicted with the Black Blindness

quest.title: The Blue Boletus
quest.objective: bring Blue Boletus flesh to Sprocket
tasks: Make your way to Fungal Caves.
get Blue Boletus flesh
bring Blue Boletus flesh to Sprocket
quest.description:
Oh, please - perhaps you can help us! On the advice of our village's healer, I have traveled here seeking a cure. My cousins are afflicted with the Black Blindness, an ailment peculiar to our race.
Black Blindness is an insidious disease - it dims the vision and makes speech impossible, and if not treated within a few weeks, can become permanent. The only known treatment is produced from the flesh of the Blue Boletus - a species of mushroom creatures that grows only in the Fungal Caves near here. I find that they are, ah, BIGGER than I had anticipated, however.
Perhaps YOU could retrieve some Blue Boletus flesh for us? We would be forever in your debt!

plots: the player showed Trill-Bot 4000 a robot component

quest.title: Getting One's Bearings
quest.objective: find the Azimuthoscope
tasks: Travel to dungeon.
follow the trail of Trill-Bot 4000's parts
find the Azimuthoscope
quest.description:
I believe you have found one of my missing components! There appears to be a trail of them, leading toward that dungeon.
If you follow the trail of my Parts, it might lead you to my Azimuthoscope: the component I need to direct you to another treasure trove!

plots: the player found Trill-Bot 4000's body, which stores his memories

quest.title: Loose Connections
quest.objective: reacquire the rest of Trill-Bot 4000's components
tasks: Reach somewhere nearby.
find the Cognition Linkage
reacquire the rest of Trill-Bot 4000's components
quest.description:
It appears you have found my body. Very good. This is where my memories are stored … including the locations of multiple caches of treasure. I could share these with you, if you would help me reacquire the rest of my components.
We should begin with my Cognition Linkage. Without that, I won't be able to do much more than repeat this message. My sensors tell me it is somewhere nearby. Find it and reinstall it, and I will direct you to one of those treasure troves.

kbs.name: Trill
kbs.description: a great bard who received a blow to the head in Torchlight

kbs.name: Torchlight
kbs.description: a city in Veras that was destroyed

plots: Trill is known throughout Veras: from Torchlight to Redhaven

quest.title: The Three Sisters
quest.objective: find the 3 sisters
tasks: investigate a tree trunk in an area full of spiders
find the 3 sisters
quest.description:
Greetings! I am the great bard Trill. You've heard of me of course, my talent is known throughout all of Veras. From Torchlight to Redhaven they sing of my.. songs.
Torchlight... did something happen there? I feel a bit... Ah, nevermind. I recognize this place!
The spiders called, the Sisters three, the old trunk yawning wide,
Through ancient halls, dark ancestry, they met their fates inside.
An apt verse, you'll agree. I wrote it myself of course.
The rest of the song eludes me... Leniency please! Of course such a lapse is unforgivable in a great bard such as myself, but I feel a bit.. off.
Still, even that bare fragment of verse can lead you to glory. Go forth, brave warrior, and slay the mighty beasts! Whatever they may be...

kbs.name: Officer
kbs.description: a military officer working for the Professor

plots: the Professor sent the player after the power source in the Scrapworks: the Officer and his troop are on the same mission
the Officer sent his troop to the Abandoned Sawmill: he has not heard from them

quest.title: The Cave-In
quest.objective: clear the way to the Scrapworks
tasks: Reach Abandoned Sawmill.
find dynamite
clear the way to the Scrapworks
quest.description:
So, the Professor sent you after the Power Source? We were on the same mission, but the only way to the Scrapworks is through that pile of rock.
I know the Abandoned Sawmill used to have plenty of explosives from when the place was still in operation - a little bit of dynamite would probably get the job done here.
I sent my troop after it, but haven't heard a thing. If you can head up there and get that dynamite, we could all pass through and get the Professor what he needs.

plots: two Sturmbeorn blacksmiths are making suits of armor for Warbeasts

quest.title: The Warbeast Armory
quest.objective: steal the armor schematics
tasks: Proceed to Temple Steppes.
get inside the Sturmbeorn makeshift smithy
steal the armor schematics
quest.description:
If you're going out to the Temple Steppes, I could use your help. The Sturmbeorn have set up a makeshift smithy there, and they have two blacksmiths making suits of armor for wild Warbeasts they've captured.
Those Sturmbeorn seem to be working from schematics, but they keep them under lock and key. Do you think you might be able to get in there and grab the armor schematics?

kbs.name: Sundered Battlefield
kbs.description: an ancient battlefield in the north

kbs.name: Cacklespit
kbs.description: a female witch who has been harassing the player

kbs.name: Fade
kbs.description: a male spirit, who may want something for his help

plots: the player helped Widget and his cousins in the past

quest.title: Fade's Passage
quest.objective: ask Fade to open the hidden passage to Cacklespit's realm
tasks: Head to Sundered Battlefield.
search for the shrines that mark Fade's resting place
ask Fade to open the hidden passage to Cacklespit's realm
quest.description:
Since you helped us in our time of need, we have been searching for a way to return the favor.
It seems you've met with some unexpected trouble from Cacklespit the witch. I've done a little research, and if you'd like to find her, I think I can help!
From the lore I've been able to piece together, there is a secret way to her hidden realm. The spirit, Fade, can open the way - but he may ask for something in return. You'll have to journey to the Sundered Battlefield in the north. Search for the shrines that mark Fade's resting place. I hope this helps you on your way! I'll keep researching in hopes of finding more information to help you.

plots: Albert gives the player Rufie's chew toy to draw out Rufie

quest.title: Albert and His Dog
quest.objective: bring Rufie to Albert
tasks: find Rufie
bring Rufie to Albert
quest.description:
Hi! I'm Albert.
'Scuse me. I ever so sowwy to bother, but could you help me? I've lost my little dog Rufie and I can't find him. He's probably ever so scared wight now. Poor Rufie isn't used to strange places an' people. You're sure to know him when you see him, 'cuz he's just the cutest little thing. Here, take this as well. His favorite chew toy, it is. He'll know you're a friend if you have it in your hands.
I have a small reward for you: it's another of his chew things, but we can get more where we're going.

kbs.name: Alatos Thuibuld
kbs.description: the leader of the Thieves' Guild

kbs.name: Oberan's Estate
kbs.description: a house inhabited by Shandalar's daughters

plots: Shandalar lives inside a Halruaan skyship
Shandalar knows how to produce Halruaan skyships: Shandalar plans to sell the knowledge of building Halruaan skyships to Grand Duchess Liia Jannath
Halruaans do not want others to obtain their skyships
spellbook, statuette, and artifact fragment are the ingredients needed to keep the skyships aloft: Shandalar's daughters have them

quest.title: Alatos and the Thieves' Guild
quest.objective: steal spellbook, statuette, and artifact fragment, and bring them to Alatos Thuibuld
tasks: Go to Oberan's Estate.
go to Oberan's Estate
steal spellbook, statuette, and artifact fragment, and bring them to Alatos Thuibuld
quest.description:
I am Alatos Thuibuld, though I thank you not to mention that too often.
A local wizard by the name of Shandalar makes his home in a moored Halruaan skyship. It would appear that he has the knowledge to reproduce these flying marvels and is currently organizing the sale of the recipe to Grand Duchess Liia Jannath. He has drawn up a set of rituals and has procured an artifact fragment and an ancient statuette vital to the spell that keeps the ships aloft. These he has divided amongst his daughters until the deal is to proceed. I have been contacted by a representative of the Halruaans, and they have no wish to see scores of flying ships manufactured in every port. You are to infiltrate the place of exchange that is known as Oberan's Estate, steal the ingredients, and return here with them. Simple enough.
You would be well paid. Enough gold to give you a backache and, if I am well pleased, mayhaps a magical weapon or two. Perhaps a little more, perhaps a little less. It entirely depends upon your performance.

plots: Arkion was Nemphre's lover

quest.title: Arkion's Amulet
quest.objective: steal Arkion's amulet and bring it to Nemphre
tasks: find Arkion's amulet
steal Arkion's amulet and bring it to Nemphre
quest.description:
Mmm, be a sweet one. Could you do a favor for Nemphre?
An old lover of mine has followed me here to the city and has been threatening me with some very dark magic. His name is Arkion and, if you could just get a certain amulet of his to me, perhaps there are a few things I could do for you? Such as giving you a Scroll of Vampiric Touch, mmn?

plots: Arkion and Nemphre used to be lovers
Arkion wants Nemphre's Onyx Ring
Nemphre wants Arkion's Bloodstone Amulet

quest.title: Arkion and Nemphre
quest.objective: steal Arkion's Bloodstone Amulet and Nemphre's Onyx Ring, and bring them to Ordulinian
tasks: find Arkion's Bloodstone Amulet and Nemphre's Onyx Ring
steal Arkion's Bloodstone Amulet and Nemphre's Onyx Ring, and bring them to Ordulinian
quest.description:
Ah, fair adventurers, I'm Ordulinian.
The roads of this fair city are lined with fools, are they not? Two of the greatest are Arkion and Nemphre, necromancers grown bitter over lost love. Alas, but they use petty trinkets as their excuse for enmity. Nemphre covets Arkion's Bloodstone Amulet and Arkion dreams of her Onyx Ring. Steal those trinkets and bring them to me and perhaps those two fools can at last find peace.
For your troubles I will give you a Cloak of Non-Detection. It may be of some use to you in the future.

kbs.name: Unshey
relations: to the south of the Friendly Arm Inn

kbs.name: to the south of the Friendly Arm Inn
kbs.description: to the south of the Friendly Arm Inn

plots: Unshey had to bargain her new Girdle of Piercing for her life

quest.title: A Rogue Ogre
quest.objective: bring the Girdle of Piercing to Unshey
tasks: Arrive at to the south of the Friendly Arm Inn.
kill the ogre holding the Girdle of Piercing
bring the Girdle of Piercing to Unshey
quest.description:
Hey, I'm Unshey, an aspiring writer.
Have you heard? There's a rogue ogre with a belt fetish to the south of the Friendly Arm Inn. I had to bargain my new girdle of piercing for my life out there. Wasn't even interested in an autographed copy of my book. Hey, if you can get that belt back to me, I'd be mighty grateful.
You'll get 95 gold pieces for your trouble, and a new history book I've just completed.

plots: Delsvirftanyon sells things for the tourists in the Durlag's Tower, but bandits on the road keep people away
Delsvirftanyon has ward tokens of all shapes and sizes

quest.title: A Curious Business Proposal
quest.objective: buy everything from Delsvirftanyon for 500 gold
tasks: give Delsvirftanyon 500 gold
buy everything from Delsvirftanyon for 500 gold
quest.description:
I'm Delsvirftanyon, a merchant by trade.
I sell the small and shinies for the tourists in the Durlag's Tower but there are none now there! Bandits on the roads keep the people off and away so I'm stuck with all this stock I am. Ward tokens I have of all shapes and size. Some I found by elven ruin and some I made myself I made. Maybe some good or maybe all bad but don't they all look pretty? I tell you what I will. I'll sell you everything I have you buy for low low price of 500 gold is all. Then I go home where they appreciate a bauble shine.
Buy or no and walk the walk?

plots: Tazok has been going to the Cloakwood regularly
there are important documents in the chest here

quest.title: A Hidden Base in the Cloakwood
quest.objective: investigate Tazok and his group of bandits
tasks: Proceed to Cloakwood.
go to Cloakwood
investigate Tazok and his group of bandits
quest.description:
This whole thing is dirty to the core, that's what I know! These aren't your ordinary bandits here. Tazok's been making regular visits to the Cloakwood, so that's where I'd start if I were you. There are some documents in that chest that might be worth taking a look at, too.
Now go step on some toes, all right? And you can tell them Ender Sai sent you.

plots: Fuller knows the player

quest.title: An Errand for Fuller
quest.objective: bring a quarrel of crossbow bolts to Fuller
tasks: Arrive at Candlekeep Inn.
buy crossbow bolts from Winthrop
bring a quarrel of crossbow bolts to Fuller
quest.description:
Hey kid, it's me, Fuller.
I need a quarrel of crossbow bolts. If you could get some off Winthrop at the inn, I'll reimburse you. there'll be a dagger in it for you too. My father killed a hobgoblin with it once, many years ago. Stabbed him right in the back, he did. It ain't no broadsword, but it'll do in a pinch.

plots: Mad Arcand the Stinking's ring is cursed

quest.title: Arcand the Mad
quest.objective: bring Mad Arcand the Stinking's ring to him
tasks: Travel to pirate ship by the ocean.
find Mad Arcand the Stinking's ring
bring Mad Arcand the Stinking's ring to him
quest.description:
I like you, yes I do (wertle, wertle, wertle, wooo...) and I know of a way to make you like me too (wertle, wertle, wertle-wooooo...).
Down by the ocean, down by the sea, there's a pirate ship waiting for you and for me. Bring me what's in it, but don't ever wear it, or sure enough, soon enough, you'll wertle too... A beautiful ring! Where to get it? (Most likely quite near where exactly I put it...) Wertle, oh wertle, oh dear wertle-wooo... wertle, oh wertle, oh woo...
Oh, I know what you're thinking of Mad Arcand the Stinking who takes what you give him and gives not in return. So there is this bottle, but please don't topple or (wertle, poor wertle), you'll surely get burned.

kbs.name: Brielbara
kbs.description: a female mage of minor power

kbs.name: Namara
kbs.description: a baby and Brielbara's only daughter

plots: Yago has cursed Namara: Brielbara can undo the curse with Yago's spellbook

quest.title: Brielbara's Baby
quest.objective: bring Yago's spellbook to Brielbara
tasks: Head to Low Lantern.
steal Yago's spellbook
bring Yago's spellbook to Brielbara
quest.description:
Travelers! I am Brielbara, a mage of minor power.
I'll pay you 200 gold, not much for heroic adventurers, but all that I have.
An evil mage has laid a curse upon my only child, Namara. She is slowly wasting away and, without help, she'll die. The mage who did this is named Yago, and I'm sure that he possesses the remedy to the curse. Would you track him down for me, please? He's been staying at a place called the Low Lantern. It's the playground for the wicked and depraved, a ship where prostitutes ply their trade. All I want you to do is find him and take his spellbook. I have enough magical skill to reverse the curse if I had the formula for his spell.

plots: Mr. Colquetle's son and his wife traveled away and went missing

quest.title: Colquetle's Family
quest.objective: find out what happened to Mr. Colquetle's son and his wife
tasks: find Mr. Colquetle's son and his wife
find out what happened to Mr. Colquetle's son and his wife
quest.description:
What cruel whim of the fates controls this torment of me?!
I, Mr. Colquetle, have heard nothing from my son and his wife for nigh unto a week now, and all else pales in importance until I do. I should have known better than to allow his travel in these dangerous times.

plots: Dryad of the Cloud Peaks dies if her ancient oak dies

quest.title: Dryad of the Cloud Peaks
quest.objective: save Dryad of the Cloud Peaks' ancient oak from dying
tasks: stop a pair of people from attacking Dryad of the Cloud Peaks' ancient oak
save Dryad of the Cloud Peaks' ancient oak from dying
quest.description:
Please, kind spirits, a wondrous ancient oak is in peril. It is the tree to which I am bonded! If it dies, I, Dryad of the Cloud Peaks, die.
It is about to be attacked by two who would defile the majesty of nature. They have avoided my charms and must be stopped before irreparable harm is done. Would you heed my plea?
There is a potion that might help you on your journeys.

plots: Nathan and his friends disappeared some days ago

quest.title: Farmer Brun's Missing Son
quest.objective: find Nathan
tasks: Go to to the west.
inspect tracks
find Nathan
quest.description:
I beseech thee, kind soul, please help.
I'm farmer Brun. It's strange happenings at my farm, and I've not the strength I once had. I've nothing to offer, and even if I did I doubt such as you would have need of it. My son Nathan and his friends went looking for our missing cattle, then they just up and disappeared! Been gone for days now and, with all the bandits around, who knows what's happened. I don't know where they were heading, but I saw some sort o' tracks to the west.
Please find Nathan. I can't afford to keep the farm without my son.

plots: Firebead Elvenhair left his identify scroll to Tethtoril

quest.title: Firebead's Scroll
quest.objective: bring Firebead Elvenhair's identify scroll to him
tasks: Proceed to the inner grounds.
get Firebead Elvenhair's identify scroll from Tethtoril
bring Firebead Elvenhair's identify scroll to him
quest.description:
I, Firebead Elvenhair, have a small errand for you.
I left an identify scroll with Tethtoril, in the inner grounds. He should be done examining it by now, so if you could fetch it for me, I'd be grateful. I have a great use for those types of scrolls.
Allow me to cast a little spell on you as a reward. It will protect you from any evil you might meet tonight.

kbs.name: Ghorak
relations: behind a painting at the Three Old Kegs

kbs.name: The Lady's Hall
relations: behind a painting at the Three Old Kegs

kbs.name: behind a painting at the Three Old Kegs
kbs.description: behind a painting at the Three Old Kegs

kbs.name: Kereph
relations: behind a painting at the Three Old Kegs

plots: Ghorak was cursed with an illness for killing his brother
Agnasia knows how to cure Ghorak

quest.title: Ghorak the Diseased
quest.objective: take Kereph's skull to Agnasia
tasks: Make your way to behind a painting at the Three Old Kegs.
find Kereph's skull
take Kereph's skull to Agnasia
quest.description:
For your own health and that of your children, come no closer.
I, Ghorak, was cursed with this fell disease as punishment for my wickedness... No, your potions and magics are of little use. The only way to cure this sickness is to right the wrongs of the past. Behind a painting at the Three Old Kegs, you will find the skull of my brother, Kereph. Take it to Agnasia in The Lady's Hall. She will know what to do with it.

kbs.name: Gurke
kbs.description: an old man who is tired of hearing jokes about losing his cloak in Cloakwood

plots: a tasloi stole Gurke's cloak in Cloakwood

quest.title: Gurke's Cloak
quest.objective: return Gurke's cloak to him
tasks: Arrive at Cloakwood.
find the tasloi holding Gurke's cloak
return Gurke's cloak to him
quest.description:
Old Gurke had his famous cloak stolen right off his back by a batch of paltry tasloi.
Yeah, yeah, it's old news and if you make one crack about the Cloakwood being an appropriate place to lose it, at least, I'll put your liver on the menu. Now move on and let the next people in line have their laugh.
However, if you happen to find my cloak, I'll give you 280 gold pieces for returning it.

plots: half-ogres wounded Bjornin

quest.title: Half-ogres Near Beregost
quest.objective: kill the half-ogres who battled Bjornin
tasks: Head to the mountains south-southwest of Beregost.
find half-ogres
kill the half-ogres who battled Bjornin
quest.description:
I'm still healing from my latest encounters. They did quite a number on me, those half-ogres. There's a band of them fortifying themselves in the mountains south-southwest of here...
If you could give them a taste of justice by testing your steel against them, that would do me, Bjornin, proud.
In an effort to encourage such deeds of righteousness, allow me to present to you this shield as a reward upon your return...

kbs.name: Hull
relations: on the right side of the barracks

kbs.name: on the right side of the barracks
kbs.description: on the right side of the barracks

kbs.name: Dreppin
relations: on the right side of the barracks

kbs.name: Nessa
relations: on the right side of the barracks

plots: Hull knows the player
there is an antidote in Hull's chest: Dreppin needs an antidote for Nessa

quest.title: Hull's Sword
quest.objective: fetch Hull's sword
tasks: Go to on the right side of the barracks.
find Hull's sword in his chest
fetch Hull's sword
quest.description:
Hey, kid, it's me, Hull.
I woke late this morning and left my sword in the barracks before going on duty. If you want to get it for me, it's in the chest at the foot of my bed on the right side of the barracks. Quick now, before the Gatewarden catches me without it.
You'll also find an antidote there. I think Dreppin needs one for old Nessa.
You'll get 20 gold pieces for saving my skin from the Chief.

plots: Joseph wears a greenstone wedding ring on his left hand
Joseph went missing in the mines
men have disappeared in the mines before

quest.title: Joseph's Wife
quest.objective: investigate Joseph's fate for his wife
tasks: Proceed to the mines.
find Joseph
investigate Joseph's fate for his wife
quest.description:
My husband is missing in the mines. All I know about the mines are that men keep on disappearing in their hellish depths.
