My husband is one of the miners, but he hasn't been home for weeks. His name is Joseph, and he wears his wedding ring on his left hand. It's a greenstone ring.
Please, find him and tell me how he is doing!

plots: Laerta and Louise are twin sisters

quest.title: Laerta and Louise
quest.objective: get rid of a bogeyman that scares Laerta and Louise every night
tasks: Reach Laerta and Louise's window.
find the bogeyman
get rid of a bogeyman that scares Laerta and Louise every night
quest.description:
Hi! I'm Laerta. That's my twin sister, Louise.
Mom and Dad don't believe us, but there's a bogeyman that comes and looks in our window every night. We're real glad we're twins because, if there were only one of us, then there'd be no one to hold on to when we get scared. Scare away the bogeyman, would you?
Mom says to give this scroll as a reward. I think it's supposed to protect you from any other bogeypeople you find.

kbs.name: Beregost
relations: Landrin's house in Beregost, west of the Jovial Juggler Inn

kbs.name: Landrin's house in Beregost, west of the Jovial Juggler Inn
kbs.description: Landrin's house in Beregost, west of the Jovial Juggler Inn

plots: Landrin gives the player antidote potions against poison

quest.title: Landrin's Possessions
quest.objective: deal with the spider infestation in Landrin's cellar
tasks: Travel to Landrin's house in Beregost, west of the Jovial Juggler Inn.
kill spiders, and fetch Landrin's husband's boots and Landrin's bottle of wine
deal with the spider infestation in Landrin's cellar
quest.description:
Hey, I'm Landrin.
I've got an infestation of poisonous spiders in my cellar in Beregost. You'll know the house when you see it: just to the west of the Jovial Juggler Inn.
Here, take these potions with you. They're antidotes against the poison.
Keep whatever you don't use and I'll give you an extra 120 gold pieces if you bring back my husband's old boots that he keeps down there. If you bring back one of their bodies and my ol' bottle of wine as well, I might toss in a little something extra too.

plots: Marek has poisoned the player: the player has 10 days to live
Lothander wants to help the player get an antidote to the poison
Lothander was forced to work for the Iron Throne with a geas

quest.title: Marek and Lothander
quest.objective: get an antidote before you die of Marek's poison
tasks: Head to the market square.
talk to Haspur who can possibly reverse Lothander's geas
get an antidote before you die of Marek's poison
quest.description:
I am Lothander.
I do not wish you harm. My partner, Marek, has poisoned you. While you slept, he slipped a slow-acting magical poison into your food. You have about ten days to live. Common priest spells won't help you. Only one thing can, and that's the antidote. I can help you find it, if you help me first.
My problem is this: I don't work for the Iron Throne because I wish to but rather because I have been forced. I have been enspelled with a geas. If I do not obey everything that Marek orders of me the spell will take effect and I shall waste away. I need a way to rid myself of the spell. I know of a diviner at the market square who may have the answers I seek, but I don't have the money to pay him. Will you help me?

kbs.name: Melicamp of Beregost
kbs.description: a mage adept in the mystical arts

kbs.name: High Hedge
kbs.description: a tower directly to the west of Beregost

kbs.name: Thalantyr
kbs.description: a powerful mage, and Melicamp of Beregost's master

plots: Melicamp of Beregost was turned into a chicken by a spell gone wrong
Melicamp of Beregost will nest in the player's pack

quest.title: Melicamp the Chicken
quest.objective: turn Melicamp of Beregost back into a human from a chicken
tasks: Go to High Hedge.
talk to Thalantyr
turn Melicamp of Beregost back into a human from a chicken
quest.description:
Buc-becaw! HELLLLP-becaw! I am "no ordinary talking chicken," and I am in need of your *cluck* help. I am Melicamp of Beregost, a *cluck* mage adept in the mystical arts.
A... misread... incantation seems to be *cluck* the source of my troubling form. 'Tis been over a month since I *cluck* uttered a polymorph spell, and I simply cannot return to my normal *cluck* form!
There is a tower directly to the west of *cluck* Beregost, about which can be found the mage Thalantyr. I am his apprentice, and I am certain he will *cluck* aid me. I'll just nestle in your pack until we get there.

plots: Roe went on a business trip to Amn

quest.title: Mirianne's Husband
quest.objective: tell Mirianne whether you found information about Roe or not
tasks: Make your way to the southern roads.
find information about Roe
tell Mirianne whether you found information about Roe or not
quest.description:
My husband had to make a sudden business trip to Amn and I'm so worried for him.
"Mirianne," he always said, "Mirianne, who knows the road better than old Roe?" But the highways just aren't as safe as they once were and there hasn't been a messenger from Amn here in months.
Could you keep your eyes open along the southern roads and let me know if you find anything?

kbs.name: Euric
kbs.description: Nadine's youngest son, who knows how to take care of himself

plots: Euric ran away from home
Nadine gives the player a good luck talisman

quest.title: Nadine and Euric
quest.objective: give Euric a good luck talisman and return to Nadine
tasks: find Euric
give Euric a good luck talisman and return to Nadine
quest.description:
I, Nadine, desperately need someone's help.
Euric, my youngest son, has run away again... He's always had a touch of the wanderer in him and he knows how to take care of himself, but... Oh, I'm just worried sick. This city gets more dangerous every day... If you find him, could you give him this good luck talisman? I'm sure we'd all sleep a little better.
Let me give you this necklace as a token of my thanks upon your return. I don't know if it's worth anything but it has been in the family for years.

plots: Phlydia knows the player

quest.title: Phlydia's Book
quest.objective: bring "The History of Halruaa" back to Phlydia
tasks: Reach east of Candlekeep Inn.
find "The History of Halruaa"
bring "The History of Halruaa" back to Phlydia
quest.description:
Oh, hello! It's me, Phlydia!
Have you seen my copy of "The History of Halruaa" anywhere? You know how I can't stand the constant shuffling of arthritic feet up in the library... So I thought I'd get a bit of fresh air just east of here and... Oh, I hate being so absent-minded! Please, if you find it, I really do need it back.
If you do, you can take this little gem of mine. Maybe a merchant will give you a little something for it.

kbs.name: Oublek
kbs.description: a man who hands out bounties on criminals

plots: Oublek knows the player
Prism the Sculptor stole 2 emeralds
Prism the Sculptor can live or die

quest.title: Prism's Emeralds
quest.objective: return 2 emeralds to Oublek
tasks: find Prism the Sculptor
return 2 emeralds to Oublek
quest.description:
It's me, Oublek.
A bit of nonsense from a local artist named Prism. Made off with a couple of emeralds, he did.
There is a reward for the return of the gems: a 300 gold bounty.
Prism's fate is of less importance.

kbs.name: Minsc
kbs.description: a noble warrior and Dynaheir's protector

kbs.name: the gnoll stronghold, in the west
kbs.description: the gnoll stronghold, in the west

kbs.name: Dynaheir
relations: the gnoll stronghold, in the west

plots: Minsc, Boo, and Dynaheir traveled far to explore this land
gnolls have captured Dynaheir
Minsc and Boo will join the player

quest.title: Rescuing Dynaheir
quest.objective: free Dynaheir from gnolls with Minsc
tasks: Make your way to the gnoll stronghold, in the west.
find Dynaheir
free Dynaheir from gnolls with Minsc
quest.description:
Greetings, we are Minsc and Boo. Boo is my faithful hamster companion, and more than he seems.
We have traveled far to explore this land, but now my charge Dynaheir has been taken from us. 'Twas gnolls, and once we have tracked them I will beat sense into their heads until they release her.
Accompany us, and bards will sing the deeds of Minsc and Boo... and friends.
Onward to the gnoll stronghold in the west!

kbs.name: Dradeel
kbs.description: an elven mage who was a guide to Balduran

plots: Dradeel converted to the Church of Selûne recently
there are werewolves everywhere
Dradeel might find a way out of this island if his spellbook was returned to him

quest.title: Returning Dradeel's Spellbook
quest.objective: destroy the lycanthropes' lair, and bring Dradeel's spellbook back to its owner
tasks: Reach Balduran's ship.
find the lycanthropes' lair and Dradeel's spellbook within it
destroy the lycanthropes' lair, and bring Dradeel's spellbook back to its owner
quest.description:
I am Dradeel, mage and recent convert to the Church of Selûne.
I was the guide for Balduran's brave adventures to the ends of the world and beyond. The wolf-men are everywhere. The lycanthropes' lair is in Balduran's ship. My spellbook lies within. With it, I am a powerful mage. Without it, I am the pauper that stands before you. With my spellbook retrieved, I may be able to discover a way off of the island.
If you go to destroy the lycanthropes' lair, I would ask that you find my book.

kbs.name: Candlekeep
relations: the pirate cove along the coast, south of Candlekeep

kbs.name: the pirate cove along the coast, south of Candlekeep
kbs.description: the pirate cove along the coast, south of Candlekeep

kbs.name: Black Alaric
relations: the pirate cove along the coast, south of Candlekeep

plots: Safana will join the player
Safana has a map that shows the location of Black Alaric's treasure

quest.title: Safana's Treasure Hunt
quest.objective: get Black Alaric's treasure for yourself and Safana
tasks: Reach the pirate cove along the coast, south of Candlekeep.
find Black Alaric's treasure with Safana
get Black Alaric's treasure for yourself and Safana
quest.description:
My name is Safana and I can make you richer than you could imagine.
I know where the pirate Black Alaric dumped his greatest trove of treasure. Knowing that you are a dynamic and intelligent person, I know you'd want to join me in a venture to get this treasure.
Well, we should be off then. From what my map showed, the pirate cove is located somewhere along the coast, just south of Candlekeep.

kbs.name: Gellana Mirrorshade
kbs.description: a priestess who can help Sam

plots: Lena and Sam have been wandering in the wilderness
Sam will join the player

quest.title: Sam and Lena
quest.objective: save Sam from dying
tasks: Reach Temple of Wisdom.
take Sam to Gellana Mirrorshade
save Sam from dying
quest.description:
Please wait a moment, kind traveler! You've got to help me!
My name is Lena. You must forgive me for my appearance, but I've been wandering the wilderness for more than a week now.
My friend is badly hurt, and he might die if he doesn't get assistance soon. His name is Sam. If you were to take him to Gellana Mirrorshade at the Temple of Wisdom, she'd help him.
Please, can you do this?

kbs.name: Samuel
kbs.description: a man who deserted the Flaming Fist

plots: Samuel is traveling with a woman

quest.title: Samuel the Deserter
quest.objective: capture Samuel
tasks: find Samuel
capture Samuel
quest.description:
I am a proud member of the Flaming Fist. I've been searching for a deserter. His name is Samuel, and he should be traveling with a woman.
There is a bounty of 50 gold for his capture.

kbs.name: the art collector's estate, west of the fairgrounds, in the center of Baldur's Gate
kbs.description: the art collector's estate, west of the fairgrounds, in the center of Baldur's Gate

kbs.name: Ramazith
relations: the art collector's estate, west of the fairgrounds, in the center of Baldur's Gate

kbs.name: Helm of Balduran
kbs.description: the helmet of a legendary hero
relations: the art collector's estate, west of the fairgrounds, in the center of Baldur's Gate

plots: mercenaries were petrified while trying to break into the home of Ramazith: Ramazith sold the mercenaries to an art collector
Degrodel gives the player six scrolls of stone to flesh to unpetrify the mercenaries
one of the mercenaries has the Helm of Balduran

quest.title: Searching for Balduran's Helmet
quest.objective: bring the Helm of Balduran to Degrodel
tasks: Proceed to the art collector's estate, west of the fairgrounds, in the center of Baldur's Gate.
unpetrify the mercenaries
bring the Helm of Balduran to Degrodel
quest.description:
First of all, my name is Degrodel. I have been on the lookout for skilled adventurers. My task is very simple.
Some years ago, an evil band of mercenaries were all petrified while trying to break into the home of Ramazith. For those of you with a limited vocabulary, petrified means "turned to stone." Anyhow, one of those adventurers had in his possession an item of power: the Helm of Balduran. Ramazith didn't know this at the time and so, after turning them all to stone, he simply sold their bodies to an art collector living in the heart of Baldur's Gate.
What I would like you to do is find these statues, turn them back to flesh, and take the item. I will give you these six scrolls of stone to flesh. Use them on the statues when you find them.
The estate can be found just west of the fairgrounds in the center of town. Good luck, and don't entertain any thoughts about betraying me. It could be very hazardous to your health.
You will be paid 5,000 gold for this service. This is a kingly sum, so I won't barter with you about the amount.

kbs.name: "Spider's Bane"
kbs.description: a sword that was created to kill spiders

plots: Chelak found "Spider's Bane"
Chelak went to Cloakwood to clear the spider colony with "Spider's Bane"

quest.title: Spiders in the Cloakwood
quest.objective: investigate what happened to Chelak
tasks: Make your way to spider colony, in Cloakwood.
find Chelak
investigate what happened to Chelak
quest.description:
He-hello, travelers. I'm Tiber. Could... could I take up some of your time? I would be very grateful if you would just listen to... if you would just help me!
It's my brother, you see. He and I went into the Cloakwood to clear the woods of the spider colony that infests it. I know it sounds foolish... but my brother had found the sword "Spider's Bane"! The sword was created to kill spiders... and we thought we could become famous... the heroes of Cloakwood, and all that. But my brother hasn't returned yet... and it's been more than a week.
Please, could you go into the woods and find him for me? His name's Chelak. My mother would be so shattered if Chelak were to be dead.

kbs.name: Lady Hannah
kbs.description: a noblewoman who is seething because of Ragefast

kbs.name: Ragefast's house, in the northwest part of the town
kbs.description: Ragefast's house, in the northwest part of the town

kbs.name: Ragefast
relations: Ragefast's house, in the northwest part of the town

plots: Ragefast enslaved the nymph
Ragefast locked the nymph inside Ragefast's house

quest.title: The Captive Nymph
quest.objective: investigate Ragefast and his nymph
tasks: Travel to Ragefast's house, in the northwest part of the town.
find Ragefast, a mage
investigate Ragefast and his nymph
quest.description:
You may call me Lady Hannah. Ragefast! Oh, he makes me seethe! He's a mage on a power trip and what does he do?
He acquires his own personal nymph and enslaves her in his quarters! Seek him out and look into this matter immediately! His house is in the northwest part of town.
I wish you luck and all the passion of my fury in your task.

plots: Ragefast imprisoned Ragefast's nymph in Ragefast's house

quest.title: A Nymph for Ramazith
quest.objective: free Ragefast's nymph and bring her to Ramazith
tasks: Travel to Ragefast's house.
enter Ragefast's house
free Ragefast's nymph and bring her to Ramazith
quest.description:
Greetings to you and yours, my friend. I'm Ramazith.
Might I have your ear a moment? My proposition is thus: I would have you enter into the home of a colleague of mine and effect the release of a creature he has imprisoned there. Ragefast be his name, and he has in his possession one of the most beautiful and useful creatures in all of Faerûn. It's a nymph he captured some time ago, and I know not what laughable plans he has for her, but I am sure she be more... productive in my care.
I not so rich as to be able to offer huge gold, but as competent wizard I do have the odd magical item of worth. Perhaps an enchanted item will serve your needs, no?

plots: fire spells are effective on gibberlings

quest.title: The Gibberling Hordes
quest.objective: help Laurel to fend off the gibberlings
tasks: kill gibberlings
help Laurel to fend off the gibberlings
quest.description:
I am called Laurel. I am a traveling paladin.
Ah, travelers, this wilderness is too expansive to keep clear of monsters all on my own. Many gibberlings pass through this very spot day and night. Will you stay here and help fend them off?
Fire magics work well against the gibberlings, so if you have such spells, use them.

kbs.name: Jhasso
kbs.description: the head of the Seven Suns, and an old friend of Scar

plots: the leadership of the Seven Suns have acted strangely lately by selling off valuable assets and neglecting many profitable trading ventures
Scar talked with Jhasso, but Jhasso rudely rebuffed Scar
use stealth while investigating the Seven Suns compound

quest.title: The Seven Suns
quest.objective: investigate the Seven Suns, and report back to Scar
tasks: Proceed to the Seven Suns compound.
break into the Seven Suns compound
investigate the Seven Suns, and report back to Scar
quest.description:
First off, let me introduce myself. I'm Scar, second-in-command of the Flaming Fist.
I need you to begin an investigation of the Seven Suns trading coster. The Seven Suns leadership has been acting strangely of late. They've been selling off valuable assets and neglecting many of their more profitable trading ventures. Considering the importance that the trading coster holds over the economy of the city, the Grand Dukes are noticeably upset. I've gone to talk to the coster's head, Jhasso. He rudely rebuffed me, telling me to mind my own business. I've known Jhasso for many years, and this isn't his usual behavior. I can't start up an official investigation, as there is no real reason for doing so. That's why I need you.
I want you to break into the Seven Suns compound and find out what's wrong. Use stealth in your investigations; I don't want this operation to cause too much fuss. The most important person to watch for is Jhasso.
Once you've found out as much as possible, report back to me at the Flaming Fist compound.
I'll pay you 2,000 gold for this favor.

kbs.name: Garrick
kbs.description: a man who works for Silke Rosena

kbs.name: Silke Rosena
kbs.description: the most skilled musician and actor along the Sword Coast, a woman

plots: Feldepost hired some thugs to hurt Silke Rosena, because she did not perform at Feldepost's inn when she was supposed to

quest.title: The Silke Dilemma
quest.objective: become a bodyguard for Silke Rosena
tasks: Go to outside the Red Sheaf Inn.
meet up with Garrick
become a bodyguard for Silke Rosena
quest.description:
Hail, adventurers. I'm Garrick, and I work for Silke Rosena. She's the most skilled musician and actor along the Sword Coast. 
I have a proposal for you. How would you like a well-paying job as a bodyguard for my mistress? She's been having some problems of late. Some thugs have been hired by Feldepost to hurt her bad because she didn't perform at his inn when she was supposed to. You can't blame her for not showing up, what with a villain like Feldepost running the place.
Just meet me outside of the Red Sheaf Inn, if you are interested in the job.

plots: there is an iron shortage

quest.title: Investigate the Nashkel Mines
quest.objective: find out what caused miners to go missing and ore to become tainted
tasks: Proceed to the mines, southeast of Nashkel.
descend into the mines
find out what caused miners to go missing and ore to become tainted
quest.description:
I am Berrun Ghastkill, mayor of Nashkel.
I need someone to descend into the mines southeast of town and find what has caused our miners to go missing and our ore to become tainted. It won't solve everything, but it's the first step to easing the effects of the iron shortage.
The town can give you a reward of 900 gold pieces. We are a small community and that is all we can afford.
Please, go now and do what you can.

kbs.name: Casson
kbs.description: the dead son of Tremain Belde'ar

plots: Casson was killed for trespassing the Water Queen's House
Tremain Belde'ar wants to resurrect Casson

quest.title: Tremain's Son
quest.objective: bring Casson's body to Tremain Belde'ar
tasks: Make your way to Water Queen's House.
retrieve Casson's body
bring Casson's body to Tremain Belde'ar
quest.description:
Greetings to you. I am Lord Priest Tremain Belde'ar, a humble servant of Our Smiling Lady Tymora.
My request of you is an odd and very dangerous one. I will not hold you to it if you deem it too extreme. I would have you enter the Water Queen's House and retrieve my son's, Casson's, body. Casson sought to indulge his restless nature by sneaking about the place, and a high price was paid.
You must bring Casson's body to me, that I may restore his life to him.

kbs.name: Officer Vai
kbs.description: an officer of the Flaming Fist

plots: the bandits are working for someone

quest.title: Vai's Bounty Upon Bandits
quest.objective: find out why the bandit raids have been getting worse
tasks: kill all bandits
find out why the bandit raids have been getting worse
quest.description:
I am Officer Vai of the Flaming Fist and, to be honest, I could use your help.
The bandit raids have been getting worse. I used to think that they were just your usual brigands out to make a quick buck in troubled times, but not anymore. They're working for someone... Damn it, this is a fine mess, isn't it?
I'll pay 50 gold pieces for every bandit scalp you can bring me — and spread the news. I want this whole region cleared, and I want to know what in the Nine Hells is going on here.

plots: xvarts and kobolds swarmed the Nashkel mines
xvarts and kobolds have started attacking livestock more and more often

quest.title: Xvart Raids
quest.objective: save Hulrik's cows
tasks: kill the xvarts that are attacking the cows
save Hulrik's cows
quest.description:
I'm Hulrik! You have to help me!
Them xvarts are after my cows again! Ever since them xvarts an' their kobold kin swarmed the mines at Nashkel, they've been makin' attacks like that more and more often.

plots: people around here have not been able to sleep for a week

quest.title: Zombie Infestation
quest.objective: return to Wenric after killing all zombies
tasks: Head to around the farms here.
kill 20 zombies
return to Wenric after killing all zombies
quest.description:
I be Wenric, a farmer by profession.
There's been something killing peoples in and 'round the farms here. Zombies or something. I can understands if you can't stomach the task but, just between you an' me real personal-likes, I don't know who else is gonna do it... All of us haves been goin' for a week now without sleep.
We've counted twenty zombies or so, so keep track as you kill 'em, if that's what you plans on doing.
Once you got 'em all, come back here and I'll gives you the 150 gold pieces that some of us have pooled together.

plots: the player walked on Zordral while he tried to kill Bentha
Zordral believes that Bentha is evil
Zordral thinks that the player is a threat to him and tries to kill the player too

quest.title: Zordral's Witchhunt
quest.objective: save yourself and Bentha from Zordral's wrath
tasks: kill Zordral
save yourself and Bentha from Zordral's wrath
quest.description:
You there, stay back! If any of you come any closer, I'll kill her. I'm serious. Don't make me do it. All I have to do is say the last word of my spell and she'll die.
She's a witch. She'll use her magics to poison the children of this town. She'll butcher the livestock and she'll seduce the young men, make them her puppets. She must be killed!
Are you mocking me?! No one mocks the great Zordral. You will pay for your insolence!

kbs.name: Ike Cascadion Vendar
kbs.description: a showy adventurer and tour guide

kbs.name: Durlag's Tower
kbs.description: a dangerous tower filled with traps

plots: Ike Cascadion Vendar is leading a tour to Durlag's Tower
the tour to Durlag's Tower costs 60 gold

quest.title: A Tour of Durlag's Tower
quest.objective: take a tour to Durlag's Tower
tasks: buy a tour to Durlag's Tower from Ike Cascadion Vendar
take a tour to Durlag's Tower
quest.description:
Step right up folks and HEAR the tale of dread placed before thee. Join with me as I, adventurer extraordinaire Ike Cascadion Vendar, lead yet another group of brave souls through the very SEAT of danger in the realms. To Durlag's Tower we shall go, and witness the perils that have taken the lives of hundreds of courageous men and women.
SEE the horror of the treacherous traps! FEEL the presence of the long languishing dead! MARVEL at the wondrous wealth buried below! NOT for the weak of spirit as I will NOT be held accountable for any heart failure during OR after our expedition! Step up, step up! One at a TIME!
A special package deal of 60 gold for you, not that you would need a discount.

kbs.name: Merchants' League Counting House, northeast section of Baldur's Gate, northeast from Elfsong Tavern
kbs.description: Merchants' League Counting House, northeast section of Baldur's Gate, northeast from Elfsong Tavern

kbs.name: sea charts
relations: Merchants' League Counting House, northeast section of Baldur's Gate, northeast from Elfsong Tavern

plots: The Merchants' League found Balduran's shipwreck on Balduran's Island
Mendas of Waterdeep wants to get Balduran's logbook before the merchants destroy it while they search for treasure
The Merchants' League keeps the sea charts locked up
Mendas of Waterdeep will give the player some gold to obtain the sea charts

quest.title: The Reclusive Scholar
quest.objective: travel to Balduran's Island to find Balduran's logbook for Mendas of Waterdeep
tasks: Travel to Merchants' League Counting House, northeast section of Baldur's Gate, northeast from Elfsong Tavern.
obtain the sea charts from the sea captain
travel to Balduran's Island to find Balduran's logbook for Mendas of Waterdeep
quest.description:
I am Mendas of Waterdeep, quester of small truth in this land. I am in need of favor from you. Can you help a gentle fellow in search for knowledge?
The Merchants' League sailors found Balduran's shipwreck on a small island. I wish to recover the ship's logbook. I will solve mystery of Balduran's final voyage. Merchants' League will destroy my artifacts to get treasure. This must not happen! If you help me, I get things precious to me, you get treasure, merchant men get nothing. You will help, yes?
These men that find island, they keep the sea charts locked up. In Baldur's Gate, there is building in northeast section of city called Merchants' League Counting House. To find it, just go northeast from Elfsong Tavern. The sea charts, they are in there. Most likely, captain of ship will have them. I don't know such things as chart retrieval, but you are hero, and it is no problem for heroes.
There might be small danger, so I give you some gold for the charts.

plots: the cloak is an important symbol of old times
the cloak draped the village center
the recent storm moved the cloak beyond the village walls
there are beasts outside the village walls

quest.title: Delainy's Task
quest.objective: bring the cloak to Delainy
tasks: Arrive at beyond the village walls.
fetch the cloak
bring the cloak to Delainy
quest.description:
My name is Delainy, and I am pleasured to meet ye. I seek the return of an item, more an icon.
No doubt you felt the storm that passed just by and by? Village-home did as well, and the cloak that draped the village center was cast to the wind. I think it is beyond the wall, and will not risk the beasts to get it. Will you?
I can offer little besides my gratitude. The cloak is a keepsake, a symbol of old times.

plots: a storm sank the player's ship
there are beasts outside the village wall

quest.title: Durlyle's Task
quest.objective: bring the cloak that draped the village center back to Durlyle
tasks: Make your way to beyond the village wall.
find the cloak
bring the cloak that draped the village center back to Durlyle
quest.description:
I am Durlyle, and I am glad to be meeting. I have but a mundane task to ask of you, if you hear me out?
The storm you felt that took your ship? It was fierce here too, and a cloak that draped the village center was cast to the wind. I think it is beyond the wall, and will not risk the beasts to get it. Will you?

kbs.name: along the west coast of Balduran's Isle
kbs.description: along the west coast of Balduran's Isle

kbs.name: Evan
relations: along the west coast of Balduran's Isle

kbs.name: Blue Lady
relations: along the west coast of Balduran's Isle

plots: Evan sought out the Blue Lady and disappeared
Evalt thinks that Evan is under the Blue Lady's spell

quest.title: Evalt's Missing Brother
quest.objective: find Evan
tasks: Arrive at along the west coast of Balduran's Isle.
find the Blue Lady
find Evan
quest.description:
I am Evalt, I fish for clan in these savage waters. Listen, outsider, may I ask you for help?
There is a witch on this isle. My brother called her the Blue Lady and those of us who ply these waters have all heard her singing at one time or another. My brother, Evan, heard her more than most. I think that he went to find her. I think that he is under her spell. I must go and find him. This witch might kill him. He is strong but he is under her spell. I fear that she will kill him before he realizes what is happening. Can you find my brother?
I don't know exactly where the Blue Lady is. I have the sense to avoid her, unlike Evan. But I have only heard her singing along the west coast of the island.

plots: the gatekeeper won't let Farthing go and get her doll

quest.title: Farthing's Dolly
quest.objective: return Farthing's doll to her
tasks: Travel to the woods.
find Farthing's doll
return Farthing's doll to her
quest.description:
My name's Farthing. I'm only five. In a few years my papa will let me hunt. Are you allowed to hunt?
I've lost my dolly out in the woods. The gatekeeper won't let me go and get it. Can you get it for me?

kbs.name: Durlag's Tower
kbs.description: a tower atop untouched dungeons filled with riches

plots: Galken gives the player the ward token if the player settles his bar tab

quest.title: Galken's Wardstone
quest.objective: get the ward token that opens the way to the labyrinths beneath Durlag's Tower from Galken
tasks: settle Galken's bar tab
get the ward token that opens the way to the labyrinths beneath Durlag's Tower from Galken
quest.description:
I'm Galken. Hey, how'd you like to be supping on fine venison and tippin' back the good stuff?
I've the key to wealth legendary if you're up for it. No doubt you've heard of the labyrinth at Durlag's Tower, eh? And how she's been pillaged so often that fat nobles go there for picnics? Well, the TOWER has, but BELOW are dungeons untouched! I've a token, a ward token to be sure, that gives entry to them.
'Tis yours if you'll but settle my tab so I can leave this fine place... with all my limbs intact.

kbs.name: Maralee
relations: northeast of the village, in the woods

kbs.name: northeast of the village, in the woods
kbs.description: northeast of the village, in the woods

kbs.name: Peladan
relations: northeast of the village, in the woods

plots: Maralee's husband took Peladan hunting: werewolves attacked Peladan and his father
Peladan went missing, but Maralee's husband was killed
Peladan and Maralee's husband have dark hair

quest.title: Maralee's Child
quest.objective: return Peladan to Maralee
tasks: Reach northeast of the village, in the woods.
find Peladan
return Peladan to Maralee
quest.description:
Hello, good people. I am Maralee. Two moons ago my husband took my son out hunting with him. They were attacked by those horrible wolf-creatures. They... they killed my husband and took my baby.
Others say that they took the baby away to eat him, but I know he's still alive. He's a beautiful little boy with dark hair like his father. He is three moons old and his name is Peladan.
They took him from my husband northeast of the village, in the woods.

kbs.name: Hurgan Stoneblade
kbs.description: a man residing in Citadel Adbar

kbs.name: Durlag
kbs.description: a legendary hero who went mad after his family was killed

kbs.name: "Soultaker"
kbs.description: a dagger that belonged to Hurgan Stoneblade's grandpa

plots: Hurgan Stoneblade's grandpa was killed by a demon
Durlag intended to send "Soultaker" to Hurgan Stoneblade's mother
Durlag did not send "Soultaker": his family was replaced with doppelgangers and he was driven mad after killing the doppelgangers

quest.title: Recovering "Soultaker"
quest.objective: bring the "Soultaker" to Hurgan Stoneblade
tasks: Proceed to Durlag's Tower, a trapped tower.
find the "Soultaker"
bring the "Soultaker" to Hurgan Stoneblade
quest.description:
I am Hurgan Stoneblade, presently residing in Citadel Adbar. Have I got the adventure that'll make ye yearn for glory!
Ye have heard of Durlag's Tower, mayhaps? Me granda' was a good friend of Durlag's. Me granda' was slain by an evil demon but Durlag survived. Durlag kept "Soultaker" that had been me granda's. He was going to send it to me mother, but he was betrayed. A sad tale, that.
After Durlag built the tower his family was replaced by doppelgangers. Durlag killed them all but was driven mad by the act. He entrapped his tower heavily and forgot about me granda's dagger.
If ye be interested, I wish to hire ye to retrieve me granda's dagger, "Soultaker," me birthright.
An enchanted hammer I can offer ye for yer services.

kbs.name: Durlag's Tower
kbs.description: a dangerous tower owned by Durlag

kbs.name: Dalton
kbs.description: Therella's son who wants to be a hero

plots: Dalton went on an adventure to Durlag's Tower
Dalton and his fellow adventurers bought a ward token from Galken
Dalton did not return from Durlag's Tower

quest.title: Therella's Missing Son
quest.objective: find out what happened to Dalton
tasks: Find your way to Durlag's Tower.
find Dalton
find out what happened to Dalton
quest.description:
Greetings, adventurer. I have, or perhaps I should say had, a son named Dalton. He fell in with a crew of adventurers from Waterdeep. Dalton was always obsessed with the idea of being a hero.
Alas, he has neither the brains nor the ability. Such is a mother's lot in life, however, to watch her children perform acts of idiocy despite her warnings or concerns.
He and his thick-skulled cohorts took it upon themselves to plumb the depths of Durlag's Tower. They bought a ward token from that shyster, Galken, and made ready to leave. Though I begged and cried, Dalton still insisted on going. The band never returned. I fear that they were destroyed by the mad dwarf's machinations. That is the tale, sad but true.
Please find my son if he still lives.

kbs.name: Magreb
relations: a set of caves to the northeast

kbs.name: a set of caves to the northeast
kbs.description: a set of caves to the northeast

kbs.name: Rilsa
relations: a set of caves to the northeast

plots: goblins first appeared around the house of an old mage
the old mage was captured by goblins

quest.title: Magreb and Rilsa
quest.objective: avenge Rilsa and give her a proper burial
tasks: Travel to a set of caves to the northeast.
find goblins that killed Rilsa
avenge Rilsa and give her a proper burial
quest.description:
Goblins! All I know is they killed Rilsa when she tried to talk to them, and I can't face them by myself. At first they appeared around the house of an old mage, but soon they moved into a set of caves to the northeast, taking him with them.
Forgive me. My name is Magreb. Rilsa and I have watched over this area for years, and we never had any trouble with goblins before. Since they killed her, I've been half out of my mind with grief.
Please avenge my Rilsa and give her a proper burial!

plots: the player is the leader of a party of adventurers that has both men and women: Shar-Teel Dosan only duels men
if Shar-Teel Dosan wins the duel the player has to give 20 gold to her
Shar-Teel Dosan will kill anyone who tries to interfere the duel

quest.title: A duel with Shar-Teel Dosan
quest.objective: win duel against Shar-Teel Dosan
tasks: select the male party member who shall duel Shar-Teel Dosan
win duel against Shar-Teel Dosan
quest.description:
Hold, traveler! I, Shar-Teel Dosan, challenge your best warrior to a duel. I don't fight women, so only men should step forward.
I win, and you give me 20 gold. In the unlikely event that one of you bests me, I'll pledge my sword to your cause, however stupid it may be..
Will your champion step forward? I only fight men, so your women will have to be satisfied with just watching. Don't entertain any thoughts about cheating. If any of the rest of you try to interfere in this fight, I'll kill them outright.

plots: ankheg armor is comparable to full plate with half the weight
there is an iron shortage

quest.title: An Offer from Taerom
quest.objective: sell your ankheg shells
tasks: give your ankheg shells to Taerom Fuiruim
sell your ankheg shells
quest.description:
Hello there, I'm Taerom Fuiruim, a blacksmith of some renown.
An interesting piece o' material you got there. Ankheg, if I'm not mistaken. Been a while since I seen the like, but if I remember correctly, it makes a fine set of armor. If properly treated it's comparable to full plate with half the weight!
If you're willing to part with your shells I'll give you 500 gold for the lot of them. No more can I offer with business as slow as it is.
Iron shortage hurting us all.

kbs.name: Commander Brage
kbs.description: the former commander of the guard

plots: Commander Brage found a cursed sword and killed his family
Commander Brage was a well-liked man before the cursed sword changed him

quest.title: The Tale of Commander Brage
quest.objective: kill Commander Brage
tasks: Make your way to the woods to the west.
find Commander Brage
kill Commander Brage
quest.description:
State your business with the guard and go! Oh, that came out a bit harsher than I meant. I am sorry for my mood. All the guard are still grieving the loss of Commander Brage.
The commander was friend to many before he found a cursed sword. He's not the man he was, by Helm. I'll not believe a man of Brage's rank could kill his own family. 'Twas evil magics of some sort. An entire unit went west after Brage to try to talk some sense to him. It's been a week, and none have returned.
The reward for the commander's head is a king's ransom, but I'll not be lifting MY sword against a brother soldier.
Travel lightly, wanderer. The woods harbor strange things.

kbs.name: wyvern
kbs.description: [Enemy] a dragon-like creature with a barbed tail

plots: the player met Coran in this wood
the mayor of Beregost hired Coran to hunt down a dragon with a barbed tail: Coran knows that dragons do not have barbed tails

quest.title: Coran the Wyvern Hunter
quest.objective: bring the wyvern's head to the mayor of Beregost
tasks: find the wyvern's nest with Coran and kill the wyvern
bring the wyvern's head to the mayor of Beregost
quest.description:
It's refreshing to find other people in this wood. I am Coran, thief and archer!
I've been alone in the wilderness for far too long. I wouldn't mind returning to the big city, but I have yet to collect my bounty. I'd share the reward with the lot of you if you would help hasten the hunt.
The deal is this: I've been hired out by the mayor of Beregost to hunt down a great winged dragon that's been plaguing the caravan routes. He's offered 2,000 gold for its head. Now before you get cold feet, let me allay your fears. The only descriptions of the beast have always mentioned its deadly barbed tail. From what I know about dragons they don't have barbs on their tails — that's something unique to wyverns. So all we have to do is find this wyvern's nest and kill it. Our only worries are if it has friends over for dinner!
We shouldn't tarry any longer; let's collect the head of this soon-to-be-sorry wyvern.

kbs.name: Entar Silvershield
kbs.description: one of the dukes of Baldur's Gate, and Skie's father

plots: Eldoth and the player can blackmail money from Entar Silvershield after capturing Skie
Eldoth will join the player's party

quest.title: Eldoth and Skie
quest.objective: capture Skie with Eldoth
tasks: Arrive at Baldur's Gate.
help Skie escape from her father
capture Skie with Eldoth
quest.description:
I'm Eldoth, a traveling bard. Pleased to make your acquaintance. You look like the type to be on the outlook for ways to improve the quality of your life.
Well, I have a proposal that could help you in that endeavor. You see, there's a girl, my lover in fact, who desires to escape her father and live on her own. Her father is Entar Silvershield, one of the dukes of Baldur's Gate. This, of course, makes her desires more difficult than that of the average city girl.
However, with your assistance, we could help her escape the tyrannical clutches of Entar. Here's the punchline: Since Entar's going to be hunting us anyway, we can blackmail him for hoards of cash and not worry about our captive escaping. After all, we're doing it all for the sake of Skie.
Now, we needn't go about this right away. In fact, I'll help you with whatever you're doing until you decide to head up to Baldur's Gate. Just think of it as one favor deserving another.

plots: the player has trespassed gnolls' territory with the player's party
the gnolls' demand 50 gold from the player, but the player doesn't have any money

quest.title: Ludrug's Band
quest.objective: win the duel against Ludrug
tasks: choose your champion to fight against Ludrug
win the duel against Ludrug
quest.description:
Stop! You have trespassed on our territory. You shall not be allowed to leave until you have paid tribute. We demand 50 gold in tribute!
No money? That is too bad for you. We let you go only if you win fight. Your best champion versus our best champion. Our best champion is Ludrug. Ludrug is me. Are you ready for fight? No matter, we fight now!
If you lose, you must die! If you win, we must let you pass! Tread carefully, we will be watching you.

plots: Scar knows the player
every night people have been disappearing from the streets of the city
possible tracks of a many-legged centipede-like monster have been found

quest.title: Missing Citizens
quest.objective: discover what's been happening with the disappearing citizens, and come see Scar
tasks: Proceed to the east of the city.
patrol and find an entrance to the sewers
discover what's been happening with the disappearing citizens, and come see Scar
quest.description:
It is I, Scar, second-in-command of the Flaming Fist. I have another job you might be interested in. You'll be well paid for your services.
The problem is this: Every night people have been disappearing from the streets of the city. My men have been scouring the city trying to find the culprit, but so far to no avail. People have begun to get scared, and very few are willing to leave their homes at night. Something has to be done, and quickly. Would you be willing to take the job? I'd pay you 300 gold in advance with a 1,000 gold bonus if you discover what's been happening with the disappearing citizens.
Your job is really simple. All I want you to do is patrol the east of the city and find an entrance to the sewers. Perhaps you'll get lucky and find out what's been happening. If you do find out what's been happening, come to see me at the Flaming Fist barracks. Our only clue so far has led us to the sewers, so if you want to explore them first, it would probably be a good idea. Also, we've found tracks of some many-legged creature, perhaps a centipede-like monster.

plots: Aldeth Sashenstar has been holed up in a cabin for several days
the savages threatened Aldeth Sashenstar and his friends to stop hunting
the savages killed Elban

quest.title: Aldeth and the Group of Savages
quest.objective: protect Aldeth Sashenstar and his friends from a group of savages
tasks: prepare for the savages' attack on Aldeth Sashenstar's cottage
protect Aldeth Sashenstar and his friends from a group of savages
quest.description:
I am Aldeth Sashenstar. You must understand that at the moment, I'm under a terrible amount of stress.
You see, my dear friend, there is a group of uncouth savages that has declared their intention of killing my friends and me. I've been holed up in this cabin for several days and have lacked the wherewithal to try to make an escape.
My friends and I come here every year to do some sport hunting. This year however, a group of woodland savages threatened us with bodily harm if we did not stop our hunting trip. Being civilized men, we realized that it's well within our rights to hunt where we damn well please. After a few more days of hunting, the crass woodmen lost all pretense of humanity and murdered Elban, one of my oldest friends.
I'm sure that they plan to attack our cottage here, so we had best be prepared.

kbs.name: Aldeth Sashenstar
kbs.description: one of the principal shareholders of the Merchants' League

kbs.name: Merchants' League Estate, the headquarters of the Merchants' League
kbs.description: Merchants' League Estate, the headquarters of the Merchants' League

kbs.name: Irlentree, Zorl Miyar
relations: Merchants' League Estate, the headquarters of the Merchants' League

plots: the player saved Aldeth Sashenstar on his hunting trip
Aldeth Sashenstar thinks that Irlentree and Zorl Miyar have become different people when he was gone: they spend their and Aldeth Sashenstar's company's resources on frivolous and stupid ideas

quest.title: Investigating the Merchants' League Estate
quest.objective: investigate Irlentree and Zorl Miyar, and report back to Aldeth Sashenstar
tasks: Head to Merchants' League Estate, the headquarters of the Merchants' League.
go with Aldeth Sashenstar, let him introduce you as his old friend and quarter you in the guest chambers
investigate Irlentree and Zorl Miyar, and report back to Aldeth Sashenstar
quest.description:
It is so pleasant to see your face once again. Don't you recognize me? It is I, Aldeth Sashenstar. I am so glad to have met you, especially at a time like this. I need to speak with you privately.
I'm sorry for all of this hiding and skulking, but there are dire events afoot. You know that I am one of the principal shareholders of the Merchants' League. Well, I share ownership of the company with two others: Irlentree and Zorl Miyar, two very distinguished gentlemen. When I returned from my hunting trip — thanks to you, I might add — I found that my two partners had undergone some profound changes, nothing physical or overt, but something far more sinister.
It's as if my partners had become wholly different people while I was gone. They almost take an active interest in squandering our company's resources on frivolous and stupid ideas. If they continue on this course, the company will be in shambles in but a few weeks. I know you have already helped me once, but I ask for your assistance again. I have no other recourse.
Come into the Merchants' League Estate with me. I will explain that you are an old friend of mine and will quarter you in the guest chambers. From there, please investigate my partners, perhaps using magic or any of the other skills you possess. Learn as much as you can during your visit and then report back to me after you're done. It should only take a couple of days.

kbs.name: Vithal
relations: a svirfneblin village to the north

kbs.name: a svirfneblin village to the north
kbs.description: a svirfneblin village to the north

plots: the player released Vithal from imprisonment
Vithal lost his book of rituals
Vithal needs the book of rituals to breach the walls between dimensions

quest.title: A Mage's Proposal
quest.objective: help Vithal breach the walls between dimensions
tasks: Go to a svirfneblin village to the north.
recover Vithal's book of rituals
help Vithal breach the walls between dimensions
quest.description:
Ahh! Thank you for releasing me. I'm Vithal, an adventuring mage. If you could aid me a bit, I would be forever grateful. There will be items enough for us both.
This spot is "thin," and careful spells may breach the walls between dimensions. On the other side, one might find some valuable magic, if one knows where to look. I cannot cast the actual dimension-breaching spells without the procedures outlined in my book of rituals. I imagine it was taken after I was imprisoned. There were svirfneblin observing my conflict: Perhaps they took it. I cannot blame them. I am sure I appeared quite permanently lost.
I believe there is a svirfneblin village to the north. They may have taken my gear there. If you go, tell them they may keep everything but the book.

plots: Flydian was sent by the High Merchant
druids are suspected of the animal attacks

quest.title: Animal trouble in Trademeet
quest.objective: investigate why forest animals are attacking Trademeet
tasks: Travel to Trademeet.
go talk with the High Merchant
investigate why forest animals are attacking Trademeet
quest.description:
I am Flydian, a messenger sent by the High Merchant of Trademeet to find someone to help our town.
Trademeet is under attack by forest animals. The High Merchant thinks druids may be responsible, but we haven't the manpower to find them and stop it.
The High Merchant will have more information for you.

kbs.name: Jysstev estate
kbs.description: in Athkatla, southeast section of the Government District

plots: Dawnbringer Sain is supposed to acquire art for the temple of Lathander

quest.title: Gain the services of Sir Sarles for the Temple of Lathander
quest.objective: convince Sir Sarles to sculpt a statue for the temple of Lathander
tasks: Reach Jysstev estate.
find Sir Sarles
convince Sir Sarles to sculpt a statue for the temple of Lathander
quest.description:
Greetings, I am known as Dawnbringer Sain, a priest of Lathander.
I am charged with the acquisition of art for the temple. The beauty of the dawn must be captured in every nook and cranny of Lathander's home.
Athkatla is blessed with the presence of perhaps the greatest sculptor of our age. The artist is known as Sir Sarles, and he is making an all too brief visit. We would be foolish not to seize upon the opportunity to have him work for us.
I would ask you to convince Sir Sarles that it would be best for him to work for us. Go to him now.
Sir Sarles is staying at the Jysstev estate. It is in the southeast section of the Government District.
Remember, you speak for Lathander in this matter.

plots: there are many new artworks and aged relics on display at the temple of Lathander
Dawn Ring was stolen from the temple of Lathander
the thieves were hired by the Talassans of temple of Talos

quest.title: Another Mission for the Temple of Lathander
quest.objective: return Dawn Ring to the temple of Lathander
tasks: Reach the slums at night.
intercept the thieves transporting Dawn Ring
return Dawn Ring to the temple of Lathander
quest.description:
Good day, it's Dawnbringer Sain, the priest of Lathander.
I would ask a dangerous thing of you. You're free to refuse, but the greater glory of Lathander is at stake.
The Morninglord takes great pride in the artifacts of his rule. We have many items on display at the temple of Lathander, from new artworks to the aged relics of bygone days. Today we are one less. We are the victims of thievery, and our followers have been shaken by this vulnerability. Quick steps must be taken to rectify this.
We know the culprits; they have not concealed their crime. Talassans, slinking from their temple to degrade our worship, hired common thieves for the deed! They fear no retribution. The Morninglord cannot suffer his relics in the hands of such evil.
Find these thieves before the Talassans receive the items.
The spark of dawn has lit the way.
Go to the filth of the slums at night and intercept the delivery of our Dawn Ring. Bring it back to its proper place.

kbs.name: Sir Sarles
kbs.description: a good artist who is also a pretentious and demanding man

kbs.name: Talos
kbs.description: the evil god of thunder and destruction

plots: Sir Sarles demands illithium as his art medium
if the player sees the representatives of the other churches, the player must kill them

quest.title: Gain the services of Sir Sarles for the Temple of Talos
quest.objective: convince Sir Sarles to create a work of art for the temple of Talos
tasks: Arrive at Athkatla.
find Sir Sarles
convince Sir Sarles to create a work of art for the temple of Talos
quest.description:
I, Talon Yarryl, priest of Talos, have a mission for you!
Talos demands proper tribute, and that occasionally means artwork pleasing to the eye. If a piece of his fury can be represented, more might see and fear it.
An artist visits Athkatla now. The artist travels under the name Sir Sarles, though it is surely a fake. He is pretentious, demanding, and very good.
We must command a commission from him. But he is not being cooperative. His commission is outlandish, and he demands illithium as his medium! He may as well have asked for dragon tears.
Convince him to work for Talos. Use whatever means you must. Other churches are trying the same... if you cross their representatives, kill them.
Incur what debts you must, and use force where it will help. Stop at nothing. This man must realize there is no choice but to work in the service of Talos.

kbs.name: Talos
kbs.description: the evil god of thunder and destruction

plots: Stormherald Nallabir lost this past tenday's theological debate to a a representative of the Lathanderian temple in the Government District
the temple of Talos hired Travin to steal a Dawn Ring from the Lathanderian temple

quest.title: Another Mission for the Temple of Talos
quest.objective: get the Dawn Ring from Travin and bring it to Talon Yarryl
tasks: Go to the slums at night.
find Travin
get the Dawn Ring from Travin and bring it to Talon Yarryl
quest.description:
It's Talon Yarryl, priest of Talos.
I have a chore for you that may prove interesting.
This is not a matter of negotiation or exploration. No, now you are to face true enemies of Talos.
Slanderous words have been said. Things did not go well for Stormherald Nallabir at this past tenday's theological debate in the Government District. The growing arrogance of the Lathanderian church is distasteful. Talos should be feared; their irreverence is insulting.
We have hired a thief, and he has stolen a Dawn Ring from the Lathanderian temple.
Find Travin in the slums at night, collect the ring, and return it here.
Remember that the honor of Talos rests upon your shoulders.

kbs.name: Renfeld
kbs.description: a man who has been poisoned
relations: the entrance to the large orange building

kbs.name: large orange building, in the southwest part of the Docks District
kbs.description: large orange building, in the southwest part of the Docks District
relations: the entrance to the large orange building

kbs.name: Rylock
relations: the entrance to the large orange building

kbs.name: the entrance to the large orange building
kbs.description: the entrance to the large orange building

plots: Renfeld has friends nearby in a large orange building
Rylock is guarding the entrance to the large orange building

quest.title: Bring the Poisoned Man to his Friends
quest.objective: save Renfeld from dying of poison
tasks: Reach large orange building, in the southwest part of the Docks District.
take Renfeld to Rylock
save Renfeld from dying of poison
quest.description:
My... my name is Renfeld...
*groan*
I have been poisoned...
I beg you to take me to... friends...
they have a building not far away from here... please, I beg you! It is a large building...
a large orange building in the southwest part of the Docks District.
There will be a man guarding the door... his name is Rylock. Please, take me to him...
I... I have nothing to offer you... aside from my gratitude and those of my friends.
Please... I do not have much time...

plots: the player was captured by the mind flayers while trespassing their home
the mind flayers like watching their captives fight in the arena
the player should not attack the mind flayers
the player should not anger the arena spectators: they are especially strong because of their big brain

quest.title: Captured by Mind Flayers
quest.objective: survive the mind flayers' arena
tasks: Reach the mind flayers' arena.
fight to survive
survive the mind flayers' arena
quest.description:
Me a servant ogre. Now it time to fight!
You fight in the arena. Listen, I tell you what you need to know.
You trespass on the home of the mind flayers, and you got caught. Now you pay for your stay. Understand?
Next thing, you better fight well in the arena, because if you don't fight well, you die. If you don't fight at all, you die.
Oh, last rule, never attack the mind flayers. You are in their home. They kill you with their thoughts.
You will live if you fight well.
I warn though: Do not anger spectators. They extra strong in this place because of big brain.

kbs.name: Acolyte Byron
kbs.description: the player's tutor in the player's duties to Helm

plots: the player is one of Helm's chosen: a cleric of Helm

quest.title: Work as a Cleric for the Temple of Helm
quest.objective: hear questions from believers of Helm
tasks: reassure believers of Helm that duty is above all
hear questions from believers of Helm
quest.description:
Greetings, I'm Acolyte Byron.
I will be your tutor in your duties here as one of Helm's chosen.
You have many things you are responsible for.
As a favored of Helm, you will hear questions from those that seek guidance in their duty. They merely needed to be reassured that duty is above all, and that reverence for such duty is the way to happiness.
You will steer them on the true path to Helm's grace.
You have the wisdom that has secured your position within the church.
You will dispense it to those that are needy.
This is a sacred trust that you are given. Do not disappoint.

kbs.name: Lara
kbs.description: the player's tutor in the player's duties to Lathander

plots: the player is a cleric of Lathander, and one of Lathander's favored
Lara will send the player someone who needs the guidance of Lathander

quest.title: Guide the Followers of Lathander
quest.objective: lend your wisdom to the believers of Lathander
tasks: give guidance to someone that needs the guidance of Lathander
lend your wisdom to the believers of Lathander
quest.description:
Hello there, I am Lara, and I shall be your tutor.
Not that you need schooling, but you might be unfamiliar with the duties you are to perform.
In exchange for the many benefits you will enjoy as a favored of Lathander, you will have a few tasks to perform while here. They are humble, but very important.
You are to lend your wisdom to the wounded and afflicted, those that are suffering from a misdirection of the heart. Guide them in the light of the Morninglord's glory.
We shall introduce you slowly to the work. I shall send you someone that needs the guidance of Lathander, and then we shall evaluate how you have done.

kbs.name: Acolyte Vilon
kbs.description: a priest of Talos, who hands the player the player's duties to Talos

kbs.name: Talos, the Storm Lord
kbs.description: an evil god of thunder and destruction

plots: the player is a favored of Talos
Acolyte Vilon sends the player a few believers who need the guidance of Talos

quest.title: Fulfill Your Duties to Talos
quest.objective: speak to the believers of Talos
tasks: give guidance to the believers of Talos who seek the guidance of Talos
speak to the believers of Talos
quest.description:
Chosen of Talos! Over here! I, Acolyte Vilon, have words for you about your duties within the church!
As a favored of Talos, you will hear questions from the mewling dogs that seek the guidance of the Storm Lord. These weaklings seek guidance, and you are to give it. These worms are barely worthy of stepping upon the floor of the house of the Storm Lord! Nevertheless, you will hear them!
We all take our turn guiding the foolish. I shall send a few your way, and if you do well, perhaps you will not need to speak to any more. We shall see.
For now, guide them in the way of Talos. You must do what is best for the church, and that is all. Anything less and you will have your honors stripped.
Clear?

kbs.name: Coran
kbs.description: the player's old friend, and a strong warrior

plots: Coran and Safana were traveling Forest of Tethir: Safana was kidnapped by wolfweres
Coran managed to escape from wolfweres
Coran will go with the player: Coran will help the player save Safana

quest.title: Coran and the Wolfweres
quest.objective: save Safana from wolfweres
tasks: Arrive at an encampment east of here.
kill wolfweres
save Safana from wolfweres
quest.description:
Hail, good friend! I am most pleased to see you here! Your timing could not be better, as I, Coran, am in most dire need!
I was traveling Forest of Tethir with my beloved Safana... and now she is kidnapped! It is dreadful! Two days ago, we were beset by giant wolves... wolfweres, I fear. They tried to take us both, but I was able to escape. Safana, however, was not so fortunate. I tracked them to an encampment east of here, but even a great warrior such as myself cannot beat them alone.
We must save her and strike a blow against the foul werebeasts! Together, we shall be unstoppable!

plots: Dao genies came to Trademeet
Dao genies are hunting Ihtafeer
Dao genies won't allow trade to occur in Trademeet until Ihtafeer's head is delivered to them

quest.title: Dealing with the Trademeet Genies
quest.objective: investigate the issue with the Dao genies
tasks: Find your way to the next room.
talk with Guildmistress Busya about what needs to be done
investigate the issue with the Dao genies
quest.description:
My name is Lord Logan Coprith, and I am the High Merchant of Trademeet.
A group of Dao genies from Calimshan arrived to Trademeet a while ago. They and their gold were welcome enough at first... But in only weeks, they have taken all business and put a stop to it. They are hunting a rakshasa named Ihtafeer and insist that she is present in the town.
The genies will allow no trade to occur until Ihtafeer is found and her head given to them. Why... why they have chosen this particular tactic, I am unsure.
Without proper trade, however, the merchants are penniless. Soon, the food resources will dry up as well, so something must be done... and done soon.
Perhaps you might be able to look into this genie issue for us? Guildmistress Busya in the next room can tell you more about what needs to be done.

plots: guards do not let anyone in the circus tent

quest.title: Find Giran's Mother Within the Circus Tent
quest.objective: investigate the circus tent
tasks: Proceed to the circus tent.
find Giran's mother
investigate the circus tent
quest.description:
sniff* My momma's still inside. They says she can't come out. My momma went into the tent to see a circus show. But somethin' happened, and now nobody comes out. There's guards who won't let nobody in anymore, too. But my momma's in there!
I want my momma! Please find her, please!

plots: the player saved Tirdir from a grave
Tirdir was kidnapped: the 3 men who kidnapped Tirdir buried him alive in the grave
Tirdir tore off something from the shirt of the youngest man dressed in red
the gravekeeper might have spoken to the man dressed in red

quest.title: Find the Kidnappers Who Buried Tirdir
quest.objective: find the 3 men who buried Tirdir alive
tasks: talk to the gravekeeper about the man dressed in red
find the 3 men who buried Tirdir alive
quest.description:
Thank you for saving me! I'm Tirdir. I was buried by the men who kidnapped me!
*cough* They held me for ransom from my family, and after my family had paid, they knocked me out. I remember being carried here and thrown into that grave next to another body! And then they buried me alive! *cough*
I don't know their names. There were three of them. The youngest carried me here. He dressed all in red... strange and bright as you please.
I woke up with this in my hand. I think I must have torn it off his shirt when he threw me in the grave. Perhaps it will help you find him.
You must stop them! I beg of you! There was someone who spoke to this man. Perhaps the gravekeeper. You should talk to him at least... he must have seen something!

plots: magical stone golems are known to be powerful and dangerous

quest.title: Find Mimic's Blood for Jermien the Cowled Wizard
quest.objective: bring Jermien the blood of a mimic so that he can complete his magical stone golem
tasks: find the blood of a mimic
bring Jermien the blood of a mimic so that he can complete his magical stone golem
quest.description:
I am none other than Jermien... licensed Cowled Wizard for this region.
I am working on a golem of stone! A fine piece of magical craftsmanship, if I do say so myself! Few other mages have made the attempt, you see. This type of golem is quite powerful and dangerous... but I am more than skilled enough to control it. Once it's complete, I'll have an excellent servant.
Trouble is, I'm missing one of the crucial ingredients... the blood of a mimic. I'd pay handsomely for some, in fact. Hmmm... you look like the adventurous type... care to find me some?
Hmm. I seem to recall that I've got a magical sword around here that I won in a bet from a certain fool. I've no use for it, but it's valuable. Find me some mimic's blood and it's yours.

kbs.name: Xzar
kbs.description: an enemy of Harpers, and a pompous man

kbs.name: Montaron, Monty
kbs.description: a short, male halfling thief, and Xzar's friend

plots: Montaron was captured by Harpers

quest.title: Find Out What Happened to Montaron
quest.objective: return to Xzar after you have found Montaron
tasks: Find your way to Harpers' building.
find Montaron
return to Xzar after you have found Montaron
quest.description:
My friend Montaron has been taken captive by those irksome Harpers. I would have you enter their building and find Monty for me. Short... halfling... thief... even one of your intellectual capacity can't miss him.
Go to their building and return once you have found him.

kbs.name: Renal
kbs.description: one of the leaders of the Shadow Thieves, nicknamed "Bloodscalp"
relations: the storefront in the central docks

kbs.name: the storefront in the central docks
kbs.description: the storefront in the central docks

kbs.name: Mae'Var
kbs.description: a good, ambitious male thief, the leader of Mae'Var's guild house
relations: the storefront in the central docks

kbs.name: Shadowmaster
kbs.description: the guildleader of the Shadow Thieves
relations: the storefront in the central docks

kbs.name: Gorch
relations: the storefront in the central docks

plots: Renal will give the player papers which say that the player was being transferred by the Shadowmaster
the player is supposed to spy on Mae'Var from the inside
the player will need to reassure Mae'Var

quest.title: Find Proof of Mae'Var's Treachery
quest.objective: find evidence about Mae'Var's planned betrayal
tasks: Reach the storefront in the central docks.
show the papers to Gorch to gain access to Mae'Var's guild house
find evidence about Mae'Var's planned betrayal
quest.description:
My name is Renal, as I'm sure you've been told. Renal "Bloodscalp"... a little nickname I've earned over time. Rather grisly, but it keeps the fearful in line.
One of my guild houses to the south is run by a rather ambitious fellow named Mae'Var. Good thief, but I never liked him. Now I know why. I've had some hints that he is getting too big for himself. Thinking of taking my place, I suspect, but I've had no real evidence to say that this is so.
I will give you papers saying you were being transferred by the Shadowmaster. You will spy on Mae'Var from the inside and find me the evidence that I need. You'll need to reassure Mae'Var, naturally. He won't know who you are, but I am confident that you are more than capable of this.
Just head to the storefront in the central docks area and speak to the storekeeper, Gorch. Show the papers to him, and he'll let you in the guild house proper.
I think you will find the reward adequate. 10,000 gold is no small fortune, though I think you deserve a little more. From my personal armory, a sword.

kbs.name: Raelis Shai
kbs.description: leader of the troupe of bards and actors

kbs.name: Haer'Dalis, sparrow
kbs.description: a male actor in Raelis Shai's troupe

plots: Haer'Dalis is an actor in Raelis Shai's troupe
Haer'Dalis was captured by Mekrath because Mekrath coveted Haer'Dalis' gem

quest.title: Free Haer'Dalis from Inprisonment by Mekrath
quest.objective: return Haer'Dalis and his gem to the troupe
tasks: Make your way to the city's sewers.
find Mekrath's lair
return Haer'Dalis and his gem to the troupe
quest.description:
I am Raelis Shai, the leader of this merry troupe.
The vagaries of fortune blow an ill wind over us. One of our members is absent due to circumstances we cannot control.
You must hear our story. One of our actors, Haer'Dalis, has been kidnapped by a wizard native to this city... he has made no effort to negotiate with us. The wizard's greed may have called to him at the sight of Haer'Dalis's beloved gem... something our sparrow would not gladly surrender. So this wizard has stolen both away, and there is nothing we can do. I would ask that you return our sparrow and his gem to us both, by whatever means possible.
The wizard's name is Mekrath, I believe... I know that his lair can be accessed through the city's sewers, though where exactly it lies is a mystery.
We are but a destitute troupe of players, child, and can afford little. Mekrath may have treasure of his own... Wrest it from his grasp if you wish to do so.

plots: Malaaq was bound to guard Irenicus' items and the player's weapon
Malaaq was captured from his home, Plane of Air, by Irenicus
Malaaq will be free if he is given his original flask

quest.title: Free the Genie
quest.objective: return Malaaq's flask to him
tasks: find Malaaq's flask
return Malaaq's flask to him
quest.description:
I am djinni Malaaq and I have been bound by a wizard to guard his items, and your item it seems. I can sense your touch upon this weapon.
If you can secure the means of my release, I will give you your weapon.
I was captured in my home, on Plane of Air, by some wizard. He bound me to this flask that I might guard his things. You must find my original flask and bring it back to me. Once it is within my grasp, I can break the enchantment and be freed.

kbs.name: along the path to the east of the troll mound
kbs.description: along the path to the east of the troll mound

kbs.name: Nilthiri
kbs.description: a shamaness, and the leader of the trolls of the troll mound
relations: along the path to the east of the troll mound

plots: the player is a druid
Nilthiri will overrun the grove if not stopped

quest.title: Heeding the Spirit of the Grove
quest.objective: serve the grove as a leader bringing balance
tasks: Make your way to along the path to the east of the troll mound.
kill Nilthiri
serve the grove as a leader bringing balance
quest.description:
I am the spirit of the grove, child. I am the water, the earth, the trees, and the sun. I am life and death: the eternal cycle.
A druid who serves the cause of balance is needed. The grove requires leadership, a gentle hand. Will you serve the grove as such? There is much work to be done. Listen and learn the path of balance, the path of the Eternal Cycle.
Long have the trolls of the mound lived beneath the protection of the grove. But a new leader has arisen. Nilthiri the shamaness leads the trolls to chaos. She urges them to expand their territory, and she brings more trolls to the mound without thought to the consequences. If this continues, the trolls will overrun the grove, and nature will suffer. A servant of nature must bring the life cycle of Nilthiri to a close for the good of all.
You will find Nilthiri along the path to the east of the troll mound.

kbs.name: Marek of Halruaa
kbs.description: a famous male druid of old

kbs.name: Loren
kbs.description: a young boy, and a descendant of Marek of Halruaa

plots: the player has met the spirit of the grove before
the player is a child of nature: a druid
Marek of Halruaa established a protectorate of nature in these woods
Marek of Halruaa's old enemies have returned to haunt his descendants: Loren's parents were killed by an evil that haunts him

quest.title: Rescue Loren
quest.objective: aid the spirit of Marek of Halruaa in saving Loren
tasks: Reach Trademeet.
save Loren from Marek of Halruaa's old enemies
aid the spirit of Marek of Halruaa in saving Loren
quest.description:
It is I, the spirit of the grove, child.
Child of nature, you are again needed. Balance is threatened, and Chaos is at the periphery. Will you serve the grove?
The grove is young in terms of nature and ancient in the years of man. Centuries ago, Marek of Halruaa established a protectorate of nature in these woods. Now, as Marek knew would someday happen, his descendants have returned and old enemies marshal their forces. A child called Loren has recently arrived in Trademeet. This child is the inheritor of Marek's spirit, but does not yet have the knowledge to use his power. Surely he shall be slain by the forces of chaos if you do not rescue him. Even now he is alone and in danger, his parents slain by an evil that haunts him. You must find the child Loren in Trademeet and fight Marek's old enemies to save the child's life.
The spirit that once was Marek has gone forth to aid the child... but the spirit is not the power that the man once was and cannot hope to hold out for long. Aid him lest all be lost.

kbs.name: Irenicus' dungeon
relations: the south end of the Windspear Hills

kbs.name: Irenicus
relations: the south end of the Windspear Hills

kbs.name: Ilyich
kbs.description: the clan leader of Irenicus's duergar slaves

kbs.name: Fairy Queen
relations: the south end of the Windspear Hills

kbs.name: the south end of the Windspear Hills
kbs.description: the south end of the Windspear Hills

plots: Irenicus has enslaved the three dryads

quest.title: Helping Irenicus' Captive Dryads
quest.objective: take the three dryads' acorns to the Fairy Queen in the south end of the Windspear Hills
tasks: Make your way to Irenicus' dungeon.
get the three dryads' acorns from Ilyich
take the three dryads' acorns to the Fairy Queen in the south end of the Windspear Hills
quest.description:
We are the three dryads. You must help us get free of this... creature Irenicus! We are Irenicus's possessions, servants, and concubines.
You must get our acorns back from Ilyich, the clan leader of Irenicus's duergar slaves. He is somewhere within this dungeon. Please take the acorns to the Fairy Queen who lives in the south end of the Windspear Hills.

kbs.name: Tiris and Jenia's home, north of the Alibakkar estate
kbs.description: Tiris and Jenia's home, north of the Alibakkar estate

plots: Tiris is too frightened to leave Tiris and Jenia's home

quest.title: Helping Tiris
quest.objective: figure out why Tiris is frightened
tasks: Travel to Tiris and Jenia's home, north of the Alibakkar estate.
speak with Tiris
figure out why Tiris is frightened
quest.description:
My name is Jenia, and I come to you on behalf of my son, Tiris. He is very frightened. Too frightened to even leave our home!
I beg of you to come and speak to him! To see what has frightened him so and perhaps help him!
Tiris is at our home, the one just north of the Alibakkar estate. Please come as soon as you are able to! I so despair seeing him like this! I know I am poor and have nothing to offer, but I beg you to help my son!

plots: the player killed the skin dancers that attacked Raissa
the skin dancers turned Raissa into a skin dancer: they peeled her skin from her bones and one of them put Raissa's skin on like a coat
Raissa took her skin back
a spell of restoration can cure Raissa

quest.title: Heal Raissa's Skin Dancer Condition
quest.objective: cure Raissa
tasks: Arrive at Waukeenar Temple.
talk to the temple superior about a restoration spell
cure Raissa
quest.description:
Y-you... you killed those monsters? It was so... horrible! They turned me, Raissa, into one of them: a skin dancer. Peeled my skin from m-my bones and... and now I've put it back! They turned me into one of them. He took my skin like it was some kind of coat and put it on. He told me that now I was a skin dancer too.
I... I cannot go anywhere like this! I can feel that magic, that evil, growing inside of me! Please, my noble savior... help me! Wh-when he was... taking my skin, the skin walker said the only way to stop the process was a spell of restoration. B-but he laughed, saying I would never receive it.
If... if you could find that spell, could you not cast it upon me? Maybe... maybe the temple superior at the Waukeenar Temple would have something!
I have no coin. I know such magic is very expensive... but if you could find it in your heart to save me, I would be eternally grateful!

kbs.name: a tomb over in the lower crypts of the Graveyard District
kbs.description: a tomb over in the lower crypts of the Graveyard District

kbs.name: Book of Kaza
relations: a tomb over in the lower crypts of the Graveyard District

plots: Korgan Bloodaxe and his fellows were on a mission to obtain the Book of Kaza for a book collector
Korgan Bloodaxe and his fellows had a heated argument: only Korgan Bloodaxe remained alive afterwards

quest.title: Help Korgan Recover the Book of Kaza
quest.objective: bring the the Book of Kaza to the book collector
tasks: Head to a tomb over in the lower crypts of the Graveyard District.
find the Book of Kaza with Korgan Bloodaxe
bring the the Book of Kaza to the book collector
quest.description:
I'm scouring for a band of desperate adventurers to aid me in a gallant task. Come and hear Korgan Bloodaxe's tale!
A fortnight past, me fellows and I were in the midst of obtaining an ancient text fer our patron when a skirmish visited our midst. Vile words, alas, became a lake of bloodshed. So it goes the sacred grimoire ne'er made it to our benefactor's hand. And now he awaits its arrival with a zeal reserved for a grog-blossom in an alekeg. The scuttlebutt is the pay is handsome and worthy of note — sacks of loot and odd magics. The volume sits not far from 'ere, and the bibliomaniac, he paces the floor in the meantime. 'Tis called the Book of Kaza.
The Book of Kaza is in some hobnail's tomb over in the lower crypts of the Graveyard District. It's nae abandoned, but rumors and half-truths only scare the young and infirm. Keeps the curious away, me guess.
Well... it'll take far more than a few shambling bags of skin and stitches to deter Korgan Bloodaxe from a king's ransom! A foolhardy jaunt into a hive of undead? How could ye resist?

kbs.name: Jarlaxle
kbs.description: the merry leader of the Bregan D'aerthe

plots: the player entered the pocket plane via a rope
a lich has the gems that contain the souls of Jarlaxle's men
