killing or not killing the lich is up to the player
killing the lich allows the player to loot the tower
once the player has the gems that contain the souls of Jarlaxle's men, the player will be brought back to the headquarters with a rope by Jarlaxle

quest.title: Intrigue with Jarlaxle
quest.objective: give the gems that contain the souls of Jarlaxle's men to Jarlaxle
tasks: find the gems that contain the souls of Jarlaxle's men
give the gems that contain the souls of Jarlaxle's men to Jarlaxle
quest.description:
I am Jarlaxle, leader of the Bregan D'aerthe, at your service.
This is a pocket plane, headquarters of the Bregan D'aerthe, my mercenary band. I hoped the rope would bring you here, and I see that it has. Welcome!
There is a lich who has numerous gems that contain the souls of my men, and I want them back. Whether you kill the lich or not is up to you. Killing him would allow you to loot the tower, I suppose, but however you get those gems is of no concern to me.
Once you gather up the gems, I will use the rope to pull you back into the headquarters here. Easy enough, yes?
You shall receive a bit of gold, my friend, for your trouble.

plots: the player is not a believer of Helm

quest.title: A Mission From Oisig
quest.objective: discuss your mission with Oisig
tasks: Go to the temple of Helm.
follow Oisig
discuss your mission with Oisig
quest.description:
Greetings. I am Oisig, cleric of Helm.
I would speak with you. I would hire you as a mercenary in the service of Helm. I would prefer a person of faith, but you will be adequate.
Follow me to the temple of Helm. I will discuss what is required of you there. Do not take too long; Helm requires you now.

kbs.name: Helm, He of the Unsleeping Eyes, The Vigilant One
Keldorn
kbs.description: a male paladin of Torm, and an ally of Helm, who will assist the player in finding the Cult of the Eyeless

plots: blindness is abhorrent to Helm
the Cult of the Eyeless is hiding in the sewers: the player must infiltrate the sewers and find a hidden passage leading to the Cult of the Eyeless

quest.title: Investigate the Cult of the Eyeless
quest.objective: investigate the Cult of the Eyeless
tasks: Find your way to the sewers.
meet Keldorn
investigate the Cult of the Eyeless
quest.description:
The task I ask will be treacherous, but you seem capable. Serve well, and you will be rewarded. Display any treachery, and it will be seen. Now to the task.
A cult of the eyeless has emerged: He of the Unsleeping Eyes must know of this cult. The blindness they promote is abhorrent to Helm. We ask you to investigate and identify the cult.
The Vigilant One informs us that the cult is underground and close, but we cannot see past the sewers. You must infiltrate it, as friend or conqueror. You must suffer the filth of the sewers to find the filth of the cult. They are not hiding amidst the pipes, so there must be a passage leading further away.
Our resources are thin at the moment, but an ally of Helm and servant of Torm is awaiting you in the sewers now. Seek Keldorn to serve with you. Faith guide you both.

kbs.name: Gaal
kbs.description: high priest of the One God

kbs.name: in this area, atop a holy altar
kbs.description: in this area, atop a holy altar

kbs.name: item
kbs.description: an artifact, a part of a rod
relations: in this area, atop a holy altar

plots: Gaal will gives the player a key to the inner chambers
the door to the inner chambers is located a short distance back the way the player came, at the sewer passages

quest.title: Serve the One God
quest.objective: retrieve an item for the One God
tasks: Find your way to in this area, atop a holy altar.
venture below, and retrieve the item
retrieve an item for the One God
quest.description:
I am Gaal, high priest of the One God.
There is... something that you could do that the great one cannot, despite his vast power.
The Unseeing Eye knows of a valuable item in this area.
The item is a rod... or part of a rod, rather, that you will find atop a holy altar. I cannot tell you more than that. You must let your faith guide you.
If you were to venture below, you could prove your worth by retrieving this artifact for him. Do this, and I will allow you into our ranks and the One's divine presence.
I have a key I can give you... This will allow you entrance to the inner chambers through a door a short distance back the way you came, at the sewer passages.

kbs.name: Kalah's riddle, the poorest have it, the richest need it, but if either were to eat it, they would certainly perish
kbs.description: Kalah's riddle, the poorest have it, the richest need it, but if either were to eat it, they would certainly perish

plots: Kalah won't allow the player to pass this bridge before the player answers Kalah's riddle

quest.title: Solve Kalah's Riddle
quest.objective: make Kalah allow you to pass this bridge
tasks: answer Kalah's riddle
make Kalah allow you to pass this bridge
quest.description:
Aha! I see a wayfarer has come to amuse Kalah! You must answer a riddle, naturally, ere I will allow you to pass this bridge.
Here's the riddle, my friend: The poorest have it, the richest need it, but if either were to eat it, they would certainly perish. Tell me what it is!

kbs.name: Aerie
relations: in the north side of this chamber

kbs.name: in the north side of this chamber
kbs.description: in the north side of this chamber

kbs.name: Quayle
relations: in the north side of this chamber

plots: Aerie works in the circus with Quayle
there's an illusion that makes Aerie look like a monster
Aerie has been chained: the key to her chains looks like a sword
the commoners have the key
Aerie regains her normal form after becoming free

quest.title: Set Aerie Free
quest.objective: free Aerie
tasks: Go to in the north side of this chamber.
get the key to Aerie's chains from commoners
free Aerie
quest.description:
M-my name is Aerie. I... work in the circus with my uncle, Quayle... I... I'm not a monster! I'm an elf, a winged elf... or at least I was... This... this covering you see is some kind of illusion, but if you believe in it, then it becomes real! P-please believe me! Now go before something happens to you, I beg of you!
If... if you're not going to flee, then maybe you can help free me from the chains that keep me bound in this form — and then maybe I can help you!
You... you need the key to these chains. But... but it won't look like a key! There are a couple of... commoners... in the north side of this chamber...
Don't be fooled by the illusion, though... they are monsters! They have a sword which is actually my key... if you get it from them, I can remove the chain and regain my normal form!
But please be careful! You... you can't trust anything you see here!

plots: Delon does not have any money
Delon was sent to find someone who could help his home village Imnesvale: terrible beasts have been seen out in the hills
Umar herself might have returned
Minister Lloyd can tell everything else

quest.title: Investigate the Deaths in the Umar Hills
quest.objective: investigate the monster sightings at Imnesvale
tasks: Head to Imnesvale.
talk to Minister Lloyd
investigate the monster sightings at Imnesvale
quest.description:
My name's Delon. I was sent to f-find someone, but things have been gone all wrong! *sniffle* I've had all my money stolen, and I'm lost, and everyone's so mean. *sniff*
I was sent to find someone who could h-help my village, Imnesvale. Terrible things are happening there, and nobody knows what to do! Everyone says they seen strange b-beasts out in the hills. Everyone's so frightened! There's even t-t-talk that Umar herself has returned!
When you get to Imnesvale, talk to Minister Lloyd! He can tell you everything else!

kbs.name: Brynnlaw
kbs.description: a pirate town on an island

plots: Ginia grew up in Brynnlaw, which used to be a pleasant town
pirates lead by Desharik invaded Brynnlaw
pirates drove people from their homes: Ginia's father tried to take their home back from the pirates but was executed
Desharik gave Ginia and Ason to Chremy for their father's actions
Calahan could take Ginia and Ason away from Brynnlaw, but Ginia and Ason can't pay him

quest.title: Ginia's Tale
quest.objective: talk to Calahan near the docks about taking Ginia and Ason
tasks: Find your way to near the inn in Brynnlaw.
kill Chremy
talk to Calahan near the docks about taking Ginia and Ason
quest.description:
I should begin with my name... Ginia. I grew up here in Brynnlaw.
Things have not always been like this. Brynnlaw was once a pleasant town, though my memories may be influenced by happier times in my own life.
Then the pirates arrived, led by the despot Desharik. Desharik had lost a war with another pirate king. Forced to this island, his ships invaded the town. They took our homes. Desharik killed our mayor and dumped his body into the sea. We were forced out into the streets.
My father could take no more injustice. He tried to get back into our house and was executed for breaking the law of the pirates. Once they've stolen something, the owner has no claim on it.
Desharik said that we would have to pay for our father's "crime." He gave us to Chremy, his lieutenant, as a reward for service. He put me to work as a courtesan for the drunken pirates. It's horrible, traveler! He says that he'll kill my brother Ason if I don't do it.
There is no escape for Ason and me. There is a smuggler who will take us, but we cannot afford to pay him. There is nowhere to run on this island.
Chremy can be found near the inn. The smuggler's name is Calahan. I hope that Calahan will take us with him when you kill Chremy. He will be near the docks. Please be careful!

kbs.name: Jaella
kbs.description: a little girl, and Lissa's daughter

plots: Jaella just lies in bed staring at the wall

quest.title: Lissa's Daughter Needs Healing
quest.objective: heal Jaella
tasks: Head to the basement.
find out what Gerhardt knows about Jaella's condition
heal Jaella
quest.description:
My name is Lissa. Something's wrong with my daughter.
Her name is Jaella. She's hurt, traveler. I don't know what's wrong with her. She just lies in bed staring at the wall. Won't even eat.
Please heal her. She's just a little girl. Please, you must go and find out exactly what Gerhardt knows about Jaella's condition. You'll find him in the basement.

kbs.name: Keldorn
kbs.description: a member of the Most Noble Order of the Radiant Heart

plots: Keldorn's tasks keep him away from home

quest.title: Keldorn Wishes to Visit His Wife and Family
quest.objective: visit Keldorn's estate
tasks: Find your way to Keldorn's estate in this district.
meet Keldorn's wife and daughters with Keldorn
visit Keldorn's estate
quest.description:
I am Keldorn, servant of the Most Noble Order of the Radiant Heart.
My tasks for the church too often keep me away, but my estate is in this district, along with my wife and daughters. Would you like to come? I could introduce you.

kbs.name: Keldorn
kbs.description: a betrayed man, and the player's friend

kbs.name: Mithrest
kbs.description: an inn in the Promenade District of Athkatla

kbs.name: Sir William of Thorpe
kbs.description: a foreign noble, and a good man

plots: Keldorn's wife has been seeing Sir William of Thorpe
Sir William of Thorpe has challenged Keldorn's honor

quest.title: Adulterer's lot
quest.objective: bestow some justice on Sir William of Thorpe
tasks: Arrive at Mithrest.
go find Sir William of Thorpe with Keldorn
bestow some justice on Sir William of Thorpe
quest.description:
My wife has been seeing another man. Sir William of Thorpe... He's a foreign noble establishing trade here in Athkatla. He was a good man — at least I always thought so until... until now.
My friend, let us bestow some justice. Sir William has challenged my honor. There must be a reprisal.
We must make haste to the Mithrest in the Promenade District. I cannot live like this for long.

kbs.name: Vittario
relations: the second floor in Delosar's Inn

kbs.name: the second floor in Delosar's Inn
kbs.description: the second floor in Delosar's Inn

kbs.name: Dennis
kbs.description: a big man with big friends

plots: Dennis refuses to pay his debts to Vittario
Dennis promised to pay Vittario's bar tab in exchange for some lessons on the gong

quest.title: Help Vittorio Collect His Debt
quest.objective: protect Vittario from Dennis while Vittario collects Dennis' debt
tasks: Proceed to the second floor in Delosar's Inn.
follow Vittario to Dennis
protect Vittario from Dennis while Vittario collects Dennis' debt
quest.description:
I, Vittario, be in some need of assistance, me pal. There be a fellow within Delosar's Inn there... Dennis. He owes me a good deal of coin, an' refuses to pay!
He promised to pay off me bar tab, he did, in exchange for some lessons on the gong. Well, I teached him, I did... an' now he refuses to pay me tab!
Ehhh, well I be kicked out of Delosar's for not having my tab paid. Dennis be a big fellow... with big friends. I need some muscle behind me if I'm t' go within.
Come... follow me inside o' Delosar's, and let's have a little talk wi' Dennis, aye? I do believe he is on the second floor.
I be a poor, poor man, me pal... I have almost nothing to offer ye. I beg ye to help a destitute teacher find some justice!

kbs.name: Dennis' family gong
kbs.description: a gong that belonged to Dennis' mother

plots: Dennis is the leader of a mercenary band from Riatavin
Roger might have bought Dennis' family gong

quest.title: Recover Dennis' Mother's Gong
quest.objective: find Dennis' family gong
tasks: Find your way to the sewers below the city.
find Roger
find Dennis' family gong
quest.description:
I be Dennis... the leader of mercenary fellows out o' Riatavin.
Me gong was stolen. The gong belonged to my mother... it was her dowry and worth a great deal of coin. A damnable lout stole it before my gong lessons were even finished!
The lout sold it to a fence by the name of Roger not too long ago, I do think. He lives in the sewers below th' city, although I knows not exactly where. He might still have it.
Please find me family gong!

kbs.name: Dawnlord Arenthis
kbs.description: a member of the church of Lathander

kbs.name: Risa
kbs.description: a shy, sad, young girl, and Dawnlord Arenthis' charge

plots: Risa does not talk much since the death of her parents

quest.title: Locate a Caretaker for Risa
quest.objective: do something to help Risa
tasks: find a guardian for Risa
do something to help Risa
quest.description:
I am Dawnlord Arenthis of the church of Lathander... excuse my young charge. Risa doesn't talk much since the recent death of her parents.
There is very little that can be done for her as well... other than to put her into an orphanage, I suppose. She is so shy and sad, though, I am sure it will do her no good.
If only there were someone who would care for her. Might you know of someone who would make a suitable guardian?

kbs.name: Madulf
kbs.description: the peaceful leader of ogres, who used to be a leader in the army of Sythillis

plots: Madulf and his fellow ogres want to be left alone
Madulf wants peace with humans

quest.title: Madulf Wants to Make a Deal with the Village
quest.objective: tell the villagers of Imnesvale that Madulf can protect them from orcs in mountains
tasks: Proceed to Imnesvale.
go to Imnesvale
tell the villagers of Imnesvale that Madulf can protect them from orcs in mountains
quest.description:
Me Madulf... lead fellows from great army of Sythillis in the south. No want to kill races no more. Lead fellows in desertion. We just wants be left alone.
Always Madulf and fellows be chased and hated 'cause me an ogre! We just wants to be left alone. We come here one moon ago, tries to settle for a while, yes?
We needs you bring word to human village... humans run when Madulf goes, so me needs youse to do it for me. Youse bring word, yes?
Madulf no want death... Madulf no want fight. Just want peace. You tell villagers, maybe, that Madulf and fellows will protect village... protect from orcs in mountains, yes?
We have shield to give you... is magic, from Sythillis's army... we no use. Maybe you like.

plots: the player recently assumed the ownership of the sphere-like building: by all rights, the Cowled Wizards should have the sphere
the Cowled Wizards let the player operate as a wizard in the sphere if the player agrees to do tasks for them

quest.title: Claiming the Sphere
quest.objective: accept Teos' special deal
tasks: do tasks for the Cowled Wizards
accept Teos' special deal
quest.description:
I am Teos, a Cowled Wizard, and I have been assigned to offer you... a special deal.
You just recently took this sphere, and by all rights we should have it, but my superiors said to offer an alternative. It would seem we have need of you.
That said, they would like to offer an exchange. You may operate in this awkwardly placed sphere if you agree to certain duties for the Cowled Wizards.
It is simple: You may have this place and act freely as a wizard. In exchange, you do the odd task for us, acting when we can't because of political or other reasons.

kbs.name: de'Arnise Keep
kbs.description: the home of Nalia de'Arnise, a castle under siege

plots: if the attackers have breached the inner courtyard of the de'Arnise Keep, they will be hard to rout
Nalia de'Arnise's father would not leave the de'Arnise Keep

quest.title: The de'Arnise Keep Has Been Invaded
quest.objective: defeat the attackers at the de'Arnise Keep
tasks: Find your way to de'Arnise Keep.
find Daleson
defeat the attackers at the de'Arnise Keep
quest.description:
I, Nalia de'Arnise, need a strong hand to help me. My land is under siege, and none of this rabble will aid me! And after all I've done for their kind, too! Please, can you assist me?
There is no time! I only hope that the attackers have not made it inside. If they have... if they have breached the inner courtyard, they will be hard to rout.
I will tell you what secrets I can. Perhaps you will be able to sneak in and attack from a more vulnerable spot. I hope Father is all right. He... would not leave.
Please, hurry to the de'Arnise Keep and find Daleson.

kbs.name: Khellor Ahmson
relations: Officer Roenall's home, northwest of the main government building in the Government District

kbs.name: the docks
relations: Officer Roenall's home, northwest of the main government building in the Government District

kbs.name: Officer Roenall's home, northwest of the main government building in the Government District
kbs.description: Officer Roenall's home, northwest of the main government building in the Government District

kbs.name: Officer Roenall
relations: Officer Roenall's home, northwest of the main government building in the Government District

plots: Khellor Ahmson saw Officer Roenall using his authority against the player in a corrupt manner
any complaints about Officer Roenall must first go through him: guards cannot do anything about Officer Roenall
Officer Roenall's personal records may reveal his fondness for gems

quest.title: Officer Roenall's Corrupt Actions
quest.objective: bring the evidence of Officer Roenall's corrupt actions to Corgeig Axehand
tasks: Head to the docks.
Head to Officer Roenall's home, northwest of the main government building in the Government District.
investigate Barg
find Officer Roenall's personal records
bring the evidence of Officer Roenall's corrupt actions to Corgeig Axehand
quest.description:
I am Khellor Ahmson, a mere guard.
I saw what happened, and I share your helplessness. Any complaints about Officer Roenall must first go THROUGH him, so you can imagine how many get through.
This did not come from me, for if my indiscretion against Roenall were to get out, I should be thrown from the military. There is one way you can get to him.
Roenall is quite corrupt and more than willing to exercise his power. You are not monitored as we, so you can do something that I or another guard cannot.
Look to the docks and a man named Barg. Examine him and what he does, and you are sure to see what I mean. You might also wish to pry into Roenall's personal records. They may reveal something of his fondness for gems. I did not tell you this... and I certainly did not say his records are in his home northwest of the main government building in the Government District.
Think on what I've said, and bring anything you learn to Corgeig Axehand in the Government District main building. He is Roenall's commander.

kbs.name: William Reirrac
kbs.description: a knight of the Most Noble Order of the Radiant Heart

plots: the player is a member of the Most Noble Order of the Radiant Heart
Sythillisian Empire has invaded Amnian lands

quest.title: Knights Rescue
quest.objective: rescue the knights of the Most Noble Order of the Radiant Heart
tasks: Make your way to Umar Hills.
repel the invasion to the Amnian outpost
rescue the knights of the Most Noble Order of the Radiant Heart
quest.description:
Welcome. I, William Reirrac, have been awaiting you. You should know the particulars of your service here and what being a member of the Most Noble Order of the Radiant Heart really means.
You are aware of the conflict with the Sythillisian Empire? There have been invasions into Amnian lands. We have been monitoring outposts, and all is not well. One outpost reported an imminent attack because an enemy unit needed their supplies. A runner barely made it with the information, and we fear the worst.
You must leave immediately for the furthest lengths of the Umar Hills. You must join the combat and rescue our knights, for they are surely outnumbered.
Go, and rescue whom you can. You have little time.

kbs.name: William Reirrac
kbs.description: a member of the Most Noble Order of the Radiant Heart

kbs.name: a neutral meeting place
kbs.description: a tavern in the Umar Hills, in the village of Imnesvale

plots: the player is a knight of the Most Noble Order of the Radiant Heart
Metrich wants some squatters removed from his lands: the squatters used violence against Metrich's men

quest.title: Dealing with the Baron
quest.objective: restore order to the lands of Metrich by solving a land dispute
tasks: Make your way to a neutral meeting place.
speak with Metrich
restore order to the lands of Metrich by solving a land dispute
quest.description:
Knight, we have been commissioned by a local barony. Such service to political figures is good for the Order, and you will serve quite well in the task.
It is necessary for us to be accessible in local concerns lest we seem above the people. In this case, a baron has petitioned us to solve a land dispute. Baron Metrich wishes some squatters removed and has cited violence against his men as reason for it. Go to his lands, restore order, and bring favor to us.
The baron waits in a neutral meeting place. He is in a tavern in the Umar Hills, in the village of Imnesvale. Go now.

kbs.name: William Reirrac
kbs.description: of the Most Noble Order of the Radiant Heart

kbs.name: Tyrianna
kbs.description: a noblewoman, one of the Morningales

kbs.name: Hurgis Baltezan, "Hand of Torm"
kbs.description: Tyrianna's godparent, an upstanding man serving the god of duty, comes from Baldur's Gate

plots: the Morningales have been murdered: Tyrianna survived her family

quest.title: Tyrianna's Family
quest.objective: escort Tyrianna to the building beside the temple in the docks and wait for Hurgis Baltezan to arrive
tasks: Make your way to safe house.
protect Tyrianna
escort Tyrianna to the building beside the temple in the docks and wait for Hurgis Baltezan to arrive
quest.description:
I have a vital mission for you that must take precedence over all else.
We have received word of a great atrocity, one that must not be completed. There has been... murder is too weak a word. An entire family has been decimated. The Morningales have been a model of decency in this city, and their work in opposing the slave trade has earned them renown across the land. It also earned them many enemies. This past tenday has seen the family murdered in their homes, almost to the last. It would seem they were made examples of.
The time for justice will come, but what is important now is that someone survived, praise Helm. Tyrianna — she hid in a cellar while all others were executed. She must be protected until escorted from the city. Her survival will be a symbol to persevere in the fight against slavery, despite the ferocity of the enemy. You will go to a safe house we have set up, and you will make sure she remains secure. It is as secret as we could make it, though nothing is ever absolute.
In the morning, her godparent will arrive. He is from Baldur's Gate and will accept no other guards besides his own. You will see that she reaches his care. Go to the building beside the temple in the docks and await him. She should be safe in his care. Hurgis Baltezan is his name, and a more upright citizen you will not find. He earned the title "Hand of Torm" in his service to the god of duty.
The Order shall reward you with a suit of powerful armor for your good works.

kbs.name: William Reirrac
kbs.description: of the Most Noble Order of the Radiant Heart

plots: the player is a knight of the Most Noble Order of the Radiant Heart
this is the player's final task

quest.title: The Dragon Slayer
quest.objective: retrieve the Holy Avenger from Firkraag
tasks: Travel to Windspear Hills.
slay Firkraag in his lair
retrieve the Holy Avenger from Firkraag
quest.description:
Greetings. It is William Reirrac of the Most Noble Order of the Radiant Heart and I believe it is time for you to perform one final task, if you are willing.
There is an item, a holy artifact, that lies within the hands of a great evil. Firkraag, the great red dragon, looms over the Windspear Hills. His reign must end, and from his lair you must retrieve the most holy of blades, the Holy Avenger. This tool of good has been in his possession for too long. Knight, I call upon you to slay the dragon and make a statement for right and justice.
The blade will be rescued, but so shall the lands that he rules. This is a great risk, but it must be dealt with sometime. Go, and may the forces of good be your salvation.
Accomplish this, and I can think of no one more worthy of wielding the Holy Avenger. In your hands, such a blade will strike deep to evil's heart.

kbs.name: Wellyn
kbs.description: a ghost of a young boy

kbs.name: inn in the slums, The Copper something, one of the bedrooms in the back
kbs.description: inn in the slums, The Copper something, one of the bedrooms in the back

kbs.name: Llynis
relations: inn in the slums, The Copper something, one of the bedrooms in the back

plots: Llynis killed Wellyn and stole Littleman

quest.title: Put the Spirit of the Child Wellyn to Rest
quest.objective: return Littleman to Wellyn
tasks: Proceed to inn in the slums, The Copper something, one of the bedrooms in the back.
find Llynis
return Littleman to Wellyn
quest.description:
I... my name is Wellyn. I just want... I just want my stuffed bear back...
It's my favorite bear, Littleman... The bad man who came into our house... he—he hurt me, and he took Littleman with everything else... *sob* I can never go to sleep without Littleman! The bad man has it at that inn in the slums. The Copper something. *sniff* He's in one of those bedrooms in the back! I think his name is "Llynis"...
I've... I've gone to him... *sob*... I've tried to tell him that I just want my bear, please, but he just gets too frightened of me. *sob* Oh, please get it from him!

kbs.name: Mairyn
relations: Mairyn's sacred lands to the north of this place where the temple of the sun god once stood

kbs.name: Mairyn's sacred lands to the north of this place where the temple of the sun god once stood
kbs.description: Mairyn's sacred lands to the north of this place where the temple of the sun god once stood

plots: the player is a ranger
the humans have come recently, digging and tearing down the trees: Mairyn begged the humans to stop but they refused

quest.title: Humans Destroying Forest
quest.objective: stop the humans from further desecrating Mairyn's forest
tasks: Make your way to Mairyn's sacred lands to the north of this place where the temple of the sun god once stood.
seek out the nature of the humans' quest
stop the humans from further desecrating Mairyn's forest
quest.description:
Good ranger! My name is Mairyn... I am a spirit of this forest, and I am in desperate need of your aid!
There are... other humans... in my sacred lands to the north of this place where the temple of the sun god once stood. They have come recently, digging and tearing down the trees... I have begged them to stop, good ranger... I have pleaded with them that they are destroying not only me, but many of the other forest spirits as well. The humans have refused.
I implore you... go to the forest in the north and do whatever you can to stop these humans from further desecrating my forest! You must go to them, and seek out the nature of their quest, if you wish. Whatever you do, however, you must stop them.
I... I have nothing to offer you, ranger, other than my gratitude. May Mielikki shine on you, good ranger.

plots: the player is a ranger
Delon has been looking for the player
Nelleck saw orcs coming down from the hills: he says that the orcs will be at the village no later than three or four days from now

quest.title: Orc Attack
quest.objective: repel orcs
tasks: Travel to Imnesvale.
talk to Minister Lloyd
repel orcs
quest.description:
Oh! There you are, my noble ranger! It's me, Delon. I... I've been looking all over the place for you! You... you've got to come to Imnesvale!
There's orcs... big ones! Nelleck says he saw them coming down from the hills. Soon they'll attack! The Minister sent me to find you! Nelleck says that they'll be at the village soon... no later than three or four days from now. You've got to hurry!
I'll run back and tell Minister Lloyd that you're coming! Everyone will be so relieved!

plots: the player is a ranger
Delon has been looking for the player again
Imnesvale is in danger again: Umar has threatened to kill everyone if they don't leave
the Minister will tell the player everything

quest.title: Umar the Witch
quest.objective: deal with Umar
tasks: Head to Imnesvale.
talk to the Minister
deal with Umar
quest.description:
Hey! It's me, Delon. I... I've found you again, my noble ranger! It's... it's so hard to find you sometimes! The... the village is in danger again! The Minister has asked for you!
It's Umar! The witch! She's come back, and she's threatened to kill everyone if they don't go an' leave right now! The... the Minister says he will tell you everything!

kbs.name: Garren Windspear
relations: Garren Windspear's cabin, a short distance south of here

kbs.name: Garren Windspear's cabin, a short distance south of here
kbs.description: Garren Windspear's cabin, a short distance south of here

kbs.name: Helm
relations: Garren Windspear's cabin, a short distance south of here

plots: Garren Windspear saw the player change their shape
Garren Windspear observed the player kill knights who looked like beasts: priests of Helm will seek justice and only the player's head will suffice

quest.title: The Mystery of Monster Knights
quest.objective: discover why you were tricked to kill knights
tasks: Make your way to Garren Windspear's cabin, a short distance south of here.
take sanctuary with Garren Windspear
discover why you were tricked to kill knights
quest.description:
I'm Garren Windspear. What goes on here? I've seen many a strange thing in my time, but the events of the past few moments tops them all.
Who are you that can change shape so readily, and why have you slain these beasts that become men?
It appears that you have been tricked into killing these knights! Though the priests of Helm will not believe what has happened. They will seek justice, and only your head will suffice.
I suggest that you take sanctuary with me until you can discover how this unfortunate event came to pass. My cabin is but a short distance south of here. I will meet you there.

kbs.name: Jierdan Firkraag
kbs.description: a man who hates Garren Windspear

plots: Garren Windspear left his home in the player's care
Jierdan Firkraag and his hooligans kidnapped Garren Windspear's daughter from Garren Windspear's home
the player will travel unmolested, because Garren Windspear pleaded the player's virtue at the Radiant Heart

quest.title: Rescue Garren's Child from Firkraag
quest.objective: rescue Garren Windspear's daughter, and avenge the slain knights of the Radiant Heart
tasks: Travel to the ruins in the northeast.
find Jierdan Firkraag
rescue Garren Windspear's daughter, and avenge the slain knights of the Radiant Heart
quest.description:
My daughter is gone! I left my home in your care! I... I... no, no, I know it was not you... I know who my enemies are. Damn that Jierdan Firkraag! What is his grief with me?! I don't know where you will find him. His hooligans prevent searching. I don't know... Perhaps the ruins in the northeast? I don't know...
Please rescue my child, no matter the risk. You will travel unmolested, for my pleas of your virtue were heard at the Radiant Heart. They demand justice for the slain knights, so that is your task now. Do this, and your honor shall be restored.

plots: the player is a noble
Tolmas Bendelia's caravan was waylaid by bandits
Tolmas Bendelia owns the deed to more than one local farmhold

quest.title: The Angry Merchant
quest.objective: find out why Tolmas Bendelia is angry
tasks: grant an audience to Tolmas Bendelia
find out why Tolmas Bendelia is angry
quest.description:
Greetings, Your Grace. I actually have a rather angry merchant by the name of Tolmas Bendelia that has been demanding to see you.
It might have something to do with his caravan being waylaid by bandits passing through the region, but he refuses to speak to anyone but Your Grace. He is an influential merchant in this area; I believe he owns the deed to more than one local farmhold. Will you grant this man an audience, my liege? I shall show him in.

kbs.name: Cernick
kbs.description: the player's captain of the guard

kbs.name: Lastin
kbs.description: a new male guard, and one of the player's subjects

plots: the player is a noble
there have been minor thefts in the player's keep: Cernick investigated the thefts and caught Lastin taking a necklace that belonged to Lady de'Arnise
Lastin has confessed his crime
the player is being watched carefully by the people who oppose the player's rule

quest.title: The Thieving Guard
quest.objective: punish Lastin for thieving in the keep
tasks: decide punishment on Lastin
punish Lastin for thieving in the keep
quest.description:
Greetings, my liege. It is I, Cernick, your captain of the guard.
I am not sure if you have been aware, but we have been experiencing a number of thefts in the keep over the past couple of weeks. A goblet, some silverware, a few coins from the servants' quarters. All of these things have value, although none of them were major thefts.
Still... I investigated. Lastin here is one of the new guards. I caught him red-handed, attempting to take a necklace that belonged to the late Lady de'Arnise. Lastin has confessed his crime. I am unsure how to punish him, my liege, so I have brought this before you.
He is your subject, my liege, so yours is the right to decide punishment, but you are also... being watched carefully by those who oppose your rule, however.

plots: the player is a noble: Bolumir would like to be the chaplain of the player's keep
Bolumir does not promise to stay long at the player's keep

quest.title: The Priest of Tempus
quest.objective: deal with Bolumir
tasks: decide whether to accept Bolumir's offer or not
deal with Bolumir
quest.description:
My name be Bolumir, priest of Tempus, the god of battles!
Hahr... it has been some time since I have rested my feet in any place, to tell the truth. I've been wandering for many a year now. The traveling does wear on me, to tell the truth. I've come to ask if you've a chapel that a priest of Tempus might set himself up in... bring the good Word to the folk of the area.
What do you say, eh? If my manner does not strike you as offensive, I would be glad to be chaplain of your wee keep here. I can help your people here much while I stay. But I do not promise to stay for long. Either you accept me or you don't, my liege... that is your choice, and I'll not begrudge it you.

kbs.name: a tomb
relations: within the city in tombs such as this one

kbs.name: within the city in tombs such as this one
kbs.description: within the city in tombs such as this one

plots: Kangaxx has been cursed to eternal entrapment in this tomb by his enemies
Kangaxx's curse can be reversed by collecting the pieces of his body: he will become mortal again

quest.title: Restore Kangaxx's Body
quest.objective: reverse Kangaxx's curse
tasks: Make your way to within the city in tombs such as this one.
find Kangaxx's arms, legs, and torso
reverse Kangaxx's curse
quest.description:
I am Kangaxx, and I have been cursed. I am dead yet not dead.
Cursed to eternal entrapment in this tomb by cruel enemies! Cursed to a fate worse than death! But the curse can be reversed! With your assistance, I may live again. I have suffered for so long... will you help me?
The fiends that did this to me keep me from returning by tearing apart my mortal form and keeping the pieces separated. You must find my body that I might again take mortal form. The pieces are very close! I have no doubt that they lie within the city in tombs such as this. My enemies are predictable if nothing else. Seek my arms, legs, and torso.
I will give you anything you want. Power, riches beyond number! Anything!

plots: there are five empty chests
a famous person will appear in front of each empty chest: each famous person will give the player a gift that belongs to another famous person and will give a hint about the gift's owner
the player must place each gift to the correct chest behind each famous person

quest.title: Game of the Imps
quest.objective: play the imps' game
tasks: place the gifts, and talk to the imps
play the imps' game
quest.description:
We are two imps, little demonic people. We want to play a game.
Okay, big peoples... this is how our game will go! There is five chests here with nothings in them! In front of each empty chest, a famous big people will appear! Famous big people! Oh, yes, powerful famous big people! Each famous big people will give you a gift that belongs to another famous big people... and they will hints to you what gifts belong to them! If you thinks you knows which famous big people a gift belongs to, you puts it in the empty chest behind them, yes? Very simple!
Once you places all five, you comes and asks us! If you wrong, we laugh at you! If you right, we open the sixth chest! The sixth chest has all of the drow's treasure! All of it!

plots: the player is a noble
Chanelle was an orphan who was took in by the de'Arnise family: the player is Chanelle's guardian as the ruler of the keep
no one can marry Chanelle without the player's permission

quest.title: The Maid & Her Suitors
quest.objective: decide who gets to marry Chanelle
tasks: go see Chanelle and her two suitors
decide who gets to marry Chanelle
quest.description:
Greetings, Your Grace. It is I, the majordomo of your castle. We have a small problem here at the keep, one that I doubt that you would be aware of at all.
I am unsure if you have met Chanelle... She has been a maid here most of her life. She was an orphan, and the de'Arnise family took her in as a servant when she was young. As the ruler of the keep, you are technically her guardian. Ordinarily, that would not be a problem, but there are two men who desire her hand in marriage. It is... up to you, my liege, to give her away and decide which of the men has your blessing for the marriage.
I shall bring them in to see you, my liege. If you do not resolve this issue, then... no one shall be permitted to marry Chanelle. And I am sure that is not what she wants.

kbs.name: Higgold
kbs.description: enthusiastic director of theatricals, musicals, and other entertainments, from Calimport

plots: the player and Higgold are in front of the player's playhouse
Higgold will look for actors and a play to put in production for a week: six weeks after that the playhouse will start producing coin
Higgold will send the player a message when he's ready to go

quest.title: Running the Playhouse
quest.objective: provide the investment to stage the play, and make important decisions about the play
tasks: wait for a message from Higgold
provide the investment to stage the play, and make important decisions about the play
quest.description:
Greetings, greetings, greetings! I am Higgold, director of fine theatricals, musicals, and other entertainments. Most recently from Calimport, where I needn't return quickly due to the sensitivity of one particular huzzah...
..but we needn't get into that. Now, let's see... yes, mm-hm... yes, this looks like a fine playhouse. I know a few actors that aren't working, but it'll take some time to find them, as well as a worthy play to put into production. A week for that, I think. About six weeks after that for rehearsing and then this playhouse of yours should start making decent coin, so long as all goes well.
Your part, my good friend, is to provide the investment to stage the play as well as make important decisions. You'll also reap the majority of the profits. I'll start looking for actors and a play right away. It shouldn't take more than half a week, and I'll send word as soon as I'm ready to go.

kbs.name: Karenina
kbs.description: the lead female role in "The Sorcerer's Bane"

kbs.name: "The Sorcerer's Bane"
kbs.description: a grand epic about the pride of a great sorcerer and the love that is his downfall

plots: the player is Higgold's patron
Higgold has gathered together a play and a troupe of actors like he promised: the play is "The Sorcerer's Bane"
Higgold shall introduce the player both actresses and the rest of the actors

quest.title: Who to Star
quest.objective: choose who will play Karenina
tasks: choose between two female actresses who are desperate for the part of Karenina
choose who will play Karenina
quest.description:
It is good to see you again, my patron. I have managed to gather together a play as well as a troupe of actors, as I promised.
They are a fine lot. I have worked with some, and they should serve well. As for the play, I have come across a translated copy of, uh, "The Sorcerer's Bane." You will like it, my patron. A grand epic about the pride of a great sorcerer and the love that is his downfall. Seldom performed, but well attended when it is.
The only problem I am having is deciding who will play Karenina, the lead female role. There are two actresses in the troupe who are desperate for the part. I know them both well and cannot decide, so I shall leave the choice to you. Here... I shall introduce you to both of them, as well as the rest of the actors.

kbs.name: Higgold
kbs.description: the player's director producing the play

plots: the player is the patron of the playhouse
Higgold and others are making progress in rehearsals, but strange things have been happening
actors believe there is a curse assailing them

quest.title: The Curse?
quest.objective: investigate the strange things that have occurred during the production of the play
tasks: talk to the person who has offered to help with the curse
investigate the strange things that have occurred during the production of the play
quest.description:
You... would not believe what has been occurring. We are finally making progress in rehearsals, and now... other things are happening... We've had props inexplicably fall from tables! A cistern broke and ruined an entire backdrop! An actress slipped yesterday and almost broke her foot! There's been other strange things, too... noises during the night, creakings and moanings. One of the stagers almost died falling out of the rafters!
All the actors are frightened; they believe the curse is assailing us, and I... am beginning to believe it too. Oh, what a fool I was to disregard it!
You are the patron of the playhouse... I need you to talk to someone who has offered to help.

plots: the player is Higgold's patron
the Turmish fanatics are not permitting the play: the dress rehearsal is supposed to be tomorrow

quest.title: Barbarians Have Invaded the Theatre
quest.objective: do something about the Turmish fanatics
tasks: Go to the playhouse.
stop the Turmish fanatics
do something about the Turmish fanatics
quest.description:
Ah! Patron! This is unbelievable! There are... a group of Turmish fanatics in the playhouse! They have taken it over!
They charged in and scared the cast to death yelling nonsense about not permitting the play! They said they would sooner burn the playhouse than allow the show! And the dress rehearsal is supposed to be tomorrow! Gah! Patron, you've got to do something! Stop them, please!

kbs.name: Velden
kbs.description: the main character of the play

plots: the player is Higgold's patron, and a bard
Zaren is ill: the player must replace him
the player observed the rehearsals of the play

quest.title: Who's the Big Star?
quest.objective: do not upset the member of the city council who is among the audience of the play
tasks: Make your way to playhouse.
play Velden in the play
do not upset the member of the city council who is among the audience of the play
quest.description:
Ooooh... my patron... We have a real problem. A very large problem. A gigantic problem!
One of... one of the council members is here... or, at least, I believe he is one! On opening night! This... this could make or break the playhouse! And Zaren... Zaren is ill! Deathly ill! He cannot even move from his bed! I see only one chance... it's too late for anything else... You must play Velden. You are a bard, naturally gifted... you observed our rehearsals.
Please, my patron, I'm begging you! This could be the biggest chance for all of us! And... and we mustn't upset the council member! PLEASE, you must do it!

kbs.name: Jaheira
kbs.description: the player's angry, yet weary companion

kbs.name: Ployer
kbs.description: a fat male slaver, who hates Jaheira

kbs.name: Belgrade
kbs.description: a male merchant who helped to expose Ployer for his crimes

plots: Ployer has cursed Jaheira: the curse might resist removal by normal means
all magic is regulated in Athkatla
Ployer spoke to Jaheira before: Ployer mentioned that he lived in squalor, and also mentioned Belgrade

quest.title: Save Jaheira from Ployer's Curse
quest.objective: break Jaheira's curse
tasks: Make your way to poor section of Athkatla.
Arrive at the government building in Athkatla.
Make your way to Copper Coronet.
seek out Ployer
ask about the mages in strange colors who were with Ployer
ask about Belgrade from Bernard
break Jaheira's curse
quest.description:
Ployer! That... that fat excuse for a slaver, he's cursed me! Damn him! If the curse was tailored to me, it might resist removal by normal means. I doubt Ployer would have done this if the solution were simple.
I have a few options. Ployer mentioned that he lived in squalor, suggesting he may be in the poor section of the city. Not likely to find him quick though. The mages with him wore odd colors that might be traceable. Ask at the government building, as all magic is regulated in Athkatla. If they will talk... He also mentioned Belgrade, a merchant that helped expose Ployer. He frequents the Copper Coronet, and the bartender Bernard might know his whereabouts.
My very bones ache today. It is as though I age on the inside. Ohh, this cannot go on for long. We must remove this curse!

kbs.name: Sir Ryan Trawl
kbs.description: from the Most Noble Order of the Radiant Heart

kbs.name: Anarg
kbs.description: a charismatic man who used to be one of the highest-ranking officers in the Most Noble Order of the Radiant Heart

plots: Sir Ryan Trawl has heard of the player
Anarg was implicated in smuggling slaves: he was expelled from the Most Noble Order of the Radiant Heart
Anarg took some young knights of the Most Noble Order of the Radiant Heart with him
if the player considers the Fallen Paladins a threat, they are free to do what they consider necessary

quest.title: Investigate the Fallen Paladins
quest.objective: investigate the Fallen Paladins
tasks: Find your way to Bridge District.
join the Fallen Paladins
investigate the Fallen Paladins
quest.description:
Greetings, traveler. I am Sir Ryan Trawl. I have heard of you. I would like to offer you the opportunity to help the Most Noble Order of the Radiant Heart.
The task of being a paladin is not easy. Many break under the demands of our path and leave to pursue avenues of life more appropriate to their talents. Sometimes they bend instead of break, twisting their paladinhood to serve their own purpose. These are hard to detect, but when found, they are quickly cast out.
Recently, one of our highest-ranking officers was implicated in smuggling slaves. His name is Anarg, and though he was once a friend, he was expelled from the Order. We thought that the end of it, but Anarg took others when he left. He is a charismatic man, and some of the younger knights were swayed by his words. We could tolerate their loss, but they masquerade as paladins, abusing our good name. They extort, smuggle slaves, and spit on all that we honor. The Fallen Paladins, as they're known, would recognize any of our Order, and some also fear conflict with former friends, so we need outside help in this matter.
The Fallen Paladins always need warriors to aid their illegal activities. We want you to ally with them, especially Anarg. He's the key to them all. If you consider these men a threat, then do what you think is necessary. Gloves of Healing would be a suitable reward for the task, I think.
Anarg has kept their activities localized in the Bridge District. I suggest you search there. May Torm be with you.

kbs.name: Danno
kbs.description: a distressed man who knows the player

kbs.name: Pala
kbs.description: the player's sister, and Danno's crush

plots: Danno bought a love potion from Wallace at the market square: Danno gave Pala the love potion
Pala drank the love potion and collapsed

quest.title: Save Pala
quest.objective: save Pala from poisoning
tasks: Proceed to Trademeet.
meet Danno in Trademeet
save Pala from poisoning
quest.description:
Oh, Mazzy! Thank the gods that I've found you! I've hurt Pala!
You have to save her! I didn't mean to do it. I bought a love potion from Wallace the peddler at the market square. I just wanted her to love me. She only had a sip of it, and she collapsed.
She is with your mother, Mazzy. How was I to know it was poison? Oh, please hurry! I will meet you in Trademeet.

plots: Quallo is standing next to a creature that he calls a friend
the blade is hidden

quest.title: Solve the Riddle of the Sewers
quest.objective: follow the One's path, and return to Quallo
tasks: Head to where the topside filth drains.
find the clues from the One
follow the One's path, and return to Quallo
quest.description:
I'm Quallo, and this thing here is my friend.
You have come for the blade, I suppose. It is as we have always expected, my friend. (He glances to the creature beside him.) Too long in this pit, too long.
The gleam in your eye! It belies your greed, your passion. I've found this blade, child! It is hidden most insidiously. A cruel jest has been played upon us all. My friend here knows this!
The One has left clues for you. Have you not found the clues? Where the topside filth drains, there are the clues. Return to me ere you follow the One's path, for there is much that you must learn.

plots: there are guards on the streets: there's been a string of killings
the murderer has been killing paupers, sometimes in the alley where they sleep
the murderer flays his victims alive

quest.title: Solve the "Skinner" Murders
quest.objective: bring information about the murders to Lieutenant Aegisfield
tasks: find information about the murders
bring information about the murders to Lieutenant Aegisfield
quest.description:
I'm Lieutenant Aegisfield. I'm warning everyone so as to get the word out that there are guards on the streets. We've had a... a string of killings, and I don't want any more happening.
Bandits I can understand; they are easy enough to figure out. What's happening here is... it's murder, but not like I've ever seen. There's a disgustingly sick person out there, and I simply don't have the manpower to protect everyone. He's been killing paupers, sometimes in the alley where they sleep. They have nothing to take. He kills them and that is all. Not only is it pointless, but he does it in as painful a way as possible. It's... it's sick. He flays them... alive. There has been blood all over the area.
I must go about my rounds. If you find any information about the murders, be sure to let me know. Don't go looking for trouble though.

plots: Jaheira kept the player waiting as there were things she had to take care of
Jaheira was asked to bring the player to the Harper Hold

quest.title: Summoned to the Harper Hold
quest.objective: see the Harpers with Jaheira
tasks: Travel to Harper Hold in Athkatla.
go with Jaheira
see the Harpers with Jaheira
quest.description:
Hail there! I said I would return, and I have. Sorry to have kept you waiting, but there were things I had to take care of. Now that we have met once again, there is something I must ask of you.
We must go to the Harper Hold in Athkatla. I have been asked to bring you, and we must go soon. They will allow us to pass the wards of the door, but I must be with you.

kbs.name: Therndle Daglefodd
kbs.description: a merchant and a worried father

plots: Therndle Daglefodd cannot work without knowing his sons fate

quest.title: A Son Missing
quest.objective: find out what happened to Bedlen Daglefodd

find out what happened to Bedlen Daglefodd
quest.description:
I'm Therndle Daglefodd, a merchant.
My child, Bedlen Daglefodd, has been missing for a tunnel's worth of digging. I simply cannot work without knowing his fate.
Could you have a look for him?

kbs.name: Lord Skarmaen
kbs.description: a nobleman who hates Lilith, one of the Alibakkars

kbs.name: the tomb of the founder of Trademeet in the graveyard

Lord Skarmaen wants the Mantle of Waukeen to prove that his family founded Trademeet

quest.title: The Dueling Families of Trademeet
quest.objective: bring the Mantle of Waukeen to Lord Skarmaen
tasks: Make your way to the tomb of the founder of Trademeet in the graveyard.
find the Mantle of Waukeen
bring the Mantle of Waukeen to Lord Skarmaen
quest.description:
Hello once again!
It is pleasing to see that you did not respond to the call of that harlot, Lilith Lurraxol. The woman is too deluded to see the truth, as I said. A commoner that has risen above her station. Our two houses have been feuding for generations. The Lurraxols seem to be possessed of the notion that their family founded this town... what an absurd thought!
Why they would even presume to suppose such a thing, I have no idea. It is sad, however, that the Alibakkars have never had the evidence to prove our claim to them... though it galls me that we would need it. All that has recently changed. An old tome belonging to my family states that there is proof — that proof can be found right here in Trademeet. In the graveyard is a tomb that has been long abandoned... but which also houses the founder of the town. My ancestor. With him lies a large circlet called the Mantle of Waukeen.
Possessing that circlet would be all the proof I need, so I wish to acquire it. I would do so myself, but there happens to be a good reason the tomb is abandoned. It is... haunted, so they say. The exact nature of its danger I do not know... but you are a hero who surely could face its perils and return safely with the mantle, yes? In return, I shall pay you 1,000 gold. I shall give you the key, then, which will allow you into the tomb... the key itself having been in my family for some time as well. More proof, yes? Go, then, and return with the mantle.

kbs.name: Lady Lilith
kbs.description: a noblewoman who hates Skarmaen, a member of the Lurraxol family

kbs.name: the tomb of the founder of Trademeet in the Trademeet graveyard
kbs.description: the tomb of the founder of Trademeet in the Trademeet graveyard

kbs.name: Skarmaen

kbs.name: Mantle of Waukeen

plots: the player is the hero of Trademeet
the player spoke to Skarmaen before
the Alibakkars and the Lurraxols have been feuding for generations
the Alibakkars refuse to acknowledge the fact that the Lurraxols are the only true noble family in Trademeet, having founded it
Lady Lilith wants the Mantle of Waukeen to prove that her family founded Trademeet
Lady Lilith will give the player the key to the tomb

quest.title: The Battle of Families
quest.objective: bring the Mantle of Waukeen to Lady Lilith
tasks: Arrive at the tomb of the founder of Trademeet in the Trademeet graveyard.
find the Mantle of Waukeen
bring the Mantle of Waukeen to Lady Lilith
quest.description:
Ah! It is the hero of Trademeet, come to see me at last. I trust that all is well? That pig, Skarmaen Alibakkar, did not speak too harshly about me, I trust? No matter. He is a stubborn, deluded fool. Our families have been at odds for generations, you see. The Alibakkars refuse to acknowledge the fact that we are the only true noble family in Trademeet, having founded it. Why they would think themselves higher than they are is beyond my ken. What is unfortunate, however, is that my family has never had actual, physical proof of the truth of our claim.
That has changed, however. A tome has recently been uncovered... an old tome belonging to my family... that states there is proof right here in Trademeet under our noses. In the graveyard, here in town, lies the crypt of the founder... my ancestor. With him lies the Mantle of Waukeen. A pretty name for an old gold circlet. That circlet, however, would prove my claim once and for all and shut those Alibakkars up. I would get it myself, but the tomb is haunted, you see. Here is the key to the tomb... the fact that we possess it is yet more proof of our legitimacy. Use it to enter and obtain the mantle, and then return to me when you are done.
You are a hero who might enter that tomb and retrieve the circlet for me, if you are willing. In return, I will pay you 1,000 gold. What do you say, my hero?

plots: Bodhi wants to break a monopoly in this town
the shipment of supplies arrives by boat: if the player does not get the shipment of supplies in the next few days, the player will fail

quest.title: Breaking a Monopoly
quest.objective: weaken the "resources" of the Shadow Thieves
tasks: Find your way to the docks.
steal the shipment of supplies belonging to the Shadow Thieves
weaken the "resources" of the Shadow Thieves
quest.description:
I am Bodhi, and I greet you warmly.
There is a monopoly in this town, and I intend to break it. I will ask you to weaken the "resources" of the Shadow Thieves. I wish a campaign of disruption, and you will begin it. There is a shipment of supplies arriving by boat. You are to... confiscate it.
I suggest you move against that ship coming in. They won't be at the docks for long, and if you do not get the cargo in the next few days, you will fail.
Farewell and good fortune.

kbs.description: a courteous woman, and an enemy of the Shadow Thieves

quest.title: A Rescue Mission
quest.objective: do not let the Shadow Thieves kill Palern Flynn
tasks: Arrive at on the second floor of the Shadow Thief guild house.
rescue Palern Flynn
do not let the Shadow Thieves kill Palern Flynn
quest.description:
I will give you your next assignment.
The Shadow Thieves have other enemies besides me. Recently, they uncovered a traitor, and have been questioning him quite ruthlessly for some days now.
You will rescue him. He will be killed once they are through, so go quickly. They have him at the Shadow Thief guild house on the second floor. You know the building, I think? The man's name is Palern Flynn. Remember, if he dies, you fail.
Good luck.

kbs.name: Bodhi
kbs.description: a well-spoken woman who hates the Shadow Thieves

kbs.name: Senior Armagaran Vulova's small house, in the Government District, between the jail and the government building
kbs.description: Senior Armagaran Vulova's small house, in the Government District, between the jail and the government building

quest.title: A Misguided Murder
quest.objective: pin the murder of Senior Armagaran Vulova on the Shadow Thieves
tasks: Make your way to Senior Armagaran Vulova's small house, in the Government District, between the jail and the government building.
murder Senior Armagaran Vulova
pin the murder of Senior Armagaran Vulova on the Shadow Thieves
quest.description:
Now I ask for a more specific task that will disrupt the Shadow Thieves further.
The task is... unseemly.
It calls for the murder of a man. Not a truly innocent man, but hardly a villain of epic scope. You must kill, blaming the murder on the Shadow Thieves. He is head of a merchant house, and his link to Shadow Thieves is blatant. If he were to die and certain gear were at the scene, it would implicate the guild we oppose.
Take this cloak and dagger, and go kill Senior Armagaran Vulova. When he is dead, put the cloak and dagger in the fountain in his house. He will die easily, though there may be guards. His small house is in the Government District, between the jail and the government building.
Go.

kbs.name: Aran Linvail, the Shadowmaster

quest.title: To Kill a Guild
quest.objective: kill Aran Linvail
tasks: Go to the basement of the Shadow Thief guild house.
find a way to access Aran Linvail's sanctum
kill Aran Linvail
quest.description:
Again, I require your talents. Now to the task at hand.
It is time to take down the leadership of the Shadow Thieves and throw them into a more permanent disarray from which they may not recover. You must invade their lair one last time. You must kill Aran Linvail, the Shadowmaster. Do this for me, and our arrangement will be fulfilled.
Aran is in the basement of the Shadow Thief guild house, so you need a key. The lock is likely unpickable. What good is a lock in a thieves' guild if any thief can pick it?
One more thing: Tizzak, an employee of mine, is missing, and the Thieves may have him. Find him, and he may tell you how to access Aran's sanctum. Go now!

kbs.name: Tolgerias
kbs.description: a man, and one of the masters of the Athkatla order of the Cowled Wizards

plots: Tolgerias seeks to employ the player in a matter of some urgency: Madeen has been given little knowledge of the matter

quest.objective: find out what Tolgerias wants you to do

speak with Tolgerias
find out what Tolgerias wants you to do
quest.description:
Greetings. I am Madeen. I represent one of the masters of the Athkatla order of the Cowled Wizards. He seeks to employ you in a matter of some urgency.
The matter is most sensitive... I have been given little knowledge of it. Tolgerias, the one whom I speak for, is eager to meet with you and discuss these matters.
Master Tolgerias can be found in the government building behind me... you may go within. Do not tarry overlong, my friend.

kbs.name: Tolgerias
kbs.description: a member of the Amnian Cowled Wizards

kbs.name: Athkatla

plots: magic is hated in Amn

quest.title: The Hunt for Valygar Corthala
quest.objective: deliver Valygar Corthala to the Cowled Wizards dead or alive
tasks: Make your way to Valygar Corthala's house in the Docks District of Athkatla, or Umar Hills.
track down Valygar Corthala
deliver Valygar Corthala to the Cowled Wizards dead or alive
quest.description:
I am Tolgerias, a proud member of the Amnian Cowled Wizards.
This matter must be handled with discretion and expediency. There is something that has been plaguing us for more than a week now and has become quite alarming.
You know of the prevailing attitude against magic here in Amn, yes? Well, amongst some it is even worse than that... a burning, palpable hatred. One particular man here in Athkatla has murdered two of our number in cold blood. He is currently in hiding, and we need you to track the fellow down. We have been unable to do so, much to our frustration. Cowled Wizards cannot be assaulted without repercussions or it will lead to... serious problems.
He is Valygar Corthala, last son of a wealthy family and a true brute. Ask around and you may discover if he is hiding within the city or someplace else. He has a home here in the Docks District, or he may have fled to the Umar Hills. His friends and servants will not speak to us, but they may to you.
We do not ask that you commit any murder. We wish Valygar be delivered to us, that is all. He will likely resist, so if you must kill him, so be it. But if you do kill him, I simply must have his body. Valygar must be delivered to us whether he is dead or alive. You understand, yes?

kbs.name: Ama
kbs.description: a woman, and Shadowmaster of Eastern Esmeltaran

kbs.name: Shadowmaster
kbs.description: a guildmaster of the Shadow Thieves

plots: the player is a Shadowmaster of the Shadow Thieves
Sir Greshal has been trying to muscle into a relationship with the Shadow Thieves
Sir Greshal wishes to be introduced to a Shadow Thieves' contact here in the city: that contact will be the player
Ama will dispense a runner to get Sir Greshal after the player meets her

quest.title: Government Relations
quest.objective: help Ama kill Sir Greshal
tasks: Go to Waukeen's Promenade.
meet Ama after dark
help Ama kill Sir Greshal
quest.description:
My name is Ama, and I am Shadowmaster of Eastern Esmeltaran.
I would like you to participate in a little rendezvous and help in the removal of a pest. There is a government official, Sir Greshal, causing us no end of trouble with his tariffs and spot checks on caravans. This fool thinks he can stifle the thieving trade of an entire city. He has been trying to muscle into a relationship with the Shadow Thieves, and while we could pay, it is better that we send a message to any of his cohorts. I have come here with a promise of granting his wishes, but I only want to lure him away from his palisade defenses. This is where you come in.
Sir Greshal wishes to be introduced to a contact here in the city, and that contact will be you. The meeting is already set up, and when he arrives, we will take him by surprise. You are known somewhat in this place, if not as a guildmaster. He will believe you are a legitimate contact. He seems willing to believe anything, so long as it is theatrical.
It will be any evening that is best for you. I will await you in Waukeen's Promenade after dark and then dispense a runner to get Sir Greshal. The suddenness will seem dramatic to him.

plots: Mironda is not good with names

quest.title: A Beer for Mironda
quest.objective: bring a cask of Halfling's Help to Mironda
tasks: Travel to Trademeet.
get the cask from Old Vyatri
bring a cask of Halfling's Help to Mironda
quest.description:
Name's Mironda. Pleased to see yer face and make its acquaintance. I'm no good with names; if ye can remember mine, ye've already beaten me. I forgot yers by the end of the first syllable.
Maybe it's the wild mage in me comin' out, but I can't stand not tastin' something new once in a while. Most dwarves will drink the same mountain swill from crib to dust-crib, but I'm always hankering for the latest brew. Old Vyatri in Trademeet was just getting a shipment from Luiren I'd dearly love to sample. If ye happen to run by his place in yer travels, get a cask of it for me and I'll pay ye well!
Can't wait to taste it. Halfling's Help, it's called — I hope it works on dwarves, too

kbs.name: Mateo
kbs.description: a young man, and a faithful soldier

kbs.name: Ardic Santele
kbs.description: the missing son of Countess Santele, and the primary witness in the traitor investigation

plots: someone opened a secret gate into Saradush: the enemy came through a small sewer outlet that was protected by both a locked iron grate and several powerful magical wards
the Saradush guard found three soldiers in the area: Mateo, Ardic Santele, and Kiser Jhaeri
Countess Santele told the Saradush guard that Ardic Santele had implicated Mateo before Ardic Santele disappeared
the jailer will let the player see Mateo

quest.title: Justice for Mateo
quest.objective: discover the real traitor
tasks: Find your way to Mateo's cell.
talk to Mateo
discover the real traitor
quest.description:
My name is Captain Samand, and I'm a very busy man right now.
A few days ago, someone opened a secret gate into the town — Saradush could easily have been overrun. We just discovered the traitor was a young man named Mateo. There's no doubt in my mind that *someone* betrayed us. The enemy came through a small sewer outlet that was protected by both a locked iron grate and several powerful magical wards. There is no way to open that entrance from the outside. But Mateo is a faithful soldier, not the type of man to betray Saradush.
An alarm was raised, and my soldiers arrived only a few moments after the gate was opened. We found three soldiers in the area: Mateo, Ardic Santele, and the merchant Kiser Jhaeri. We didn't get a chance to complete our investigations. Ardic, the son of the Countess Santele, disappeared. He was our primary witness. Our attention was focused on the vile Kiser Jhaeri, but we had no proof. Then the countess told us that Ardic, her son, had implicated Mateo before he disappeared.
If you wish to investigate further, I will not stand in your way. Speak to Mateo in his cell. The jailer will let you see him.

kbs.name: Lazarus Librarus
kbs.description: a wizard merchant with magical wares, and a newcomer in this town

plots: Lazarus Librarus' does not have anything for the player to purchase
Lazarus Librarus' spellbook was stolen: he cannot fashion scrolls without his spellbook
Lazarus Librarus suspected Hectan, but he was at the local pub from dusk until dawn the night of the theft

quest.title: Lazarus' Missing Spellbook
quest.objective: return Lazarus Librarus' spellbook to him
tasks: Reach Tankard Tree.
talk to Hectan
return Lazarus Librarus' spellbook to him
quest.description:
Lazarus Librarus at your service. I would normally invite you to look at my magical wares, but alas, my shelves are completely bare. I have not even a single parchment left for you to purchase.
My spellbook has been stolen! Without it, I cannot fashion the powerful scrolls which normally fill my shop. Please, mighty traveler... I beg of you to help a humble wizard! At first, I suspected Hectan... he is well known about town for his sticky fingers. But after questioning many witnesses, it is clear that Hectan was at the local pub from dusk until dawn the night of the theft. I still suspect that no-good thief Hectan was involved — I can clearly see the guilt in his face! But there is no proof. Without my spellbook, I am virtually powerless to pursue this myself, and as a newcomer to this town, I have no one to turn to for help.
I regret that there is little else I can tell you. Hectan can usually be found in the Tankard Tree if you wish to question him.
I urge you godspeed.

kbs.name: Marlowe
relations: Marlowe's home, a simple, safe dwelling atop the east cliff

kbs.name: Marlowe's home, a simple, safe dwelling atop the east cliff
kbs.description: Marlowe's home, a simple, safe dwelling atop the east cliff

plots: Marlowe assumes that the player is one of the strangers that all the locals have been talking about, an adventurer from the north
Marlowe and his daughter shall surely perish without the player's help

quest.title: Marlowe's Plea for Help
quest.objective: find out what Marlowe needs help with
tasks: Arrive at Marlowe's home, a simple, safe dwelling atop the east cliff.
talk to Marlowe
find out what Marlowe needs help with
quest.description:
Excuse me, I... I do not mean to be rude... but you *are* one of the strangers that all the locals have been talking about, aren't you? An adventurer from the north? Yes, yes, of course you are. Anyone can see that you are an extraordinary person. Please forgive me.
I would not bother you, stranger, but I am in terrible peril! I need your aid! I beg you for a boon or I and my daughter both shall surely perish! I... cannot speak more of this here. Please come to my home on top of the cliff, I beg you! We can speak freely there!
My home is atop the east cliff, adventurer. It is a simple dwelling but... safe, for the moment. My name is Marlowe... please meet me there and I shall explain everything, I swear.

kbs.name: Marlowe
kbs.description: a worried father, who used to be a successful merchant in Calimshan

kbs.name: Calimshan
kbs.description: a great city to the south

kbs.name: the cavern that serves as a graveyard in this place
kbs.description: the cavern that serves as a graveyard in this place

kbs.name: Vongoethe
relations: the cavern that serves as a graveyard in this place

kbs.name: Malla
kbs.description: Marlowe's daughter, and a pure, young girl

plots: Marlowe requested the player to see him before
Vongoethe chased Marlowe and Malla here
Vongoethe desired Malla's soul: he stole it
Malla lies near death, and there is nothing the local priestess can do to help her
the monks sealed off the cavern rather than getting Marlowe's daughter's soul
the guard guarding the cavern will let in whomever Marlowe asks

quest.title: The Graveyard Lich
quest.objective: save Malla by returning her soul to her
tasks: Proceed to the cavern that serves as a graveyard in this place.
kill Vongoethe
save Malla by returning her soul to her
quest.description:
Welcome to my humble accommodations, adventurer. Will you hear out my tale?
As I said before, my name is Marlowe... I hail from Calimshan to the south, where I was a merchant. A successful one. I... suppose that is where I first came into contact with Vongoethe.
Vongoethe is a lich, adventurer. A powerful one. In Calimshan, there are many strange wonders of magic, and Vongoethe is not out of place. It is he who has chased us here, hunting us mercilessly. Vongoethe desired my poor Malla, my daughter. She is the young woman here on the bed. A... a good girl, a virgin and pure of heart. He desired her soul, he said, so I fled Calimshan with her. But he caught up to us nevertheless. And somehow he has taken her soul despite my efforts! She... she lies near death, and there is nothing the local priestess can do to help her. I know Vongoethe is in the cavern that serves as a graveyard in this place. I told the monks about him... but they sealed off the cavern rather than somehow getting my daughter's soul back as I had hoped.
Malla is the world to me! And I do not know how much longer Vongoethe will remain trapped in that cavern... he could already be loose! He will kill me and keep Malla's soul, I am sure of it!
Getting inside the cavern is not a problem. I... paid the guard there what little money I have left. I had thought to... try and get Malla's soul myself. But the guard will let in whomever I ask him to.
I have no coin left to offer you. I have bankrupted myself in trying to flee the lich's reach. But... Vongoethe himself is a powerful wizard. Surely he has items that would interest you, that you could take from him!

kbs.name: Aran Linvail
kbs.description: a man leading a guild of thieves

plots: the player is meeting Aran Linvail for the first time
Aran Linvail's shipments and employees are disappearing on the docks

quest.title: Shipment Shenanigans
quest.objective: guard Aran Linvail's shipments, and report to him if anything happens
tasks: Go to the docks.
find Mook
guard Aran Linvail's shipments, and report to him if anything happens
quest.description:
Welcome to this place. I've looked forward to seeing you. I am, as you know, Aran Linvail.
Strange things are afoot on the docks. Shipments are disappearing, as are my employees with them. We are significantly weakened by this. I think it unlikely you would be captured or wooed to the enemy. If you go to the docks and bolster the guard on the shipments, it will strengthen our position.
Go at night, and you will find my present guard captain there already, a woman by the name of Mook. Take note of anything odd that happens.
Good hunting. Report to me if anything happens. Oh, and the reward I have set aside for you... I'll let you have some magical items. You will find them useful, I am sure.

kbs.name: Aran Linvail
kbs.description: a man leading a guild of thieves

quest.title: Switching Sides
quest.objective: find the lair of the rival guild
tasks: Arrive at Five Flagons.
pose as the rival guild's new recruit to the rival guild's recruiter
find the lair of the rival guild
quest.description:
Two of our men, Jaylos and Caehan by name, are planning to leave our little community and join with our enemies. Greener grass and all of that, I suppose.
They are to meet their contact on the second floor of the Five Flagons tavern in the Bridge District. Go there and pose as one of our enemy's new recruits. I want to know where our enemy's lair is. We have yet to find it.
This recruiter could arrive at any time so I suggest that you go to the Five Flagons now. They may prove unreasonable, so prepare yourself for hostility.
Return when you have the information we need.

kbs.name: Aran Linvail
kbs.description: a man leading a guild of thieves

kbs.name: Graveyard District
kbs.description: a city district with a large graveyard

kbs.name: Bodhi
kbs.description: an intelligent, brutal female vampire, and the leader of the rival guild

plots: the player was on a mission for Aran Linvail last night: Bodhi attacked Aran Linvail's guild in the meantime
there is a network of tombs beneath the graves where another spy tracked one of Bodhi's servants: the player shall find a set of blue doors just north of a spider den
the doors are too heavy for any mortal to open: Aran Linvail sends a mage to open the doors for the player
Aran Linvail gives the player stakes: the stakes can kill vampires permanently

quest.title: A Counter-attack
quest.objective: find the rival guild's hideout, and destroy the rival guild
tasks: Go to Graveyard District.
find the rival guild's hideout
find the rival guild's hideout, and destroy the rival guild
quest.description:
You were not the only one who was busy last night.
The leader of this rival guild, Bodhi by name, made a daring attack upon us. She can only be a vampire, and I suspect many of her servants are as well. The time has come to strike back to protect our people and the city she has invaded.
Go to the Graveyard District and find their hideout. There is a network of tombs beneath the graves where another spy tracked one of Bodhi's servants. There you shall find a set of blue doors just north of a spider den. The doors are too heavy for any mortal to open, but the vampires likely pass with ease. I shall send a mage to meet you there and arrange for the doors to be opened. Here, you shall need these stakes if you are to truly finish these creatures.
Be on your guard. This Bodhi is the most intelligent and brutal foe I have ever had. If we are lax in our vigilance, we will be at the disadvantage. When you have destroyed their evil, return to me and I will fulfill our bargain.

kbs.name: Salmon Steps
kbs.description: a nearby river rich in salmon

plots: Thomas wants comfort

quest.title: Catch of the Day
quest.objective: help Thomas gather fish for his village
tasks: Arrive at Salmon Steps.
catch 16 fish
