help Thomas gather fish for his village
quest.description:
Traveler, I'm worried about my fellow villagers here in the village. I don't think that they eat enough nutritious, tasty fish.
Could you help me gather more? I simply can't catch enough fish for everyone, even if I'm a pro fisherman.
There is a river, Salmon Steps, bountiful in salmon near here. You could try your luck there, and catch 16 fish for me. I could pay you 32 shiny, green emeralds for the fish.

plots: Matt wants comfort

quest.title: Pests Be Come
quest.objective: take care of the Endermites that have been bothering the villagers
tasks: kill Endermites
take care of the Endermites that have been bothering the villagers
quest.description:
Some incredibly foolish individual's been throwing Ender Pearls all over our village! Now the whole place is crawling with Endermites!
Could you take care of those little critters before they cause any serious issues? Kill them all, and receive 16 golden carrots for your trouble. You would have all our thanks, too.

plots: Jesse wants comfort
the player is a friend of Jesse

quest.title: Waters of Life
quest.objective: help the villagers of Desert Refuge obtain a permanent source of water
tasks: build a well in Desert Refuge
help the villagers of Desert Refuge obtain a permanent source of water
quest.description:
Hail friend! It's good to see you. I'd offer you something to drink, but I'm running low on refreshments, and quite thirsty myself. We are in a desert, after all. There's not much water around...
Now that I think of it... You could actually help the whole Desert Refuge by obtaining us a permanent source of water! Build us a well, please. Ahh, I can already taste the fresh water on my lips...
I could give you this bucket of lava in exchange for a well. Just don't do anything mischievous with it, or burn yourself!

kbs.name: a village
relations: ore veins deep in the ground

kbs.name: ore veins deep in the ground
kbs.description: ore veins deep in the ground

plots: Nila wants comfort
the player is an enemy of Nila

quest.title: Gold. GOLD. GOLD!
quest.objective: bring gold ore to Nila
tasks: Reach ore veins deep in the ground.
find some gold ore
bring gold ore to Nila
quest.description:
What are YOU doing here! If it was up to me, I'd never let you in the village.
Perhaps you'd like to mend our relations? Bring me some gold ore, the more the better. You can never have enough of it; it's so beautiful. My gold. I wish to have it all to myself. Too bad it's mainly found in the ore veins deep in the ground.
I guess you could have these melon seeds as a reward. I have no use for them; melons have nothing on gold.

kbs.name: Villager's temple
relations: ancient ruins, and deep within the Overworld itself

kbs.name: ancient ruins, and deep within the Overworld itself
kbs.description: ancient ruins, and deep within the Overworld itself

plots: Paul wants comfort

quest.title: Our Father in the Sky Like the Diamonds
quest.objective: bring 9 diamonds to Paul
tasks: Head to ancient ruins, and deep within the Overworld itself.
find 9 diamonds
bring 9 diamonds to Paul
quest.description:
My child, my temple could use a donation. I have to tend the sick and needy: I cannot procure all my potion ingredients myself. I often have to participate in rather complicated trades for the ingredients.
Please, help a humble servant of the Gods: bring me 9 diamonds. I know that they are rare, but you can find still find them in ancient ruins, and even deep within the Overworld itself.
I have a vast surplus of some potion ingredients that cannot be traded further: I can give you 64 Glowstone Dust for your time and effort.

kbs.name: Bella
kbs.description: a woman tired of regular food

plots: Bella wants comfort
the player can craft golden apples by combining an apple with gold ingots

quest.title: Fine Dining
quest.objective: bring 5 golden apples to Bella
tasks: Arrive at dangerous places.
obtain 5 golden apples
bring 5 golden apples to Bella
quest.description:
I'm sick and tired of eating the same boring, mundane food every day. I want to taste something a bit more refined. Something like golden apples.
Could you help a lady in distress? Bring me 5 golden apples to sample from, and I'll procure you a diamond block. That should leave a sweet taste in your mouth, as well.
Golden apples can be found in various dangerous corners of the world. If you don't fancy exploring, you can craft golden apples by combining an apple with gold ingots.

kbs.name: Mike
kbs.description: a man who wants to redecorate his home

plots: Mike wants comfort
the player can craft banners from sticks and wool

quest.title: Flying Colors
quest.objective: bring 10 red banners to Mike
tasks: obtain 10 red banners
bring 10 red banners to Mike
quest.description:
I'd like to redecorate my home. Stranger, could you do a man a favor? Obtain ten red banners and bring them to me. I have heard that you can craft banners from sticks and wool.
I'll have 32 apples for you.

kbs.name: Justin
kbs.description: a person who wants to give a gift to someone

plots: Justin wants comfort
the player a famous hero

quest.title: Flowers for Someone Special
quest.objective: bring 32 poppies to Justin
tasks: Reach outdoors in plains and forests.
gather 32 poppies
bring 32 poppies to Justin
quest.description:
You must be the hero I have heard so much about. I have a small task for you; it should be child's play for one such as yourself.
There is someone I really care about. I'd like to gift them some flowers, perhaps some of those nice, deep red poppies.
Please, bring me 32 poppies. You can gather them almost everywhere outdoors in plains and forests. I'll have 32 emeralds waiting for you...

plots: Mister Meek wants comfort
Mister Meek has heard that the player help people

quest.title: Fleeting Strength
quest.objective: give a Potion of Strength to Mister Meek
tasks: obtain a Potion of Strength
give a Potion of Strength to Mister Meek
quest.description:
You're the one who's been helping people, right? Well, now you could help me too.
You see, I need to get my hands on a Potion of Strength. I'm not the strongest person around: for once, I'd like to carry things around as if they were mere feathers.
Give me the potion, and receive a precious diamond in return.

plots: Baba wants comfort

quest.title: Here Kitty, Kitty, Kitty
quest.objective: bring a cat to Baba
tasks: tame a cat
bring a cat to Baba
quest.description:
Hello. I'm Baba. My parents don't know how to tame animals. I want a kitty. You can have my allowance, 16 emeralds, if you bring me a kitty cat.
Can I please have a cat, traveler? You must know how to tame kitties.
Pretty please? Tame a cat and bring it to me.

plots: Lee wants comfort
cyan dye is made by combining green dye and blue dye

quest.title: Showing Your True Colors
quest.objective: bring 16 cyan dye to Lee
tasks: obtain 16 cyan dye
bring 16 cyan dye to Lee
quest.description:
I want to make my leather works more... dashing and colorful.
Bring me 16 cyan dye, and I'll reward you with 32 emeralds. You can make cyan dye by combining green dye with blue dye, I think. I'd obtain the dye myself, but the smell of my tanning chemicals attracts all sorts of unsavory creatures to me out there.

plots: Sandy wants comfort
the player is a known villain

quest.title: Where to Hang...
quest.objective: bring a painting to Sandy
tasks: obtain a painting
bring a painting to Sandy
quest.description:
*scream of terror* I.. I.. I don't want any trouble. Please, I just want to live my live in peace.
You're not going to kill me? Sinister master, may this mere woman ask a tribute from you? Please, I'd like to have a painting.
In return, you will receive 16 TNT, perfect for ramping up explosions (Preferably elsewhere).

plots: Baker wants comfort
the player is a friend of Baker

quest.title: Is Today Someone's Birthday?
quest.objective: bring a cake to Baker
tasks: bake a cake
bring a cake to Baker
quest.description:
My friend, as you might know, I'm not a man to say no to the sweeter temptations in life.
I'd be overjoyed, if you baked me a delicious cake and brought it to me.
I'm not leaving you hanging either: I have 3 golden apples for you.

kbs.name: Wilson
relations: deserts, taiga forests, and frozen regions

kbs.name: deserts, taiga forests, and frozen regions
kbs.description: deserts, taiga forests, and frozen regions

plots: Wilson wants comfort
the player is an enemy of Wilson

quest.title: It's Your Lucky Day
quest.objective: bring a rabbit's foot to Wilson
tasks: Travel to deserts, taiga forests, and frozen regions.
hunt down a rabbit
bring a rabbit's foot to Wilson
quest.description:
Oh. It's you. As if I wouldn't have enough to worry about...
Or perhaps even a devil like you has a heart. Would you help me sweep my worries away by bringing me a rabbit's foot? I'd like to feel luckier. Hunt down a rabbit. They are found in deserts, taiga forests, and frozen regions. Rabbits are quite quick on their feet, so they might keep you busy for a while.
Do this for me, and I'll give you a Potion of Leaping. That should help you jump out of my sight faster.

plots: Tammy wants comfort
the player can tame a horse by trying to mount it until it stops throwing the player off its back

quest.title: Moving to Places
quest.objective: bring a horse to Tammy
tasks: Make your way to plains and savannas.
tame a horse
bring a horse to Tammy
quest.description:
*sigh* I dream of leaving this tiny village every day. If only I had a horse... then I could go anywhere I want. Wherever my wanderlust takes me to.
Traveler, you must have covered a lot of land, learned many new skills. Please help me: tame a horse, and bring it to me. Horses are commonly found grazing plains, and their warmer cousins savannas. You can tame a horse by trying to mount it until it stops throwing you off its back. I'll pay a whole block of emeralds for it. Then I too, could take on the life on road.

plots: Greta wants comfort

quest.title: Lively Living
quest.objective: help Greta redecorate her home
tasks: place the decorations Greta gives you in her home
help Greta redecorate her home
quest.description:
My home is starting to look a bit drab. Could you help me redecorate my home here in Hamlet-By-The-Grass?
I don't know you that well; you definitely should come up with something fresh and interesting. Here. Take these decorations and place them in my home.
Afterwards, you can have this gold ingot.

plots: Romeo wants comfort
the player is a famous hero

quest.title: A Rose, My Darling
quest.objective: bring a rose to Romeo
tasks: Make your way to temperate forests.
find a rose
bring a rose to Romeo
quest.description:
Great timing, Hero. I'm suffering... my poor heart is writhing in love.
Help me find a rose for my loved one, so that my heart may yet calm down. All I need is but a single rose. They can be found in various temperate forests.
Please, help a fellow in love. I have 27 pumpkin pies I can give you.

plots: Caleb wants comfort
the player is a known villain

quest.title: Affordable Cooling
quest.objective: bring some ice to Caleb
tasks: Head to snowy tundras, in frosted rivers.
find some ice
bring some ice to Caleb
quest.description:
I know of your dark deeds. I do not want any trouble from you.
However... if you have had a change of heart, I could use a little help. The hot desert air of this village is making me rather uncomfortable. I could stave off the heat, if I had some ice.
Tell you what, bring me ice, and you may still redeem yourself, villain, and net yourself 42 cacti. Ice is commonplace in snowy tundras, in frosted rivers.

plots: Maria wants comfort
the player is a friend of Maria

quest.title: Staying Warm...
quest.objective: craft 2 campfires, and give them to Maria
tasks: collect 3 sticks, a piece of coal, and 3 wood logs
craft 2 campfires, and give them to Maria
quest.description:
Dear friend, this village is freezing cold, isn't it? This cold is turning my fingers blue, at least.
You are a highly skilled individual. May I ask you to craft a campfire or two? First, you have to collect some materials: 3 sticks, a piece of coal, and 3 wood logs.
After crafting the campfires, please give them to me. I even have something for you: 32 Blue Ice. It's slippery, blue-colored ice. I'm sure it'll prove useful to you, my friend.

plots: Will wants comfort
the player is an enemy of Will

quest.title: Spooky Shenanigans
quest.objective: give a carved pumpkin to Will
tasks: obtain a carved pumpkin
give a carved pumpkin to Will
quest.description:
Try to catch me, you big meanie! I bet you can't even carve pumpkins!
You wanna try to obtain a carved pumpkin and give it to me? I surely will not do any kind of pranks with it... like sneaking up on grownups... pinky swear.
Perhaps I'd even share my ten cookies with you. That should teach to to be nicer!

plots: Nick wants comfort
the player can craft an armor stand with 6 sticks and a smooth stone slab

quest.title: Assorted Armors
quest.objective: give an armor stand to Nick
tasks: craft an armor stand
give an armor stand to Nick
quest.description:
I just don't know where I could display my armors for sale. I know that there are armor stands that could do the job, but I'm way too busy hammering down new armors to actually go and hunt for the needed crafting materials.
You don't seem to have a day job, stranger. Could you help a busy armorer, and craft an armor stand? You could even have some of my blocks of coal for your reward. Ten blocks of coal in total.
You just need six sticks and a smooth stone slab to craft an armor stand.

kbs.name: Redstone Dust
kbs.description: a crafting ingredient that powers up contraptions

plots: Harry wants comfort
the player is an infamous person
the player can craft a piston with 3 wooden planks, 4 cobblestone, an iron ingot, and Redstone Dust

quest.title: Brain Over Brawl
quest.objective: give 10 pistons to Harry
tasks: craft 10 pistons
give 10 pistons to Harry
quest.description:
You are the person who's been causing trouble in these parts, aren't you?
Why don't we put your energy to a better use? I'm a mason, which means that I have to move large quantities of stone from one place to another. I'd like to automate that process with pistons. That would save me from backache.
The problem is I don't have the materials for making pistons, or the know-how to craft them. This is where you enter the picture. Craft 10 pistons, and then bring them to me. I know that you need 3 wooden planks, 4 cobblestone, an iron ingot, and Redstone Dust for crafting a piston.
Some quarts pillars broke while we were transporting them. You could have the remaining 32 Nether Quartz from them.

kbs.name: The End
kbs.description: a mysterious, hard to reach dimension

kbs.name: Chorus Fruits
kbs.description: strange fruits that might teleport the player a short distance when eaten

plots: Kevin wants knowledge

quest.title: A More Than Exotic Fruit
quest.objective: bring 6 Chorus Fruits to Kevin
tasks: Proceed to The End.
find 6 Chorus Fruits
bring 6 Chorus Fruits to Kevin
quest.description:
Traveler! Did you know that our dimension is one among many. There exists a dimension called "The End". It is a mysterious place, and supposedly hard to reach.
I yearn to know more about that dimension. I have heard vague rumors about fruits native to the End that might teleport you a tiny distance when digested. They are called Chorus Fruits.
If you get your hands on six Chorus Fruits, I promise to reward you well with 12 diamonds. Please help a man sate his ever-growing curiosity.

plots: Lou wants comfort
the player is a known villain

quest.title: A Distraction for Idle Hands
quest.objective: give a music disc to Lou
tasks: find a music disc
give a music disc to Lou
quest.description:
Gee! You okay? *looks at you with a blank expression* You look a dark human-thing.
Me think me know the right think to cheer you up! A quest. Me want one of those music disc thingies. Find one?
Get 6 blocks of emerald in return.

plots: Miles the Moron wants comfort
the player is a friend of Miles the Moron

quest.title: A Service Dog
quest.objective: bring a wolf to Miles the Moron
tasks: Go to Wide Woodland.
tame a wolf
bring a wolf to Miles the Moron
quest.description:
Me happy. See a friend. Hello friend!
Me would like me own wolfie. Could help me do things... Wolfies like Wide Woodland. A biggy forest. Tame a wolfie. Bring it to me. Me give you pumpkins. A load of pumpkins.

plots: Carl wants knowledge
the player is a friend of Carl

quest.title: Assistant Cartographer
quest.objective: give the map of Spruced Hills to Carl
tasks: Go to Spruced Hills.
make a map of Spruced Hills
give the map of Spruced Hills to Carl
quest.description:
I raise my face from my maps for a moment, and there you are! Just as I need the help of a trusted friend.
There are many, many regions in this world: mapping them all out is a tremendous task. I ask you to map out one of them: Spruced Hills. It is a taiga hills region, which means that there might be some rather steep hills covered in spruces and snow.
After making a map of Spruced Hills, come back here and give the map to me. I shall give you a spyglass, a fine tool for an aspiring cartographer.
Travel safely! Being mindful of your surroundings is an important skill for everyone, not just us cartographers.

plots: wants knowledge
the player is a famous hero

quest.title: Lurkers in Shadows
quest.objective: find out what the suspicious person is after
tasks: Find your way to Cocoa Hamlet.
find and follow the suspicious person at dusk
find out what the suspicious person is after
quest.description:
I almost didn't see you there, Hero. I'm succumbed in deep, dark thoughts at the moment.
Someone's been spying on our village for quite some time. I personally spotted that suspicious individual coming here around dusk.
Perhaps that person is plotting something malicious, perhaps not. Regardless, I'm worried that something bad might happen to Cocoa Hamlet. You, Hero, are the right person to find out what that suspicious person is up to. The jungle can hide many dangers in its deep thickets of trees and vines. Find and follow the suspicious person, here in Cocoa Hamlet.
We can give you a diamond for your time. An adventurer found it in an abandoned jungle temple a long time ago.

kbs.name: Ilona
relations: mushroom fields, and dimly lit places

kbs.name: mushroom fields, and dimly lit places
kbs.description: mushroom fields, and dimly lit places

plots: Ilona wants comfort
Ilona gives the player a bowl for making the mushroom stew

quest.title: Not like My Momma Makes It
quest.objective: give mushroom stew to Ilona
tasks: Arrive at mushroom fields, and dimly lit places.
find a red mushroom, and a brown mushroom
make mushroom stew
give mushroom stew to Ilona
quest.description:
My momma is allergic to mushrooms. I can't ever get delicious mushroom stew at home.
Here, take my bowl. Find one red mushroom, and another brown mushroom. Make mushroom stew in my bowl. Then, give the stew to me. Other kids say that mushrooms grow in fields, and poorly lit areas.
I loaned my momma's roses a bit. You can have the whole ten of them. I'm sure that she won't notice 'em missing.

plots: Anders wants comfort
Anders has heard that the player help people

quest.title: Look at the Time Fly
quest.objective: give a clock to Anders
tasks: obtain a clock
give a clock to Anders
quest.description:
I don't know when nightfall arrives. As night falls, the world is inherited by monsters, and outdoors become much more dangerous! Even within the village! I could be in the middle of some important task, and then a zombie might attack and kill me!
You have been helping others: maybe you could help me too. I want a clock to keep track of time more easily. Would you kindly obtain one?
I have some blocks of iron for you...

plots: Bertha wants comfort
the player is a friend of Bertha

quest.title: Colorful Carpets
quest.objective: give 6 different-colored carpets to Bertha
tasks: obtain 6 different-colored carpets
give 6 different-colored carpets to Bertha
quest.description:
The warmest greetings to you, friend!
I hope that you don't mind, but I'm feeling a bit bored right now. I could make myself a game of sorts, if I had six different-colored carpets.
You surely wouldn't leave a friend dying in boredom? Please obtain six different-colored carpets, and bring them to me. As a token of our friendship, I'm giving you a pretty painting in return.

plots: Fred wants comfort
the player is an enemy of Fred

quest.title: A Bit Bling-Bling
quest.objective: give a diamond hoe to Fred
tasks: obtain a diamond hoe
give a diamond hoe to Fred
quest.description:
Don't you go anywhere close my crops! Have you not tormented me enough already? Or are you here to reconcile?
I could use a new hoe. Perhaps even something somewhat more fancier than my old one. Alright. Bring me a diamond hoe.
Then I might forgive you. And I may even give you a small reward on top of that: 32 melons that I grew myself.

plots: Narcissos wants comfort
the player is not wearing any kind of armor

quest.title: A Fancy New Shirt
quest.objective: give a leather tunic to Narcissos
tasks: obtain a leather tunic
give a leather tunic to Narcissos
quest.description:
Aren't I just the handsomest man in this village? I'd like to become even flashier than I am now.
Even you, traveler, lack any kind of flashy armor. I could give you my old, crummy diamond chestplate so that you'd look a bit less embarrassing.
However, I want you to give me a brand new leather tunic in return.

plots: Pete wants comfort

quest.title: Safety First
quest.objective: give a turtle shell to Pete
tasks: Go to sandy beaches.
obtain a turtle shell
give a turtle shell to Pete
quest.description:
Me hurt me often. Other village-people suggest me get a helmet to protect me head.
Me seen turtles on sandy beaches. They never get hurt, because they hide in thick shells.
You give me a turtle shell? Make me safe? Me give you this sharp stick in return. It a diamond sword. It pretty, but me hurt plenty after touching it.

plots: Felicia wants comfort
the player can craft a candle by combining a honeycomb with string

quest.title: Atmospheric Lighting
quest.objective: give some candles to Felicia
tasks: obtain some candles
give some candles to Felicia
quest.description:
Monsters hide in the dark. I'm way too important to die to some mindless, monstrous rabble! Ergo, I need to light up my house thoroughly.
You sure look like a servant. Hear your mistress' command, then. Go, and fetch some candles for me. If you didn't know, you can make candles by combining a honey comb with string.
Get a move on. If your services please me, I may give you some Lapis Lazuli. Perhaps you can enchant something with it?

kbs.name: Bruce
kbs.description: a happy man who owns a cat

plots: Bruce wants comfort
the player tamed the cat for Bruce
the player can craft a lead by combining some string with a slimeball

quest.title: A Cat on a Leash
quest.objective: give a lead to Bruce
tasks: obtain a lead
give a lead to Bruce
quest.description:
Hello again! I'd like the thank you again for taming a cat for me. I'm really happy about my cat.
There is a small issue, though. I hate to trouble you further, but could you get me a lead? I just don't want my cat to wander off to dangerous places all alone. Did you know that you can craft a lead by combining some string with a slimeball?
I'll even pay you five emeralds for the lead.

plots: Luke wants comfort
the player is a friend of Luke

quest.title: Sweet Dreams
quest.objective: give a green bed to Luke
tasks: obtain a green bed
give a green bed to Luke
quest.description:
I hate working the forge all day long. People should learn to make their tools themselves! Arrgh!
I'm sorry friend. I'm just feeling quite cranky at the moment. My bed is all lumpy and uncomfortable. If only I had a better bed. That would surely improve my mood!
Could you, perhaps, obtain a bed for me? I'd prefer a green bed. Help your friend get rest at night. I'd be even willing to part from 32 emeralds for a good bed.

plots: Larry wants comfort
the player is an enemy of Larry: the player hit Larry

quest.title: Taking Notes
quest.objective: give a book and quill to Larry
tasks: obtain a book and quill
give a book and quill to Larry
quest.description:
Don't you dare to scratch my books with your breath! I have not forgotten your vile deeds. Why did you even hit me?
You can make up for your violent nature, though. Bring me a book and quill, it should help with a little project of mine. I'd love to catalog my books in a more orderly fashion.
Help me out, and I'll forgive you for hitting me. I'd even give you an enchanted book.

plots: Zara wants knowledge
the player is a known villain

quest.title: A Witch of the Wild
quest.objective: help Zara determine whether the rumors about a witch in Darkwater Bog are true
tasks: Find your way to Darkwater Bog.
search Darkwater Bog for a witch
help Zara determine whether the rumors about a witch in Darkwater Bog are true
quest.description:
Oh great. It's the evil-doer. Our village faces enough hardship even without the likes of you!
On the contrary... Perhaps evil plus evil equals good. There are rumors about a witch in living in a nearby swamp. Many villagers, myself included, worry about the presence of a witch. Would you like to search Darkwater Bog for that witch, and confirm whether the rumors are true?
Even a villain can't resist the price I'm willing to pay for that knowledge: 16 diamonds.

plots: Legolas wants knowledge

quest.title: Arrow Examination
quest.objective: bring a spectral arrow to Legolas for research
tasks: obtain a spectral arrow
bring a spectral arrow to Legolas for research
quest.description:
I have heard whispers about some strange arrows here in the village. They are known as "spectral arrows", and I'd like to find out what exactly they do to their targets. Call that my professional curiosity as a fletcher.
If you obtain a spectral arrow in your travels, I'd be happy to have it for research. I will even give you some special arrows I've made: Arrows of Weakness. Shoot an enemy with one, and you'll find them much weaker... and easier to kill.

plots: Mario wants knowledge

quest.title: Hermit Knowledge
quest.objective: ask Lone Wolf about the meaning of life, and return to Mario
tasks: Head to Lily Forest.
find Lone Wolf
ask Lone Wolf about the meaning of life, and return to Mario
quest.description:
There is a strange woman living alone out in the Lily Forest. Some say that she knows the meaning of life!
Could you find her in that flower forest, and ask her about it? I really want to hear what could possibly be the meaning of life.
When you return, I'll have a little something for you. A compass. May it point you toward your destinations in life!

plots: Lily wants knowledge
the player is an enemy of Lily
the player can get to the Nether with a portal made out of obsidian: take a look at ruined portals scattered around the world

quest.title: Intentional Game Design
quest.objective: try to sleep in a bed in the Nether, and report back to Lily
tasks: Reach Nether.
go to the Nether
try to sleep in a bed in the Nether, and report back to Lily
quest.description:
Why are you talking to me? Can't you just steer clear of me?
If you really want to do something interesting, though, I've got something fun for you. Go to the Nether. You know, the lethal hellish dimension? You can get there with a portal made out of obsidian. Take a look at the various ruined portals dotting the landscape. Try to sleep in a bed there, and report back to me. I'm very interested in hearing the results of this little experiment.
If the things I've heard about the Nether are true that should teach you a lesson... and I'll even give you a shiny diamond.

kbs.name: Test Subject
kbs.description: a depressed man from Woodland Homestead, who volunteered for Judas's experiment

plots: Judas wants knowledge
the player is a famous hero
Judas gives the player an enchanted trident: the player can channel lightning with it during thunderstorms

quest.title: Electric Shock Therapy
quest.objective: hit Test Subject with lightning, and report back to Judas
tasks: Proceed to Desolate Plains.
go to Test Subject when there's a thunderstorm
hit Test Subject with lightning, and report back to Judas
quest.description:
As a cleric, my duty is to heal the villagers of Woodland Homestead both spiritually and physically. As a hero, your duty is to help people in trouble.
I sometimes devise new treatments for various illnesses: some of my experiments are successful, the others, sadly, not so much. I would like you to assist me with an experiment. I also have a volunteer participating in the experiment as well: a depressed man from this very village.
I need you to go to the Desolate Plains, the desert just outside this village, and hit that test subject of mine with lightning when there's a thunderstorm. For this, I'm giving you an enchanted trident: you can use it to channel lightning during thunderstorms.
Finally, you should report back to me, and let me know what happened. You can keep the trident.
May the Gods be with you, hero!

plots: Dave wants knowledge
suspicious stew is mushroom stew laced with some flowers: it may have positive or negative effects on its eater

quest.title: Nothing Suspicious...
quest.objective: see what happens after eating suspicious stew, and report back to Dave
tasks: eat the suspicious stew Dave gives you
see what happens after eating suspicious stew, and report back to Dave
quest.description:
I keep the villagers fed. Without my crops, our village would surely face a famine!
Sometimes, I like to cook new foods using various natural ingredients to prepare us for poor harvests. This time, I tried to make some mushroom stew, but one of the villagers accidentally tripped, and dropped some flowers into the pot with the stew.
Traveler, could you please taste the suspicious mushroom stew? It can have either positive or negative effects on its eater. I'm giving you some.
Please see what happens after eating the suspicious stew, and report back to me. I'd hate to throw away the whole batch of mushroom stew for nothing. I'll even give you 10 emeralds for being a taster.

kbs.name: Creepers
kbs.description: [Enemy] green monsters that sneak up on people and try to blow them up along with them

kbs.name: Awesome Bow
kbs.description: a special bow crafted by Jack

plots: Jack wants knowledge

quest.title: Bowing Down Creepers
quest.objective: test out the Awesome Bow, and report back to Jack
tasks: kill 15 Creepers with the Awesome Bow
test out the Awesome Bow, and report back to Jack
quest.description:
I'm a fletcher. Bows and arrows are my domain.
In fact, I've just crafted a special Bow I've dubbed the "Awesome Bow". I just need someone to test it out.
You could be just the right person for the job. Go, and kill 15 Creepers with the Awesome Bow. I friggin' hate those green suicide bombing monsters! I'll have 32 emeralds for you, as a tester's fee.

plots: Oliver wants knowledge
Oliver has heard that the player help people

quest.title: Misguided Arrows
quest.objective: collect what a creeper drops upon death after being killed by a skeleton, and report to Oliver
tasks: make a skeleton kill a creeper
collect what a creeper drops upon death after being killed by a skeleton, and report to Oliver
quest.description:
I've been pondering about something. Village legends tell that creepers drop something very peculiar when killed by skeletons.
I have heard that you are a helpful person. Could you perhaps collect that item and report back to me? You just have to figure out how to get a skeleton kill a creeper.
This might be a difficult task to accomplish. You will be rewarded accordingly: five blocks of diamond. Surely you too are curious about what happens.

plots: Dagon wants knowledge
the player is an infamous person

quest.title: Lost Lore
quest.objective: collect "Secrets of the Overworld" for Dagon
tasks: Arrive at a jungle temple.
find "Secrets of the Overworld"
collect "Secrets of the Overworld" for Dagon
quest.description:
Arrg! Important books are just rotting away in remote places, and no one is doing a damn thing about recovering them. All that precious knowledge... lost forever.
Wait. Aren't you that infamous, misbehaving wreck of a person? I'm sorry, I have more important things to worry about than you. Unless, you want to start cleaning up your act.
I know for sure that there's this book, "Secrets of the Overworld", just laying around somewhere withing a jungle temple. Just think what moist jungle air is doing to that precious tome of forgotten knowledge! I need to find it, and collect it for me. I can't leave the village myself; no one else can tend my library!
I'm willing to pay a lot for the book: 5 blocks of emerald.

kbs.name: "The Nether: Compiled Accounts of the Hellish Plane"
kbs.description: a book about the hellish dimension the player is familiar with

plots: John wants knowledge
the player is a famous hero

quest.title: A Mine of Knowledge
quest.objective: recover "The Nether: Compiled Accounts of the Hellish Plane" for John
tasks: Find your way to a nearby mineshaft.
find "The Nether: Compiled Accounts of the Hellish Plane"
recover "The Nether: Compiled Accounts of the Hellish Plane" for John
quest.description:
To have more tomes in my library... Now that would be incredibly lovely...
Oh hero, I was just dreaming about having more precious, amazing books. Actually, you could recover a book for me. It is called "The Nether: Compiled Accounts of the Hellish Plane", and it tells about the hellish dimension your familiar with. You can find it in a nearby mineshaft.
I'm willing to part from an enchanted book, should you succeed in recovering "The Nether: Compiled Accounts of the Hellish Plane".

kbs.name: Deepwood Tower
kbs.description: an Illager outpost tower in the nearby woods

plots: Xan wants knowledge
the player is a known villain

quest.title: Pillaging the Illagers
quest.objective: bring the plans of Illagers to Xan
tasks: Reach Deepwood Tower.
steal the plans of Illagers who threaten Fishing Hamlet
bring the plans of Illagers to Xan
quest.description:
No! Go away! Please don't kill me...
Illagers are making me scared enough already! Perhaps you'd like to do something villainous, and even net a reward for it?
This village, Fishing Hamlet, has been threatened by nearby Illagers of Deepwood Tower for some time. You could go to their tower in the woods and steal their plans.
Bring the plans to me, and I'll give you an enchanted sword as a reward. Just don't test its blade on me, please!

plots: Ron wants knowledge

quest.title: Monsters Under Bed?
quest.objective: see that Ron's home is safe, and report to Ron
tasks: Proceed to Ron's home.
check that there's nothing dangerous inside
see that Ron's home is safe, and report to Ron
quest.description:
I don't feel safe in my own home. No one in this village believes me, when I tell them that something's observing me while I'm at home.
Traveler, would you like to earn an emerald? You just have to verify that there's nothing dangerous in my home. Just see that my home is safe, and tell me what you've uncovered.
This paranoia is weighting heavily on me...

kbs.name: a village
relations: a ruined portal not for from the village

kbs.name: a ruined portal not for from the village
kbs.description: a ruined portal not for from the village

plots: Reverend Revan wants knowledge

quest.title: Sinister Worship
quest.objective: investigate the cultists for Reverend Revan
tasks: Reach a ruined portal not for from the village.
spy on the cultists
investigate the cultists for Reverend Revan
quest.description:
There is a ruined portal not far from the village. My fellow villagers have seen some ominous-looking people, possibly cultists, near the portal. I am a servant of the Gods: I can't let dark cultists conduct their sinister rituals.
I'd like you to investigate these cultists: you are a stranger, thus unknown to them. Who are they? What are their intentions? You should start by heading out to the ruined portal, and spying on those cultists.
I have put aside a healing potion for you. Hopefully, you won't need to consume it immediately after your return. Godspeed to you. May you always walk on the path of light.

kbs.name: Kate
kbs.description: a woman who used to be a pirate queen

kbs.name: Seaside Settlement
relations: a beach not that far away from Seaside Settlement

kbs.name: a beach not that far away from Seaside Settlement
kbs.description: a beach not that far away from Seaside Settlement

plots: Kate wants serenity
Kate has heard that the player helps people
Kate gives the player a map that points the player to the buried treasure

quest.title: Roguish Past
quest.objective: bring Kate's notebook to her
tasks: Make your way to a beach not that far away from Seaside Settlement.
find the buried treasure
bring Kate's notebook to her
quest.description:
I have not always been a simple villager of Seaside Settlement. I was a pirate queen: I pillaged many a ship that linger the bottom of the ocean with my crew.
Alas, my life was turned upside down one fateful day: my ship sank, and I washed up to the shore. A kind villager from this very village found me and helped me regain my strength. I left my pirate days behind, and settled down in Seaside Settlement.
However, I'd still like to obtain my notebook from those days: I accidentally dropped it into the last treasure chest we buried into the ground. My adventuring days are over: you, however, are known to do odd tasks of more or less adventurous nature to others. I'll give you my treasure map: it will lead you to the buried treasure.
You may keep the buried treasure to yourself, I just ask you to give me my notebook.

kbs.name: The End
kbs.description: the dimension at the end of all

kbs.name: Ender Dragon
kbs.description: a dragon the rules over The End

plots: wants knowledge
the player is an infamous person
the player can enter The End from a stronghold

quest.title: The Ruler of The End
quest.objective: find out whether the Ender Dragon exists
tasks: find a stronghold
find out whether the Ender Dragon exists
quest.description:
There is a place at the end of all, far away from this village. A perfect place for a person of a more.. dark disposition.
This place is called The End. It is said that you can enter it from a stronghold. The End is is said to be ruled over by a beast called the Ender Dragon: I'd like you check out whether the Ender Dragon truly exists.
Oh, I did not mention the best part yet: there are wonderful treasures in The End.

plots: wants equipment
glistering melon slices are used to brew healing potions

quest.title: A Helping Hand
quest.objective: bring glistering melon slices to Cleo
tasks: Go to Humming Hills.
find Cleo
bring glistering melon slices to Cleo
quest.description:
I am a farmer here in Seaside Settlement. Sometimes, I get a bountiful harvest of melons. I process most of the melons into glistering melon slices for clerics and their important healing potions.
I actually just finished preparing some glistering melon slices. Could you please take them to the cleric in the village of Humming Hills? I'm sure she'll pay you for them.

plots: Inkspot wants knowledge

quest.title: Connecting the Dots
quest.objective: bring Inkspot's map to Mapmaker, and return to Inkspot
tasks: Arrive at Rivermouth.
find Mapmaker
bring Inkspot's map to Mapmaker, and return to Inkspot
quest.description:
Oh my! I'm supposed to deliver a map of mine to one of my colleagues in another village, but I just can't ever spare the time
You seen to have a lot of time on your hands. Could you please deliver my map to Mapmaker in Rivermouth? He'd be grateful to you; he has wanted to examine this particular map for a long time. Upon your return, I'd give you a little something for your help.

plots: Edward wants knowledge

quest.title: Medical Breakthrough?
quest.objective: bring Edward's special healing potion to Pope
tasks: find Pope
bring Edward's special healing potion to Pope
quest.description:
I used to be an adventurer. I braved the depths of this world like no one else before me.
I still have one of my healing potions as a memento from those days of glory. That potion is quite special... Now that I think of it, the local cleric, Pope, might want to examine it for its peculiar properties. He could make some potent healing potions after researching my special potion.
Could you please find him, and give him the potion? The cleric will surely give you a small compensation fee.

plots: Una wants knowledge
Una thinks that Suspicious Man works for Illagers

quest.title: A Shadow of Treachery
quest.objective: investigate Suspicious Man's actions
tasks: find Suspicious Man's journal, and bring it to Una
investigate Suspicious Man's actions
quest.description:
I need the help of an outsider. I think one of the villagers here works for Illagers in secret! They could be planning an attack on Desert Refuge!
Would you please investigate this matter for me? Try to obtain Suspicious Man's journal. It should shed light on his actions.
I'me even willing to reward you with 48 emeralds. What are a few gems to peace of mind?

plots: wants knowledge

quest.title: Of Horses and Donkeys
quest.objective: test out whether horses can breed with donkeys
tasks: Head to plains and savannas.
Proceed to plains and savannas.
tame a horse
tame a donkey
breed the tamed horse with the tamed donkey
test out whether horses can breed with donkeys
quest.description:
My daddy said that horses and donkeys can make babies together. I want to see what their babies look like!
You are a grown-up! You ought to know how to tame and breed animals. Please show me a baby donkey-horse! I have seen both donkeys and horses eating grass an plains and savannas. Try to tame one of both and make them breed!
Show me a baby horse-donkey, and I'll give you some golden apples. They're incredibly tasty... and so shiny!

plots: Tim wants knowledge

quest.title: Made of Obsidian
quest.objective: bring some obsidian blocks to Tim
tasks: Reach underground in deep caves.
make water flow on lava to form obsidian
mine out obsidian blocks
bring some obsidian blocks to Tim
quest.description:
I have a task for you, stranger. And I'm willing to give you something precious in return.
There are age-old tales of strong, volcanic glass. This glass is known as obsidian. I'd love to try out my masonry on obsidian!
The tales also say that you can make obsidian by directing water on lava pools. There are many such pools underground in deep caves. I would ask you to mine out some obsidian blocks for me.
I'm not built for adventure myself: carving stones is all I know.

plots: Mickey wants knowledge

quest.title: Uncharted Waters
quest.objective: bring 6 tropical fish to Mickey
tasks: Make your way to oceans.
catch 6 tropical fish
bring 6 tropical fish to Mickey
quest.description:
I've caught a mountain of salmon and cod. Yet, there are still some more exotic fish that have eluded my fishing rod.
Traveler, do you like fishing? May I ask you to catch 6 tropical fish for me? These sort of fish are common in vast oceans of our world. I yearn to take a look at new kinds of fish. I could even try to breed them.
If you happen to give me 6 exotic fish, I'll be glad to reward you with an enchanted fishing rod of mine. A best kind of tool for a passionate fisher.

plots: James wants knowledge

quest.title: Not Just Black Sheep
quest.objective: bring some colorful sheep to James
tasks: Arrive at practically everywhere with grass.
find some colorful sheep
bring some colorful sheep to James
quest.description:
I've been told that there are sheep in all possible colors; not just black, gray, white and brown.
I'm not the sharpest shepherd around. You seem like a clever person: perhaps you know how to find these colorful sheep. Sheep love grass; they tend to stay in grassy areas.
Let me have some colorful, beautiful sheep. I want to test breeding a flock of sheep in all colors of the rainbow. I'll let you have a pile of regular ole white wool.

plots: Sean wants knowledge
the player helped Sean before: the player brought him colorful sheep

quest.title: Disco Sheep
quest.objective: name one of Sean's sheep "jeb_", and observe what happens
tasks: Arrive at dungeons, mineshafts, and woodland mansions.
get a name tag
name one of Sean's sheep "jeb_", and observe what happens
quest.description:
Good day to you, traveler! I just love the colorful sheep you brought me: they are so pretty.
There's an interesting thing I heard from a fellow shepherd: if you name a sheep "jeb_", something bizarre is supposed to happen. I'm happy at the moment, but knowing what happens to any sheep named "jeb_" would make me even happier. I something good happens, I shall name all of them so. If something bad happens, I will warn all shepherds about this particular name.
You have to find a name tag. Those are scattered in dangerous places; monster-filled dungeons, abandoned mineshafts, and even the ominous woodland mansions. Feel free to name one of my sheep "jeb_", and please make note of what happens. Do this, and I promise to give you a mountain of wool in all possible colors.

kbs.name: Kitt
relations: a sunken ship east of Seaside Settlement

kbs.name: a sunken ship east of Seaside Settlement
kbs.description: a sunken ship east of Seaside Settlement

plots: Kitt wants serenity
the player a friend of Kitt
Kitt gives the player a potion of water breathing

quest.title: A Bringer of Hope
quest.objective: recover a bundle of potion ingredients for Kitt
tasks: Proceed to a sunken ship east of Seaside Settlement.
find the bundle of potion ingredients
recover a bundle of potion ingredients for Kitt
quest.description:
The ship sank. All those poor sailors have now passed the veil to the other side. This is a sad day for us all.
My friend, that ship carried important potion ingredient for our village. Most of the goods that are not produced here are transported here by the sea. Now I can't fashion remedies for our villagers, and the next shipment will not be here for a long time.
You are a good person. I ask you to find a bundle of life-saving potion ingredients for me. That would mean a lot for the whole village! The bundle should be in the sunken ship east of here. Here, this potion of water breathing should help you dive to the ship save and sound.
I'll even let you have my old, extra brewing stand as a gift upon your return. Be careful while you dive; there a many lethal things lurking beneath the waves. I'd hate to bury a friend.

kbs.name: Jane
relations: an ocean ruin far west of here

kbs.name: an ocean ruin far west of here
kbs.description: an ocean ruin far west of here

plots: Jane wants knowledge
the player is a famous hero

quest.title: That Belongs to a Library!
quest.objective: recover writings of a lost culture for Jane
tasks: Find your way to an ocean ruin far west of here.
find the writings of a lost culture
recover writings of a lost culture for Jane
quest.description:
There are ruins scattered on both land and the bottom of the sea, hero. These ruins tell us many things about the people who inhabited them: their hardships and hopes.
I'm not a hero like you, just your everyday librarian. I know of a submerged ruin in an ocean far west of here that you could explore. I implore you: find writings of a lost culture that lived in the ruin. The writings will be reduced to a lump of watery paper, if we don't recover them in time.
I have some unused bookshelves that I could give you in return. Even heroes need to civilize themselves with quality literature sometimes.

plots: Kant wants knowledge
the player is a known villain

quest.title: Musings of a Madman
quest.objective: bring Spook's new book to Kant
tasks: Proceed to an igloo to the north.
find Spook
bring Spook's new book to Kant
quest.description:
Oh... You're that dark villain. This is just like one of my adventure novels! So exciting!
Perhaps you happen to know Spook. He's a kooky novelist who lives in an igloo to the north. You should get along with him splendidly! And whole you are there, you could even get his new book for me. I need to know what events unfold in that one!
Evil machinations need funding, don't they? Well, do my little book-fetching mission, and gain an enchanted book. I love books, but that one flew over my head... literally!.

kbs.name: Heide
relations: an ocean monument: a dangerous underwater temple made out of turquoise stone blocks, located far south of Fishing Hamlet

kbs.name: an ocean monument: a dangerous underwater temple made out of turquoise stone blocks, located far south of Fishing Hamlet
kbs.description: an ocean monument: a dangerous underwater temple made out of turquoise stone blocks, located far south of Fishing Hamlet

kbs.name: Elder Guardian
kbs.description: [Enemy] one-eyed, large, pale, evil pufferfish that can shoot laser, and make the player fatigued when the player is near them
relations: an ocean monument: a dangerous underwater temple made out of turquoise stone blocks, located far south of Fishing Hamlet

plots: Heide wants serenity
the player is an enemy of Heide

quest.title: The One That Got Away
quest.objective: recover Heide's fishing rod
tasks: Find your way to an ocean monument: a dangerous underwater temple made out of turquoise stone blocks, located far south of Fishing Hamlet.
find the Elder Guardian that swallowed Heide's fishing rod, and kill it
recover Heide's fishing rod
quest.description:
I just escaped with my life from a friggin' Elder Guardian, and now I run into you, my least favorite person in the whole world.
The damn Elder Guardian swallowed the hook, line, and sinker of my fishing rod while I was out in the sea fishing on my boat. It must have eaten the whole fishing rod after it slipped from my grip into the sea.
I shouldn't have gone fish so close to the ocean monument far south of this village. I just couldn't see the turquoise stones that make up the monument before it was too late. Who even built those dangerous underwater temples anyway?
I have a proposition for you: recover my fishing rod from the Elder Guardian, and I'll set you up with enough cooked salmon to last your lifetime. We might even become friends. First, you have to find the Elder Guardian, and kill it.
Elder Guardians are one-eyed, large, pale, evil pufferfish. They can shoot laser, and make you fatigued when you get close to them.

kbs.name: Tut's Temple
kbs.description: an ancient desert pyramid filled with traps and treasure, a short way away from Desert Refuge

plots: Zed wants knowledge

quest.title: Ancient Artisanship
quest.objective: bring an ancient device to Zed
tasks: Head to Tut's Temple.
find the ancient device
bring an ancient device to Zed
quest.description:
Hello traveler. What brings you to Desert Refuge, this piece of civilization out in the scorching desert? Are you stocking up on supplies on your way to explore desert ruins?
If you are, I would like your help. I promise to pay you with something useful. The thing is, there's this ancient pyramid, Tut's Temple, a short way away from this village. It is said to be full of treasure! And some highly lethal traps that are too much to overcome for a meager researcher like me. There are also rumors that say that the ancients had useful devices lost to time. I'd love to get my hands on one, for science.
Please, go to Tut's Temple and find an ancient device! It may tell us about many lost crafts!

kbs.name: Dark Hall
kbs.description: a woodland mansion inhabited by Illagers

kbs.name: Darkwood
kbs.description: a dark, dense forest with thick leaf canopies that block sunlight

plots: wants knowledge

quest.title: A Mansion of Marauders
quest.objective: confirm whether the Dark Hall actually exists
tasks: Proceed to Darkwood.
scout out Darkwood
confirm whether the Dark Hall actually exists
quest.description:
I think I saw an Illager scout keeping an eye on our village from the shadows of nearby trees. Pineville is not safe! The Illagers of the Dark Hall are going to kill us all!
Traveler, could you please help me calm my nerves? It is said that there is a woodland mansion called the Dark Hall deep in the thickets of Darkwood. It is supposed to be a safe haven for Illagers, those bloodthirsty outcasts who resorted to banditry!
I would like you to scout out Darkwood. Be cautious. Darkwood is a dark, dense forest with thick leaf canopies that block sunlight: perfect for ambushes. Find out if the Dark Hall truly exists. I'll pay you a block of emerald! Those are not that easy to come by!

plots: Herbert wants knowledge

quest.title: Mushroom Mania
quest.objective: grow a huge mushroom, and report back to Herbert
tasks: Travel to places shielded from direct sunlight.
Find your way to somewhere near Herbert.
find a mushroom
find a way to grow a regular mushroom to a huge mushroom
grow a huge mushroom, and report back to Herbert
quest.description:
Mushrooms are awesome! I love everything about them! Their texture, their taste...
Some travelers claim to have seen some huge, giant mushrooms that stand as tall as trees. I want to see one for real!
Could you help me see a huge mushroom? You are a traveler: you must know how to grow huge mushrooms. Please find a regular mushroom from a place shielded from direct sunlight, and find a way to grow it into a huge mushroom somewhere where I can see it.
Report back to me after growing a huge mushroom, and I'll reward you with a bunch of golden carrots. They are tasty, but I prefer mushrooms. Especially steamy, hot mushroom stew that waters one's mouth.

plots: Dana wants knowledge
Dana gives the player a bucket

quest.title: Bringing Out the Flavor
quest.objective: bring a lava bucket, blaze rod, and a block of coal to Dana
tasks: Find your way to lava pools deep underground.
Arrive at Nether.
Proceed to ore veins seated in stone.
obtain a lava bucket
obtain a blaze rod
obtain a block of coal
bring a lava bucket, blaze rod, and a block of coal to Dana
quest.description:
My job is to sell meat of all sorts: both cooked and raw. I take pride in my craftsmanship: I always try to find new, improved ways to cook meat.
I have a hypothesis: the fuel used in my oven affects the taste of the meat that's cooked in it. I'd like to test out different materials to feed the flames of my oven: a bucket of lava, a blaze rod, and a block of coal, for starters.
Would you help a butcher better her craft? Bring the items I mentioned to me, and I'll cook you a year's worth of steak.
Lava can be found in pools deep under the ground. I'll give you a bucket for scooping out the lava. Blaze rods a trickier to obtain; you have to brave the hellscape that is the Nether. Coal, on the contrary, is quite easy to get. Just look out for ore veins seated in stone.

kbs.name: Pate
relations: diamond veins deep in the ground

kbs.name: diamond veins deep in the ground
kbs.description: diamond veins deep in the ground

plots: Pate wants equipment
the player is a friend of Pate

quest.title: Deal of the Century
quest.objective: bring 2 blocks of diamond to Pate
tasks: Find your way to diamond veins deep in the ground.
obtain 2 blocks of diamond
bring 2 blocks of diamond to Pate
quest.description:
My friend, I've got a profitable deal for you today. As you know, I smith weapons from a variety of materials, including diamond.
Just so it happens, I'm running low on diamonds: soon I can't make any diamond swords for daring adventurers. I'm not skilled in adventuring; I can't brave the deep underground for diamond veins.
Yet, I have a whopping block of Netherite. You definitely don't see those every day! Here's the deal: bring me 2 blocks of diamond, and I'll give you my block of Netherite. A good deal for a good friend.

kbs.name: Nether
kbs.description: a lethal dimension, where the player can easily burn in lava

kbs.name: Netherite
kbs.description: a metal that cuts sharper than diamond

kbs.name: Ancient Debris
kbs.description: a rare ore that can be refined into Netherite

plots: Kaz wants knowledge
the player is an enemy of Kaz

quest.title: Weapons of Monster Mass Destruction
quest.objective: bring 8 Ancient Debris to Kaz
tasks: Reach Nether.
mine 8 Ancient Debris
bring 8 Ancient Debris to Kaz
quest.description:
A nasty person like you can go to the Nether. No one would miss you, if you were to die in there. If you don't burn yourself in lava, you could do a bit something for me there.
I have heard that there's a new kind of metal that can be fashioned into a sword that cuts sharper than diamond! I can't wait to experiment on that metal: it's called Netherite, and it can be refined from a rare ore known only as "Ancient Debris".
Mine 8 Ancient Debris, and bring them to me. I'll even fashion you a new kind of sword for your help. Only use it on monsters: you'll just dull its blade for nothing by sticking it into innocent villagers.

plots: Dean wants knowledge
Dean has heard that the player helps people

quest.title: New Materials
quest.objective: bring 10 scutes to Dean
tasks: Proceed to sandy beaches.
obtain 10 scutes from turtles
bring 10 scutes to Dean
quest.description:
I have made all sorts of things from leather: tunics, hats, and even little tent-houses. There's nothing new I can create...
Could you perhaps help me out of this sea of creative depression? You do help people? Please find me a new material to work with! Perhaps turtle scutes would work...
Please help me get my hands on ten scutes: you can get them from turtles on sandy beaches. I'll give you a stack of leather for your services!

plots: Gilbert wants knowledge
the player is an infamous person

quest.title: Tools of the Enemy
quest.objective: bring an Illager crossbow to Gilbert
tasks: Find your way to a nearby Illager outpost.
steal an Illager crossbow
bring an Illager crossbow to Gilbert
quest.description:
You are quite a mischievous person, aren't you? Maybe you'd like to do a small prank for me?
I want to get an Illager crossbow. See what makes it tick. The problem is, Illagers are quite a nasty bunch: they shoot anyone with their crossbows without discrimination.
Lift one of their crossbows from them, bring it to me, and I'll give you a powerful bow of my own making.

kbs.name: Nether Fortress
kbs.description: a terrible fortress in the Nether, inhabited by fierce creatures

plots: Yves wants reputation

quest.title: Tales of Terror
quest.objective: visit a Nether Fortress, and report back to Yves
tasks: Travel to Nether.
Travel to Nether Fortress.
go to the Nether
find a Nether Fortress
visit a Nether Fortress, and report back to Yves
quest.description:
I love to tell stories to others. I'd like to bolster my reputation as a storyteller with some novel, unheard stories about the Nether. To recount its dangers and hellish nature...
A witness' account of a Nether Fortress would help me devise some dashing tales. A terrible fortress with equally terrible inhabitants...
Would you be my witness? Please, go to the Nether and find a Nether Fortress. Visit it, and tell me all about it. I'll have a diamond for you. It should entice you to help me.

kbs.name: a hidden camp on a mountain
kbs.description: a hidden camp on a mountain

kbs.name: A.R.
relations: a hidden camp on a mountain

kbs.name: "An Interview with the Enderman"
relations: a hidden camp on a mountain

plots: Finn wants reputation

quest.title: Exclusively Here!
quest.objective: bring "An Interview With the Enderman" to Finn
tasks: Find your way to a hidden camp on a mountain.
convince A.R. sign an exclusivity deal with Villager
bring "An Interview With the Enderman" to Finn
quest.description:
No one cares about libraries any more! Everyone just buys their books, even though they could read them for free!
There's only one thing I can do to make my library more popular: exclusive books. I'd like to secure an exclusivity deal with A.R., a very famous novelist. She has just finished her new book, "An Interview with the Enderman", while staying at a hidden camp on a mountain.
Could you please get to A.R.'s camp and convince her to sign the exclusivity deal? Bring back a copy of "An Interview with the Enderman" too. I'd like to read it myself. You can have 32 name tags as a reward, keeping things named and ordered is always useful.

plots: Nate wants serenity
the player helped Nate sign an exclusivity deal with A.R.

quest.title: Bolstering Catalog
quest.objective: recover a shipment of books for Nate
tasks: Reach an Illager outpost.
find the shipment of books
recover a shipment of books for Nate
quest.description:
Welcome to my library! How may I help you on this beautiful day?
Ah, you're my helper from before! Thanks to you, the library's been visited much more frequently than ever before. Having exclusive rights to A.R.'s books made the library soar in popularity! I even had to order more copies of books to satisfy all reading needs!
Actually, there is a teeny tiny issue related to the books: a band of Illagers stole a shipment of books and hauled them to their outpost. Would you kindly find and recover the shipment for me? You'll receive 10 blocks of emerald for your services.

kbs.name: The End
kbs.description: a mysterious place at the end of space and time

plots: Weak Will wants reputation

quest.title: The Dragon at the End of It All
quest.objective: slay the Ender Dragon, and report back to Weak Will
tasks: Find your way to The End.
enter The End
slay the Ender Dragon, and report back to Weak Will
quest.description:
Me useless moron, say many people of this village. Me want to seem like a hero instead. Would make I happier, less thinking of dying.
Me know!!! Go to The End. That strange place at the end. Kill that big meanie Ender Dragon. Tell I how you did it, and me can tell everyone me did it!
Me give you something cool for me white lie.

plots: Arnold wants reputation
the player is a famous hero

quest.title: Number One Armorer
quest.objective: bring 32 blocks of iron to Arnold
tasks: Travel to iron veins in the ground.
Head to a furnace somewhere.
Make your way to any crafting bench.
obtain iron ore
smelt iron ore into iron ingots
craft iron ingots into blocks of iron
bring 32 blocks of iron to Arnold
quest.description:
I want to become famous. Just not quite like you, hero. I seek to become the best armorer in the world. To do that, I need a lot of practice in hammering down pieces of armor.
Would you please bring me 32 blocks of iron? Those should help me become a better armorer in no time! First, you have to get iron ore from the many iron veins in the ground. Next, you'll want to smelt the ore into iron ingots in a furnace somewhere. Lastly, you ought to craft those iron ingots into blocks of iron on a crafting table.
Do all that, and I promise to outfit you in better armor than what you are wearing now!

plots: Jim wants reputation
the player is a known villain

quest.title: A Faithful Servant
quest.objective: bring a load of sticks to Jim
tasks: Go to all kinds of forests.
chop down trees to obtain wood
craft sticks from wood
bring a load of sticks to Jim
quest.description:
What! NO! Please spare me, oh dark master! I promise I'll be your best servant. A minion of unshaken loyalty.
If my arrows were known to be the best, your dark influence would spread across the land! Please, master. Bring me a load of sticks so I can craft arrows en masse.
Master, you need to chop down trees in a forest of any kind, and then craft the wood from the trees into sticks.

plots: Dan wants reputation
the player is a friend of Dan

quest.title: A Market for Stone
quest.objective: help Dan promote his stoneworks
tasks: hand out promotional pamphlets to villagers
help Dan promote his stoneworks
quest.description:
No one in this village buys the beautiful stones cut by me. I'm a failure of a mason!
Friend, could you promote my stoneworks? I really could use more customers. This village is quite large, there ought to be at least a few villagers who might be interested in my stone bricks and other stoneworks. Just hand out some promotional pamphlets to the villagers of Stoneburg.
You'll even net a load of emeralds for your services, my friend.

kbs.name: note blocks, used to play musical notes
kbs.description: note blocks, used to play musical notes

plots: Zana wants reputation
the player is an enemy of Zana
the player can craft note blocks from wooden planks and redstone dust

quest.title: Notes in Blocks
quest.objective: bring 24 note blocks to Zana
tasks: obtain 24 note blocks
bring 24 note blocks to Zana
quest.description:
I am most certainly not going to sing your praises, you nasty cretin.
On the contrary, it would be music to my ears if you helped me reach my musical ambitions. No one in this village seems to care for music, or any of the arts for that matter. For starters, obtain 24 note blocks. It has to be exactly 24, because there are that many different notes to play. It's possible to craft note blocks from wooden planks and redstone dust.
Bring the 24 note blocks to me. I'll let you have an old music disc of mine.

plots: Olivia wants reputation
Olivia gives the player seeds that can be used to tame a parrot

quest.title: A Talkative Pet
quest.objective: bring a tamed parrot to Olivia
tasks: Reach jungles.
tame a parrot
bring a tamed parrot to Olivia
quest.description:
My mommy and daddy say that I can't go outside the village. I don't! But I really wanna have a parrot. The other kids would certainly like me better if I had a cool pet like a parrot!
You a big enough to travel to places on your own without your parents. Traveler, please tame a parrot and bring it to me. I even have some seeds for you: tame the parrot with them. Parrots live in jungles.
I will give you this diamond I once found on the ground. Even a kid like me knows that those are valuable.

kbs.name: Hunter
kbs.description: a youngster who wants to become an adventurer

plots: Hunter wants reputation

quest.title: The Call of Adventure
quest.objective: bring a sword and a suit of armor to Hunter
tasks: Reach weaponsmiths.
Travel to armorers.
obtain a sword
obtain a suit of armor
bring a sword and a suit of armor to Hunter
quest.description:
I do not want to spend my whole life in this village! I want to become an adventurer, like you. Maybe even make a name for myself...
Can you please help me start my life as an adventurer? I just need a sword and a suit of armor to keep myself save from danger. You can get swords from weaponsmiths and armor from armorers.
I collected some amethyst shards when I was a child dreaming of adventure. You can have them. You may yet find a use for them.

plots: Sam wants reputation

quest.title: A Tour in Hell
quest.objective: explore the Nether with Sam
tasks: Find your way to Nether.
go to the Nether with Sam
explore the Nether with Sam
quest.description:
I really want to see something more interesting than the bounds of this village. That would also elevate my status among the other villagers.
Traveler, can you take me to the Nether? I want see that hellish realm myself, but I can't fend off its dangers all by myself. Let us explore the place together.
You will also get a fair reward for being my guide in the Nether: 10 diamonds. Don't spend them all at once.

kbs.name: Cara
kbs.description: a woman who wants to dye her hair

plots: Cara wants reputation

quest.title: Turning Heads
quest.objective: give red dye to Cara
tasks: Make your way to wandering traders.
find red dye
give red dye to Cara
quest.description:
The guys in this village rarely take note of me. I want to dye my hair red to make myself more attractive.
Wandering traders often have red dye. Could you find some and give it to me? I'd give you 12 emeralds for the red dye.

kbs.name: End Cities
kbs.description: storied cities at the end of time and space

kbs.name: Ender Chests
kbs.description: chests whose contents are stored separately for all people

plots: Loki wants reputation
the player can craft Ender Chests somehow

quest.title: A Box of Tricks
quest.objective: give an Ender Chest to Loki
tasks: Proceed to End Cities.
obtain an Ender Chest
give an Ender Chest to Loki
quest.description:
I'm planning all sorts of new pranks that would make me a famous man here in the village. There's one integral item that I haven't been able to obtain: an Ender Chest. You know, the chests whose contents are stored separately for everyone?
I heard you can find Ender Chests in End Cities at the end of time and space. It should also be possible to craft them somehow. Can you obtain an Ender Chest? I would pay you well for one: you could have some powered rails that I used in one of my pranks.

plots: Martin wants reputation

quest.title: Sweets for All
quest.objective: give 10 honey blocks to Martin
tasks: find some bees
give 10 honey blocks to Martin
quest.description:
I'd like to bake my delicious honey cakes for the whole village! Then they'd certainly know that I have traveled all over the world! I even used to be a wandering trader.
I need a lot of honey for the cakes. You are quite a wanderer yourself. Perhaps you could help me procure 10 honey blocks. You can get honey from bees; you just have to find them first.
Do this for me, and I'll give you a special reward: a Shulker Box. These things were worth their weight in emeralds every time someone murdered my pack llamas: they made hauling my stock much easier.

plots: Garth wants reputation
the player is an infamous person
Garth gives the player a lead

quest.title: A Playful Panda
quest.objective: bring a playful panda to Garth
tasks: find a playful panda, and put a lead on it
bring a playful panda to Garth
quest.description:
You have got quite a reputation. Not a very positive one, mind you!
I, on the other hand, seek to become famous in more positive terms: I want to become a zookeeper. For that I'm going to need some animals to showcase. There exist special, playful pandas who love to roll around. I want one.
This is your chance to bring a bit joy to this world: bring me a playful panda for my zoo. First, you have to find one and put a lead on it. Here, take this lead. When you return with the panda, I'll give you a saddle in return.

kbs.name: Elytra
kbs.description: wings that let the player fly

plots: Alex wants reputation
the player has an Elytra

quest.title: Elytra Air Show
quest.objective: complete Alex's Elytra obstacle course
tasks: talk to Alex when you are ready
complete Alex's Elytra obstacle course
quest.description:
You've got a nice pair of wings on you. Would you care to try my Elytra obstacle course? Villagers might enjoy to see you fly. Perhaps they'd even want to try my course after seeing you go through it. Just talk to me when you are ready.
Good performances are awarded with cool prizes!

plots: Elena wants reputation
Elena has heard that the player helps people
powerful creepers are somehow related to obtaining the zombie heads

quest.title: Head Hunter
quest.objective: bring 5 zombie heads to Elena
tasks: obtain 5 zombie heads
bring 5 zombie heads to Elena
quest.description:
I want all monsters in this world know how much I hate them. Perhaps I could get some of their heads to show my disdain toward them. Zombie heads should show all zombies that I am not to be trifled with.
You will certainly help me; many people in this village have told me that you are a resourceful and eager to work. Bring me five zombie heads. Powerful creepers are somehow related to getting the heads, but I don't know how exactly.
Get me the heads, and I'll give you wings that let you soar the skies: an Elytra.

plots: Bob wants reputation

quest.title: Coming Soon!
quest.objective: promote the services of Bob in nearby villages
tasks: Reach Seaside Settlement.
Arrive at Desert Refuge.
Arrive at Stoneburg.
talk to the villagers
hand out promotional items to villagers
hand out coupons to villagers
promote the services of Bob in nearby villages
quest.description:
Hail! It's rare to see another traveler out in the wilderness. I'm a wandering merchant by trade: I travel from village to village to sell my merchandise.
You wouldn't mind helping me out a bit in exchange for an enchanted book? I'd like you to promote my services in nearby villages: Seaside Settlement, Desert Refuge, and Stoneburg.
I am already fairly well-known in the coastal Seaside Settlement, so you just gotta tell the villagers there that I am coming there soon. For the villagers of Desert Refuge out in the desert, I have some promotional items that I want you to hand out. Lastly, I want you to give some coupons to the villagers of the mountainous Stoneburg.
Good luck in your promotional mission!

plots: wants serenity

quest.title: Word of the Gods
quest.objective: convince the villagers of Woodridge come to the temple more often
tasks: Reach Woodridge.
talk to the villagers
convince the villagers of Woodridge come to the temple more often
quest.description:
People do not care about the gods any more! The temple of gods in this village remains empty!
My child, could you convince the villagers of Woodridge come to the temple more often? It would do good to their everlasting souls. Please, talk to the villagers of Woodridge. Do this, and I'll be sure to reward you well with 10 bottles of enchanting.

plots: Chris wants wealth

quest.title: Branching Out
quest.objective: help Chris finish up a trade deal between him and Wander
tasks: Go to the wilderness.
take Chris's contract to Wander
help Chris finish up a trade deal between him and Wander
quest.description:
My leatherworks are selling like hot cakes! I'm so happy!
It is a good time to expand my business out of this village. Traveler, could you help me finish up a trade deal between me and Wander the wandering merchant? You just need to take my contract to him. He should be out in the wilderness right now.
You'll get a block of emerald for your services. My business makes plenty of emeralds right now, so handing out a few isn't a biggie.

kbs.name: a village
relations: a place of the player's choosing

kbs.name: a place of the player's choosing
kbs.description: a place of the player's choosing

kbs.name: Wither
kbs.description: [Enemy] an extremely dangerous skeletal creature capable of bombing out everything in its surroundings

plots: Tove wants reputation
Tove draws the summoning pattern of the Wither for the player

quest.title: Withering Away
quest.objective: kill the Wither
tasks: Arrive at Nether.
Make your way to a place of the player's choosing.
gather up 3 wither skeleton skulls, and 4 blocks of soul sand
summon the Wither with the gathered items
kill the Wither
quest.description:
I'm a storyteller. I always like to hear new stories that I can pass along to the people of this village.
Old legends tell about a mighty skeletal creature known only as the "Wither." It is said that it can bomb out everything in its surroundings. If you killed the Wither, I'd give you a rare Nether Star as a reward.
I'll draw you the summoning pattern of the Wither. You need to gather up certain items from the hellish Nether: three wither skeleton skulls, and four blocks of soul sand. Use these items to summon the Wither.

plots: wants serenity

quest.title: Scouring Up Housing
quest.objective: build a new house in Woodridge
tasks: gather up materials for building a house
build a new house in Woodridge
quest.description:
Our village, Woodridge, is stagnating hard! We need more housing so that our village can grow larger.
Traveler, do you know anything about building houses? Perhaps you could build a brand new house in our village? You have to gather some house building materials first, though.
I have a fine reward for you! A stack of golden carrots. A fine meal after doing some construction work, ain't it?

plots: Daniel wants reputation
Daniel gives the player a box of building materials

quest.title: Jewel of the Desert
quest.objective: build an inn in Desert Refuge
tasks: gather up materials for building an inn
build an inn in Desert Refuge
quest.description:
Hail traveler! I'd guide you toward a soft bed, but as it happens, our village doesn't have an inn.
We really could use an inn: travelers heading in and out of the desert pass by Desert Refuge often. An inn would make our village even more famous! Could you build an inn here? You just need some building materials; I'll give you a box of materials to start with.
We will give you ten stacks of sand as a reward, to help you craft many useful things.

plots: wants protection
the player is a famous hero

quest.title: Guards! Guards! Guards!
quest.objective: build a watchhouse in River's End
tasks: find construction materials
build a watchhouse in River's End
quest.description:
River's End is a large village, yet we lack a watchhouse! We don't have a place to store away all troublemakers! They are free to roam along the law-abiding people...
Hero, you are an honorable person. Could you build us a watchhouse? You should gather up some construction materials first. Complete the watchhouse, and we'll give you an enchanted axe. May it help you bury your enemies!

plots: wants conquest
the player is a known villain

quest.title: Dark Rule
quest.objective: conquer Desert Refuge
tasks: Make your way to Desert Refuge.
kill all villagers who oppose you
conquer Desert Refuge
quest.description:
Master, the desert village of Desert Refuge is ripe for taking! Your dark domain will grow vastly, if you were to conquer it!
Master, you should go to Desert Refuge, and kill all villagers you oppose you! The ones who don't, on the contrary, should make terrific new minions for you!

kbs.name: Henrik
relations: an Illager outpost to the north

kbs.name: an Illager camp to the northeast
kbs.description: an Illager camp to the northeast

kbs.name: an Illager outpost to the north
kbs.description: an Illager outpost to the north

kbs.name: Tom
relations: an Illager outpost to the north
an Illager camp to the northeast

kbs.name: Tony
kbs.description: a taciturn male Illager captain, a rival of Tom's
relations: an Illager camp to the northeast

plots: Henrik wants conquest
Henrik has heard that the player help people

quest.title: Divide and Conquer
quest.objective: make Illagers fight each other
tasks: Go to an Illager camp to the northeast.
Go to an Illager outpost to the north.
steal Tony's axe without being seen
kill Tom, and pin his death on Tony by planting Tony's axe on Tom's corpse
make Illagers fight each other
quest.description:
You are a friend of us villagers, and have helped many of us. Now I'd like you to do something a bit... less conventional.
Illagers have been bothering us for ages: we villagers are not fighters; we can't hold our own against those bloodthirsty brigands. I want you to sow distrust among their ranks: make them fight amongst themselves.
I already have a plan for you to follow. There are two Illager captains, Tony and Tom, who do not exactly see eye to eye. You should go to the Illager camp to the northeast, and pinch Tony's axe without being seen. Then, move on to the Illager outpost to the north of here, kill Tom, and plant Tony's axe on Tom's body. Tony is known to be quick to anger: Tom's men will go after him, for they will assume that Tony killed their leader.
Do this grueling task, and I'll have something highly valuable for you.

plots: wants security
the player is an infamous person

quest.title: Woodland Security
quest.objective: make Whispering Pines safer for villagers
tasks: Make your way to Whispering Pines.
build some iron golems
make Whispering Pines safer for villagers
quest.description:
You scared me! Although I suppose that even someone as infamous as you isn't quite as spooky as Whispering Pines.
That taiga forest is not safe! Many villagers have gone missing there; never to be seen ever again. There must be something that could be done to make the forest safer for us villagers...
Perhaps you could go and build some iron golems in Whispering Pines? That would make the forest much safer! You'd even receive a worthy gift for doing this feat.
